Ngǎŋ á la gwɔ́ pɔ́ nò tà’ nyìŋ, á nue mé zɔɔn ńtóŋo tsɛ̀ɛ ŋwà’ne Ssé ngie: Tà mbɔɔ mbwo nyìŋ gẅie ɔ̀ ge gÿo zyé yé. Wɛ̌ nyìŋ piŋ ńgwɔ́ Kristo.
en: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made. He saith not, And to seeds, as of many; but as of one, And to thy seed, which is Christ.

ngiemboon: Pi jú’u nò gie mèŋ fa’a légɔɔn. E Ssé la gwɔ́ zye ńka’a nò mbwo Ábalam.*Lepʉ̌ lá’ ńgwɔ́ tó, mbà é cʉ̌a ngù’ nkÿo lekùa lê móm ntá. É ké tè gʉa nà*kʉ̀a yɔ́b Ábalam ḿbyága tsɔ́ mmó, ńdɔg pú’u, ńgÿo ammó gie à la ka’a mbwo Ábalam cʉa sẅɛ̀ɛ wɔ́.
en: And this I say,thatthe covenant, that was confirmed before of God in Christ, the law, which was four hundred and thirty years after, cannot disannul, that it should make the promise of none effect.

ngiemboon: Á nue ntÿɔgɔ́ gẅie é fóo mbwo Ssé laa pé’e mé zẅɛ́’ɛ pɔ́*lepʉ̌ tá ńgẅiin, mbà ńgwɔ́ é le gíŋe fó ná pá’ e Ssé la ka’ wɔ́. E Ssé la zɔɔn ńnéŋe tà fʉ̀’ ku’ á lɔgɔ mmó gie à la ka’a mbwo Ábalam ńdɔg ńcÿó gʉm yé cÿó.
en: For if the inheritancebeof the law,it isno more of promise: but God gaveitto Abraham by promise.

ngiemboon: Ngwɔ́ nyìŋ jú’ ńzɛ́te ngie tà Ssé laa pá’ɔɔn ḿbiŋe ńzába*lepʉ̌ ńtí pɔ́ kɔ́ wɔ́? À lɔ̌ɔn ńzába pɔ́ lélɔg ńgÿo nyìŋ fʉa nò ńzsé ngie à fʉ̌a. Lepʉ̀ la fa’a yé fà’ tà ńdá’ ńkú fʉ̀’ gie nyìŋ Ábalam gẅie Ssé la ka’a mmó ngie áa ye ngàŋ la tó. Á gʉa ná sɛ̌*lepʉ̌, mbà Ssé la túm mecÿɔ́’ pé, pɔ́ náa mbwo mámekěm.
en: Wherefore thenserveththe law? It was added because of transgressions, till the seed should come to whom the promise was made;and it wasordained by angels in the hand of a mediator.

ngiemboon: Mé gwɔ́ kíme mámekěm ná nò, á lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ nò gie megàŋ té gẅiin shÿó pá’ nò ge kẅɛɛ ncwò nyìŋ é kúu ncwò wetsɔ̌ wɔ́. Tá’ á ké ńgʉa nà nò gie e Ssé la ka’ la, mbà kwà’ yé zɔ la tyé ńgɔɔn.
en: Now a mediator is nota mediatorof one, but God is one.

ngiemboon: Pá’ áa pá’ɔɔn lɔɔn á lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ ngie*lepʉ̌ Ssé la pyág shúm sie à la ka’ kekɔ́ wɔ́? Ngǎŋ á té pú’u, wɔ́. Á la gwé’e ńgwɔ́ gie à la ná tsɔ́*lepʉ̌ sie ńgwɔ́ é gÿo pʉ̀a mesoŋ gwɔ́ wó, mbà à lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ nyìŋ lɔg pá’ à kú’te*lepʉ̌, ńku’u nyìŋ gẅie aa mvfò Ssé ńgwɔ́ ndʉŋ ndʉŋ.
en: Isthe law then against the promises of God? God forbid: for if there had been a law given which could have given life, verily righteousness should have been by the law.

ngiemboon: Tá’ ŋwà’ne Ssé nyɛ ngie wɛ̌wɛ̌ nyìŋ wɔ́ à gwɔ́ pɔ́ nkwɔɔn mbwo nò tepòŋ. Áa pá’ɔɔn le gwɔ́ gie ammó gie e Ssé la ka’ ge pumte pɔ́ ná pʉ̀a pie é cʉa ná Yěsô Kristo ńzáb ntʉ́m wɔ́b nà ye.
en: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin, that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe.

ngiemboon: Kristo la gwa tó tà mé záb ntʉ́m ná ye, peg pà Yuda né ńjú’u pɔ́ ncwò*lepʉ̌ Mǒsê, é ně ńkwɛɛ wég pá’ mé kwɛɛ megàŋa tsǎŋ la tà ńkú nà fʉ̀’ gie e Ssé lɔ̌ɔn ńge gÿo gÿo mé zsé Yěsô Kristo ńzáb ntʉ́m ná ye.
en: But before faith came, we were kept under the law, shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed.

ngiemboon: *Lepʉ̌ lâ pá’ɔɔn ńdɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ pá’ nyìŋ gẅie e Ssé la túm á ně ńdíe wég tà ńkú fʉ̀’ gie Kristo ka tó légwɔ́ gie peg ge záb ntʉ́m ná ye; é lɔg pú’u, e Ssé cʉ́’ ńdíe wég pɔ́ pá’ pʉ̀a pie ée ndʉŋ ndʉŋ mvfò ye.
en: Wherefore the law was our schoolmasterto bring usunto Christ, that we might be justified by faith.

ngiemboon: Tá’ à fʉ̀’ɔɔn gie Kristo ka tó, tà mé ne ńzába ntʉ́m ná ye lɔɔn, wɛ̌ nyìŋ gẅie à ka ne ńdíe wég cʉ́’ʉ ńgẅiin nò ná peg wɔ́.
en: But after that faith is come, we are no longer under a schoolmaster.

ngiemboon: Pi metsèm zɔɔn ńdɔg pá’ pi záb ntʉ́m ná Yěsô Kristo ńgwɔ́ púɔ Ssé.
en: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus.

ngiemboon: Pi metsèm, pie pi la kẅé ntse á gwɔ́ léla nnɛ́ ná Kristo, mà Kristo kéen ńjÿó gẅí.
en: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ.

ngiemboon: Á fó pú’u, e Ssé tè gíŋe ńgÿo tsɔ́ tyɛ’te ná pà Yuda lâ pʉ̀a Gelekia wɔ́, ńké té gíŋe ńgÿo nà menkwɔɔn lâ pà ndù nnɛ́ wɔ́, ńké tè gíŋe gÿo nà mbàŋa lâ pànzwé wɔ́, á nue pi lɔg pá’ pi la nnɛ́ ná Yěsô Kristo ńcʉ́’ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ tà’ ntí
en: There is neither Jew nor Greek, there is neither bond nor free, there is neither male nor female: for ye are all one in Christ Jesus.

ngiemboon: Pá’ pi ee pʉ̀a Kristo la, pi lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ ngẅɛ̀ Ábalam, ńgwɔ́ pàgẅiin gí mmó nà shúm sie e Ssé la ka’.
en: And if yebeChrist's, then are ye Abraham's seed, and heirs according to the promise.

ngiemboon: Pi jú’u nò gie mè fa’a légɔɔn. Nyìŋ gẅie mé la nyé shúm né ye, á piŋ ńnyé ńgwɔ́ múɔ, à lɔɔn ńdá’ ńnyé tè gwɔ́ ndÿò, mbà à gwɔ̌ pɔ́ pá’ nkwɔɔn la, tà mbɔɔ pá’ shúm sie mé la nyé, é gwɔ́ pɔ́ sé.
en: Now I say,Thatthe heir, as long as he is a child, differeth nothing from a servant, though he be lord of all;

ngiemboon: À lɔɔn ńnyé ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ múɔ mé múɔ, mbà à gẅiin lé jú’ ncwò pʉ̀a pie é tóonte yé mbɔɔ we pʉ̀a pie é líe shúm sé tà lá’ kú ngù’ gie tá we la záb.
en: but is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father.

ngiemboon: Á gíŋ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ ndʉŋ ndʉŋ pá’ á laa fʉ̀’ gie pege la nyé ńgwɔ́ pá’ púɔ penkʉ́ la, pege gwɔ́ menkwɔɔn ńtí legìŋ gẅie mé gíŋe mǒ tsɛ̀ɛ yɔɔn njÿó.
en: Even so we, when we were children, were in bondage under the elements of the world:

ngiemboon: Tá’ afʉ̀’ gie Ssé la záb la gwɔ́ tà ńku’, á túmo Míŋ we. Á gwɔ́ tó manzwé zye yé. Á ne ńnéŋe ná pá’*lepʉ̌ Mǒsê ně ńzɛ́te.
en: but when the fulness of the time was come, God sent forth his Son, made of a woman, made under the law,

ngiemboon: À la tó pú’u, lécu’ pʉ̀a pie*lepʉ̌ Mǒsê la ne ńdɔgɔ wɔ́b ńgÿo menkwɔɔn, mbɔɔ pá’ à ge gÿo pege metsèm cʉ́’ púɔ Ssé.
en: to redeem them that were under the law, that we might receive the adoption of sons.

ngiemboon: Áa nénʉ́ pi ee kwa’ púɔ Ssé. Aliŋé áa pá’ Ssé la ńnéŋe Zẅìge Míŋ we tsɛ̀ɛ mentʉ́m mégè, á Zẅìge gie á gÿo pege tóŋo Ssé le Abba. Á lɔgɔ ńgɔɔn ngie Tá wɔɔn.
en: And because ye are sons, God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts, crying, Abba, Father.

ngiemboon: Pú’u, ɔ̀ tè gíŋe ńgwɔ́ nkwɔɔn wɔ́. Ɔ̀ cʉ́’ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ Míŋ we nzyé. Pá’ ɔ̀ cʉ̌’ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ Míŋ we la, e Ssé ge gÿo ná shú shúm sie à la le’e lénáa mbwo púɔ pé.
en: Wherefore thou art no more a servant, but a son; and if a son, then an heir of God through Christ.

ngiemboon: Pi laa tsɔ́ fʉ̀’ pi tè ne ńzsé Ssé wɔ́, ńgwɔ́ menkwɔɔn shúm sie mé kwaŋ ngie ée messé, tá’ e tè Ssé wɔ́.
en: Howbeit then, when ye knew not God, ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods.

ngiemboon: Á píŋ ńgʉa nà fʉ̀’ɔɔn pi ne ńzsé Ssé tà mèŋ n kɔ’ɔ́ fó gɔɔn pɔ́ ngie e Ssé ne ńzsé gẅí. Á piŋ ngǎ pi gíŋe ḿbiŋe nzèm, á tsɛ̀ɛ sɛ̌ shúm sie é té metʉ̀ gẅiin, ńké tè tsɔ́ mmó gẅiin? Pi kwoŋo légíŋe ḿbiŋ nzèm ńzẅíŋ menkwɔɔn mbwo pɔ́b keen?
en: But now, after that ye have known God, or rather are known of God, how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements, whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage?

ngiemboon: Pi kwé’e nzẅìŋ tsɔ́ melyɛ’ɛ́ nzse, ńkwé’e we tsɔ́ mesaŋ, ńkwé’e we tsɔ́ mefʉ̀’ʉ lá’ laa we tsɔ́ mé ngù’ tɛ’.
en: Ye observe days, and months, and times, and years.

ngiemboon: M bɔgɔ́ mmó gie pi ne ńgÿo lɛ, ńgwɔ́ mefà’ mie mèŋ n ka fa’a tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi cʉa sẅɛ̀ɛ.
en: I am afraid of you, lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ́ pɔ́ɔn, mèŋ sẅiŋté gẅi tɛ’, ńgie pi gʉa nà menò*lepʉ̌ ḿbí fʉ̀’ ná mèŋ. Á gʉa mǒ, mbà mèŋ n déen ńcʉ́’ pá’ pi la wɔ́. Á laa fʉ̀’ gie n daa tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi ńně shwóŋó gẅi nò Ssé, pi tè gÿo nò tepòŋ ná mèŋ pɛ́’ɛ̀ wɔ́.
en: Brethren, I beseech you, be as Iam; for Iamas yeare: ye have not injured me at all.

ngiemboon: Pi kímte ngie ammó gie á là gÿo n tsẅi nkʉ̀ mbòŋo mbwo pi à mvɔ́g mvfò fʉ̀’ gie n da tóo mbʉ̀a pi á laa pá’ n da ne ńguɔ.
en: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first.

ngiemboon: Á laa fʉ’ó, mbà guɔ cǔɔ wɔ̀ɔn tɛ’ tà mèŋ m bú ḿbÿɔ́g. Tá pi ké tè wɔ̀ɔn nyìŋe, ńké tè wɔ̀ɔn gwá’. Tà ńcʉ́’ pú’u, mbà pi la kúe wɔ̀ɔn pɔ́ pá’*cÿɔ́’ Ssé, kà pɔ́ pá’ Yěsô Kristo wɔ́ la.
en: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not, nor rejected; but received me as an angel of God,evenas Christ Jesus.

ngiemboon: Lekág gẅie à laa ntʉ́m pi, à kéen ḿpfó nzɔ̌? Mèŋ n ku’u légɔɔn ngie á la pé’e ńgwaa ńgwɔ́ pi tsɔ́’ menÿɔ́g mí ńdɔg ńkúbe mɔ́ɔn, mbà pi la tsɔ́’ ńdɔg ńkúbe fʉ’ó.
en: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of? for I bear you record, that, ifit had beenpossible, ye would have plucked out your own eyes, and have given them to me.

ngiemboon: Áa fʉ̀’ɔɔn, mbà mèŋ n kéen ńcʉ́’ʉ ngàŋ mbù gẅi á nue mèŋ n kě ne shwóŋó gẅi pɔ́ nò nénʉ́ keen?
en: Am I therefore become your enemy, because I tell you the truth?

ngiemboon: Pi ne ńgyá ngie pàzí’i gẅi menò ŋwɛ́ ne ńkwoŋo gẅi tɛ’, tá’ nkwaŋá gẅie pɔ́ gẅiin ná pi é té we mbòŋo wɔ́. Pɔ́ fa’a pɔ́ léfó nzèm mèŋ ńkẅile gẅi pi cʉ́’ʉ ńkwoŋo pɔ́ wɔ́b.
en: They zealously affect you,butnot well; yea, they would exclude you, that ye might affect them.

ngiemboon: Tá á gʉa ná mèŋ, mèŋ n kwoŋo gẅí, tà ńgwɔ́ pi jÿó pì yɔ́ɔn ngwòŋ fʉ̀’ ntsèm, tà á le gwɔ́ pɔ́ ndà’ fʉ̀’ gie mèŋ n gee tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi wɔ́.
en: Butit isgood to be zealously affected always inagoodthing, and not only when I am present with you.

ngiemboon: Egubé yɔ́ɔn, n gǐŋ ne ńgyá ngɔ́’ sẅe sẅe nà pi pɔ́ pá’ manzwě gẅie à ne ńdúme ńgee ńzyé la. Mèŋ n ge ké gyá ngɔ́’ pɔ́ pú’u, tà kú fʉ̀’ gie pi cʉ̌’ kwà’ pʉ̀a Kristo.
en: My little children, of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you,

ngiemboon: Áa fʉ̀’ɔɔn pá’ɔɔn mèŋ n ne ńtsɔ́ɔn tɛ’ légwɔ́ tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, tá ńzsé ntí gie ńgwɔ́ n dɔg shwóŋó gẅi nò pú’u. Á nue n ne ńkwaŋte menò mí ńcʉ́’ʉ ḿbɔ́gɔ pɔ̌g.
en: I desire to be present with you now, and to change my voice; for I stand in doubt of you.

ngiemboon: Pi pie pi ne ńkwoŋo ngie*lepʉ̌ sá’a gẅí, pi shwóŋó wɔ̀ɔn: Pi tè ne ńjú’u mmó gie*lepʉ̌ ŋwɛ́ gɔɔn wɔ́ ka?
en: Tell me, ye that desire to be under the law, do ye not hear the law?

ngiemboon: Mé la ŋwe’e tsɛ̀ɛ ŋwà’ne*lepʉ̌ ŋwɛ́ ngie: Ábalam la gẅiin gubé yépʉ́a, tà’ gwɔ́ gẅie à la zyé ná manzwé gẅie à laa nkwɔɔn, wetsɔ̌ gwɔ́ gẅie à la zyé ná manzwě gẅie à la tá.
en: For it is written, that Abraham had two sons, the one by a bondmaid, the other by a freewoman.

ngiemboon: Míŋ nkwɔɔn laa gẅie pʉ̀a mesoŋ la kwoŋ kwoŋ ńzyé yé. Míŋ manzwě gẅie à la tá gwɔ́ gẅie mé la gwaa zyé yé á gwɔ́ pɔ́ nò gie e Ssé la ka’.
en: But hewho wasof the bondwoman was born after the flesh; but he of the freewomanwasby promise.

ngiemboon: Yɔɔn nò ngwɔ́ mé gíŋ ńjú’u nà tsɔ́ shÿó. Panzwě pɔɔn mépʉ́a lɔgɔ ńnyɛɛ*kʉ̀a sépʉ́a. Ndùŋ mvfò*kʉ̀a gwɔ́ gie á la fó ndùm lekwɔ’ɔ́ Sinay. Yɛ̌*kʉ̀a gÿo, mé zyé gubé é gwɔ́ pɔ́ menkwɔɔn. Á lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ Agar.
en: Which things are an allegory: for these are the two covenants; the one from the mount Sinai, which gendereth to bondage, which is Agar.

ngiemboon: Á gíŋ ńgwɔ́ ngie lezíŋ Agar tsẅé’e nà se sinay, é lekwɔ’ɔ́ sie ée Arabia. Agar lɔgɔ pá’ɔɔn ńgwɔ́ tÿǒsoŋo Yerósalem ye fʉ̀’ɔɔn, á gie pâ pʉ̀a pé metsèm gwɔ́ pɔ́ menkwɔɔn*lepʉ̌.
en: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia, and answereth to Jerusalem which now is, and is in bondage with her children.

ngiemboon: Tá’ Yerósalem we tÿǒ lepwó à tè nkwɔɔn wɔ́, yé zɔɔ má wege.
en: But Jerusalem which is above is free, which is the mother of us all.

ngiemboon: Á nue gubé manzwě gẅie mé la gwá’a ye ge gyɔ́ɔn cʉa pe manzwě gẅie à gẅiin ndǔm.
en: For the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ́ pɔ́ɔn, á gʉa ná pi, mbà pi ee gubé gie mé la zyé wɔ́b á nà ntí gie Ssé la ka’, é ndʉŋ ndʉŋ pá’ Esâg la.
en: Now we, brethren, as Isaac was, are the children of promise.

ngiemboon: Tá’ pá’ á laa tsɔ́ fʉ̀’, múɔ gẅie mé la kwoŋ kwoŋ ńzyé ne ńkʉ́e gẅie Zẅìge Ssé zɔ̌ la gÿo tá mé zyé yé la, á gíŋ ńgwɔ́ lyɛ̌’ɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ pú’u.
en: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted himthat was bornafter the Spirit, even soit isnow.

ngiemboon: Aŋwà’ne Ssé zɔɔn ńgɔɔn ngie kɔ́ lɛ? Á gɔɔn ngie: Jwoŋo manzwě gẅie aa nkwɔɔn pɔ́ míŋ we. Á nue míŋ nkwɔɔn tè gẅiin tsɔ́ nò nà tÿɔgɔ́ tá wɔb pá’ míŋ manzwě gẅie mé la tá wɔ́.
en: Nevertheless what saith the scripture? Cast out the bondwoman and her son: for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ́ pɔ́ɔn, áa mmó gie á gÿo pege té gubé manzwě gẅie aa nkwɔɔn wɔ́, pege gwɔ̌ pɔ́ gubé manzwě gẅie mé la tá.
en: So then, brethren, we are not children of the bondwoman, but of the free.

ngiemboon: Kristo la zá’ nkÿo pu’ lóŋ pege légwɔ́ gie pege ge gwɔ́ pʉ̀a pie é kwǎ’ ńtsẅɛ́ nkwɔɔn*lepʉ̌. Pú’u la, pi kú’te wɛ̌ légwɔ́ mboŋó, ḿbɔ́ɔn légíŋe ńzẅíŋ atsɔ́ mmó gíŋe ńdɔgɔ gẅi ńgÿo menkwɔɔn.
en: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ Pɔl, tà mèŋ shwóŋó gẅí. Pi lɔɔn ńzɛ́te ngie mé pú’u gẅí, tá pi gwɔ́ pʉ̀a Ssé, mbà mmó gie Kristo la gÿo ńtí twó sí té gíŋe kẅéte gẅi nà tsɔ́ mmó wɔ́.
en: Behold, I Paul say unto you, that if ye be circumcised, Christ shall profit you nothing.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ge gíŋe gɔɔn nà tsɔ́ légʉa á mbwo wɛ̌ nyìŋ wɔ́ gẅie à zɛ́te ngie mé pú’u yé, ngie à gẅiin légÿo shúm ntsèm sie*lepʉ̌ Mǒsê ne ńzɛ́te.
en: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised, that he is a debtor to do the whole law.

ngiemboon: Pi pie pi ne fa’a légÿo shúm sie*lepʉ̌ ŋwɛ́ ne ńzɛ́te tá lɔg ku’ pʉ̀a pie ée mvfò Ssé ńgwɔ́ ndʉŋ ndʉŋ, pi ee pɛ́’ɛ̀ ńdɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ pʉ̀a pie pi fǎg nnɛ́ ná Kristo. Á gwɔ́ pú’u pi lɔgɔ sɔ́ɔn nò gie e Ssé kɔ’ɔ́ lɔg cÿó gʉm gí cÿó.
en: Christ is become of no effect unto you, whosoever of you are justified by the law; ye are fallen from grace.

ngiemboon: Á gʉa ná peg pie peg záb ntʉ́m ná Kristo, peg ne ńjú’u nò pɔ́ mbwo Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a, á ne ńgÿo peg ne ńzẅí’te ngie e Ssé ge gÿo gÿo peg gwɔ́ pʉ̀a pie ée mvfò ye ńgwɔ́ ndʉŋ ndʉŋ.
en: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith.

ngiemboon: Á nue nyìŋ lɔɔn ńda nnɛ́ ná Kristo, mbà mé lépú’u yé kà lényé té pú’u yé wɔ́, á té tsɔ́ nò wɔ́. Lezǎb ntʉ́m ná Kristo ḿbiŋ ńkwoŋ pʉ̀a mesoŋ zɔɔ nò.
en: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.

ngiemboon: Pi ka ne ńgee lê mvfò kwà’ mboŋó, awɔ̌ tɔ́’ɔ gẅi légíŋe ńjú’u nò gie áa nénʉ́ ńtÿɔ́gɔ kwò mǒ?
en: Ye did run well; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth?

ngiemboon: Wɛ̌ véle gẅie mé la shwóŋó gẅi tà pi zẅíŋ, à lɔ̌ɔn tě fóo mbwo Ssé gẅie à ne ńtóŋo gẅi wɔ́.
en: This persuasioncomethnot of him that calleth you.

ngiemboon: Pi lɔɔn ḿbɔ́ɔn té pòŋ á kẅɛɛ kwóonte gẅie à ne fa’a leneŋé.
en: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump.

ngiemboon: Tá’ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a kě ne ńgÿo mèŋ n zsé ngie pi tè kẅi’i tsɔ́ mmó nà mmó gie n da zí’i gẅi wɔ́. N giŋé ně ńzsé ngie nyìŋ gẅie à ne ḿma’a tág tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, à lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ wɔ̌ wɔ́ɔ, mbà Ssé ge gÿo zá’ ntsaŋ ye.
en: I have confidence in you through the Lord, that ye will be none otherwise minded: but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment, whosoever he be.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ́ pɔ́ɔn, n gwé’e ńgíŋe ne sá’a ngie pʉ̀a gÿo mé pú’u wɔ́b, mbà pà Yuda gíŋe ńkʉ́e wɔ̀ɔn mélà’a kɔ́? Mbà le gwɔ́ gẅie Kristo la kwé nà tÿǒ nkǐ à tè gíŋe ńgege wɔ́b gwɔ́.
en: And I, brethren, if I yet preach circumcision, why do I yet suffer persecution? then is the offence of the cross ceased.

ngiemboon: Á gʉa ná pʉ̀a pie é pue gẅi nà nò lépú’u nyìŋ, pɔ́ lɔgɔ nò yɔ́b ńgee mvfò, tà kwà’ pɔ́b sele shʉʉ twó mbùm yɔ́b.
en: I would they were even cut off which trouble you.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ́ pɔ́ɔn, á gʉa ná pi, mbà Ssé la tóŋo gẅi pá’ pi ge tsẅɛ́ nkwɔɔn*lepʉ̌. Tá’ tà pi zẅɛ’ pú’u, ńgÿo mmó gie mbùm gi zɔ sá’a gwí pi gÿo. Tà ńcʉ́’ pú’u, pi lɔg pá’ nkwòŋe ee tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi ńkẅéte mennɛ́ mí.
en: For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; onlyusenot liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.

ngiemboon: Á nue anò gie á pú ńkwɛ́ metwó menò mie ée tsɛ̀ɛ*lepʉ̌ gɔɔn ngie: Kwoŋo fɛ́ gù nyìŋ mesoŋ pá’ twó mbùm jú.
en: For all the law is fulfilled in one word,evenin this; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.

ngiemboon: Tá ńgwɔ́ gie pi lɔɔn ne ńgÿo pá’ menɔ̀ɔn mbà’ pie ée ssé ne ńdúmte membùm mɔ́b, ńnéŋe mefʉ̌ŋ, pi laga twó gí, á nue pi ee pú’u, ńcʉ́’ʉ fa’a pɔ́ lécʉŋte mennɛ́ mí.
en: But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed that ye be not consumed one of another.

ngiemboon: N ge gɔɔn né pi ngie: Pi zẅíŋ Zẅìge Ssé zɔ tsyeen gẅi nà gẅi le gwɔ́, pú’u pi é légÿo menò tepòŋ mie mbùm gí tsóte gẅi ngie pi gÿo wɔ́.
en: ThisI say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.

ngiemboon: Á nue menò mie mbùm nyìŋ mesoŋ tsóte yé ngie à gÿo é té mie Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a ne ńkwoŋo ngie à gÿo wɔ́. Menò mie Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a ne ńkwoŋo é té mie mbùm nyìŋ mesoŋ kwoŋ wɔ́, pɔ́ mépʉ́a lɔgɔ ńdʉ’ʉ lʉ’ʉ. Áa yɛ̌ tá pi tè gẅiin légÿo mmó gie pi kwǒŋ wɔ́.
en: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.

ngiemboon: Tá pi lɔɔn ńzẅíŋ Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a ne ńtsyeen gẅí, mbà*lepʉ̌ té gíŋe ńgẅiin lésá’a gẅi wɔ́.
en: But if ye be led of the Spirit, ye are not under the law.

ngiemboon: Mé ne ńkwa’a ńzsé menò mie mbùm nnɛ́ nyìŋ mesoŋ tsóte yé á fʉa, anò pá’ le tǒŋ pànzwě kà léfa’ mbàŋa wɔ́, anò pá’ legÿo menò ncÿǒ, anò pá’ nyìŋ letÿɔ̌g ntʉ́m wé pɔ́ nà nò mpfwɔ́’.
en: Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which arethese; Adultery, fornication, uncleanness, lasciviousness,

ngiemboon: Pá’ legù’te shúm ngie ee messé, pá’ legẅiin lekàŋ, pá’ lekua mbù, pá’ letǎg melà’, pá’ legẅiin kègɔ́’, pá’ lecÿɔ́g, pá’ lefa’ pɔ́ letyé mvfò nà kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ, pá’ leneŋé fàgte fàgte, pá’ letuŋ metuŋ.
en: idolatry, witchcraft, hatred, variance, emulations, wrath, strife, seditions, heresies,

ngiemboon: Pá’ letÿɔ̌g lejÿɔ́g nà shúm pʉ̀a, pá’ lenǔ melù’ tà ḿbʉ́a, pá’ lecu’té nà línɔ́ɔn lépfɛ́ shúm ńgÿo menò shʉ́, mbɔɔ pá’ legÿo tsɔ́ shúm sie é sẅé sie mé tʉ̌ lɔɔn. N ka zɔɔn shwóŋó gẅí, n ge gíŋe shwóŋó gẅi ngie: Pʉ̀a pie é gÿo yɔɔn ntí menò té lá’ gẅiin jʉ’ nà nò*lefùɔ Ssé wɔ́.
en: envyings, murders, drunkenness, revellings, and such like: of the which I tell you before, as I have also toldyouin time past, that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God.

ngiemboon: Tá’, menò mbòŋo mie Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a gÿo nyìŋ gÿo é mɔɔn ńgwɔ́ légẅiin nkwòŋe, ńgwɔ́ léńnéŋe nê lekág, ńgwɔ́ léńnéŋe lésẅete, ńgwɔ́ légẅiin kwɔ́gɔ nnɛ́, ńgwɔ́ létyé lékẅéte pʉ̀a, ńgwɔ́ légẅiin pòŋo ntʉ́m, ńgwɔ́ léńnéŋe té gwɔ́ ngàŋ mepàb,
en: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,

ngiemboon: ńgwɔ́ lépʉ́le, ńgwɔ́ lékú’te mbùm. Áa kwà’ nénʉ́,*lepʉ̌ té lʉ’ sɔɔn shúm wɔ́.
en: meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.

ngiemboon: Pʉ̀a pie ée pe Yěsô Kristo léen ńgwá’ shúm tepòŋ sie é póŋ mbùm nnɛ́ yɔb, lâ sie mbùm nnɛ́ ŋwɛ́ zɔ tsɔ̌ɔn, tá á gwɔ́ pɔ́ pá’ fʉ̀’ gie pɔ́ léen ńkim mbùm nnɛ́ ŋwɛ́ nà tÿǒ nkǐ la.
en: And they that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts.

ngiemboon: Pá’ wege le gwɔ́ we fʉ̀’ɔɔn foo pɔ́ mbwo Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a la, pege giŋe ná ntí gie Zẅìge ŋwɛ́ ne ńnyɛɛ wégè.
en: If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.

ngiemboon: Tà pege ŋá’te nnɛ́, tà pege tág melà’ tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege, tà pege gẅiin kègɔ́’ tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege.
en: Let us not be desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying one another.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ́ mefɛ́, pi lɔɔn ńkeme nyìŋ á ne fʉa nò, pi lɔg pá’ pi ne ńjú’u mbwo Zẅìge Ssé ńgÿo ngàŋ piŋe ná mánzsè gẅie aa ndʉŋ ndʉŋ. Tá ńcʉ́’ʉ légÿo ńdɔg pɔ́ mbʉ́lè. Wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ ná pi wɔ́ piŋ ḿbɔ́ɔn twó yé ḿbɔ́gɔ légwɔ́ gie à ge gwe yé tsɛ̀ɛ nkwà’te.
en: Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.

ngiemboon: Pi kaa menò mí ḿbi’ ńkẅéte. Pi lɔɔn ńgÿo pú’u, mbà pi gÿǒ mmó gie*lepʉ̌ Kristo ne ńzɛ́te.
en: Bear ye one another's burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńkwaŋ ngie aa mmó, té gwɔ́ yɛ̌ mmó, mbà à sele fʉte twó mbùm yé.
en: For if a man think himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceiveth himself.

ngiemboon: Wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ ke ńtsa’ kwà’ mé mefà’. À lɔɔn ńtsa’, ńgyá ngie ńgwɔ́ nò poŋo yé mǒ, mbà á póŋ ngie anò gwaa poŋo yé ńtí pɔ́ nue ée kwà’ mefà’ mé. Tà á le gwaa poŋo yé ńtí pɔ́ pá’ à lʉŋté mɛ̌ mefà’ ná me petsɔ́ pʉ̀a wɔ́,
en: But let every man prove his own work, and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone, and not in another.

ngiemboon: á nue wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ gẅiin léfa’ mé mefà’ mie e Ssé la cʉ́me mbwo ye.
en: For every man shall bear his own burden.

ngiemboon: Á póŋ ngie nyìŋ gẅie mé ne ńzí’i yé nò Ssé à gab shúm sé ńná se nyìŋ gẅie à ne ńzí’i yé.
en: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things.

ngiemboon: Tà nyìŋ sele fʉte twó mbùm yé, mé ee ntě ńgwága Ssé wɔ́. Nyìŋ lɔɔn ḿbye kɔ́ wɔ́, mbà à ge lá’ káb pɔ́ yɛ̌.
en: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.

ngiemboon: À lɔɔn ḿbye shúm sie é póŋ mbùm nnɛ́ ye, mbà shúm mbùm nnɛ́ ŋwɛ́ ge lá’ gÿo à kwé ḿbyé. Tá ńgwɔ́ gie à lɔɔn ḿbye shúm sie é póŋo Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a, mbà Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a ge lá’ gÿo à gẅiin le gwɔ́ tèmì.
en: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.

ngiemboon: Tà pege ke ńkʉ́a legÿo nò mbòŋo, á nue pege lɔɔn gÿo nò mbòŋo ńdɔg ńgʉa pɔ́ lé mvfò, mbà fʉ̀’ ge lá’ ku’, e Ssé gÿo pege lág shúm tɛ’.
en: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, pege lɔɔn ńnyé ńgẅiin shÿó, pege gÿo nò mbòŋo mbwo pʉ̀a metsèm, ńtʉʉ lelÿò ńgÿo mbwo mefɛ́ mefɛ́ pie pega pɔ́ pǔ ńzába ntʉ́m ná Kristo.
en: As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto allmen, especially unto them who are of the household of faith.

ngiemboon: Pi gyá pá’ mɔɔn menÿɔ́g ŋwà’ne ge fáŋte fáŋte. Kwà’ mèŋ Pɔl zɔ lɔgɔ́ pwó yɔ́ɔn ńŋwe’e yɔɔn jʉ’!
en: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand.

ngiemboon: Pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ sẅɛ́ɛ gẅi sẅɛ́ ngie pi zẅíŋ mé pú’u gẅí, ée pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ fa’a pɔ́ légÿo mmó gie á ge poŋ pà Yuda. Pɔ́ gÿo pú’u, ńtsɔ́ɔn ngie pà Yuda té kʉ́e wɔ́b ngie pɔ́ tyé yɔ́b pɔ́ nà nò legwé Kristo nà tÿǒ nkǐ wɔ́.
en: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh, they constrain you to be circumcised; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ.

ngiemboon: Pʉ̀a pie é sẅɛ́ɛ gẅi pú’u, kwà’ pɔ́b yɔ́b zɔ́ɔn fó tè kú’te*lepʉ̌ pà Yuda ntsèm wɔ́. Tá ńké ne ńkwoŋo pɔ́ ngie mé pú’u gẅi pú’. Pú’u pɔ́ lɔg pá’ pɔ́ gÿǒ tà mé pú’u gẅí, ńdɔg ńŋá’te mvfò pà Yuda,
en: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law; but desire to have you circumcised, that they may glory in your flesh.

ngiemboon: ńgʉa ná mèŋ, mbà mmó gie á lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ n dɔg ńŋá’te, á gwɔ́ pɔ́ pá’ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Kristo la kwé nà tÿǒ nkǐ la. Pá’à la kwé nà tÿǒ nkǐ lá, eshúm yɔɔn njÿó ée lejʉ́ŋ mèŋ ńcʉ́’ pɔ́ pfó shúm, á gʉa ná mèŋ n gwɔ́ mbwo pɔ́b, mbà mèŋ n déen ńkwé.
en: But God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.

ngiemboon: Áa mbwo Ssé*lepu’ú nyìŋ, kà lényé ngàŋ té pú’ wɔ́, à tè kẅéte. Anò gie á kẅéte á gwɔ́ pá’ nyìŋ léen sele ńcʉ́’ʉ nyìŋ sẅé.
en: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature.

ngiemboon: E Ssé nyɛ ngie ntʉ́m wé ée mbòŋ, ḿbiŋ ńnéŋe sẅétè tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m pʉ̀a metsèm pie ée gÿo jú’ wɔɔn ntÿɔgɔ́ we sẅé, é tÿɔ́gɔ kwò mǒ, mbɔɔ mbwo pʉ̀a Ssé tà mag.
en: And as many as walk according to this rule, peacebeon them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.

ngiemboon: Tà fó lyɛ̌’ɔɔn, ḿbɔ́ɔn nyìŋ lélá’ ńgíŋe ńdɔgɔ yɔɔn nò ńgege wɔ̀ɔn. Melagá fʉ̌ŋ mie mèŋ n gẅiin é la’te ngie mèŋ n gwɔ́ pɔ́ nyìŋ Yěsô.
en: From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ́ mefɛ́, Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Kristo ne ńgwɔ́ né pi, á tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m pi.*Amen.
en: Unto the Galatians written from Rome.

ngiemboon: Yɔɔn ŋwà’ne fóo mbwo mèŋ pɔl, e Ssé la kwoŋ ngie n gwɔ́ ngàŋ ntúm Yěsô Kristo. Mèŋ n náa mbwo pi pʉ̀a Ssé pie pi ńnéŋe Efeso, mbà pi la záb ntʉ́m ná Yěso Kristo, ńké ńzsé pɔ́ ndà’ nò yé.
en: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, to the saints which are at Ephesus, and to the faithful in Christ Jesus:

ngiemboon: Tá wege Ssé mbɔɔ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Yěsô Kristo ne ńgwɔ́ né pi, ńne ńnéŋe sẅétè ntʉ́m pi.
en: gracebeto you, and peace, from God our Father, andfromthe Lord Jesus Christ.

ngiemboon: !Pege nê ńgu’te Ssé Tá pà Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Kristo. À la gÿo nò mbòŋo ná pege, ńná shúm mbòŋo ntsèm sie éfóo tàa tÿǒ né pege, ńná pú’u, ńcʉa ná pá’ à la lá’ ńtemte wégè lâ Kristo,
en: Blessedbethe God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenlyplacesin Christ:

ngiemboon: mbà à la cʉa ná Kristo ńtsɔ́’ɔ wégè, ńdɔg ńgÿo pʉ̀a pé tà fó ńnyé pɔ́ tè nyɛte njÿó pá’ pege ge gwɔ́ mvfò yé é gwɔ́ pʉ̀a ndʉalʉ̌a, é gwɔ́ pàtèfʉa. Á la lɔg pá’ à kwoŋo wégè,
en: according as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love:

ngiemboon: ńzáb tà tyě sǎg tɛ’ ngie à ge cʉa ná Yěsô Kristo é gÿo pege cʉ́’ púɔ pé. Á gwɔ́ pɔ́ we lekwoŋ, ńké ḿboŋo yé tɛ’.
en: having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his will,

ngiemboon: À la lɔgɔ wégè ńgÿo púɔ pé le gwɔ́ gie pege ge gu’te yé ná máa nò té fʉ̀’ gẅie à la gÿo. Á la cʉa ná pá’ à la temte wégà Míŋ we gẅie à kwoŋe yé tɛ’, ńcÿó gʉm yégè, pú’u á gwɔ́ kwà’ máamaa nò tɛ’.
en: to the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved.

ngiemboon: Míŋ we ŋwɛ́ la lɔg metse mé ńdɔg ńcu’u wégè, pege tsẅɛ́. E Ssé lege mefʉa mégè ńnáa mbwo pege. Yɔɔn áa nò té fʉ̀’ gie e Ssé la lɔg ńcÿó gʉm yégè,
en: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;

ngiemboon: áa fù’ gie à la náa mbwo pege tà á gyɔ́ɔn gyɔ̌ɔn, ńgwɔ náa, ńtsɔ́’ legyè ségè pege zsé nò.
en: wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence;

ngiemboon: Áa yɛ̌ tá pege zsé mmó gie à la záb, mbà á la zɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ lelyěen. Yɛ̌ mmó gwɔ́ gie à la tʉ́ njÿó, á poŋo yé poŋ, á záb ngie à ge lá’ lɔgɔ Kristo é gÿo à pumte,
en: having made known unto us the mystery of his will, according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself:

ngiemboon: ńgwɔ́ ngie à fʉ̀’ ge lá’ gwɔ́ tà ku’, yé Ssé cú’te shúm ntsèm sie ée tÿǒ lepwó lâ sie ée ndùme ssé tsetsá’, é ná ntsèm ntsèm mbwo Kristo à ne sá’a pɔ́ gílé ye.
en: that in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ, both which are in heaven, and which are on earth;evenin him:

ngiemboon: Peg la zẅɛ́’ pɔ́ pá’ peg lǎ nnɛ́ ná Kristo, tá ńgẅiin yég jʉ’ tsetsɛ̀ɛ pʉ̀a pie à gÿǒ pɔ́ tsẅɛ́, á nue e Ssé la tʉ́ njÿó ńtsɔ́’ɔ wég. Á gwɔ́ pá’ a la záb. E Ssé piŋ ńgÿo kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ pɔ́ pá’ à la záb ngie à ge gÿo pú’u.
en: in whom also we have obtained an inheritance, being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will:

ngiemboon: À lɔ̌ɔn ńtsɔ́’ɔ wégè pú’u, le gwɔ́ gie peg pie peg ka vɔgɔ lézáb ntʉ́m nà Kristo, peg ge gu’te yé Ssé á nue à gú’ tɛ’.
en: that we should be to the praise of his glory, who first trusted in Christ.

ngiemboon: Á gʉa ná pi gí, mbà pi ka jú’u shwóŋè gie áa ye nénʉ́, é gwɔ́ nkʉ̀ mbòŋo gẅie e Ssé ka cʉa pɔ́ mǒ tá ńgÿo pi tsẅɛ́. Pi ka jú’ pú’u, ńzáb tʉ́m gẅi ná Kristo, e Ssé cÿɔ’ɔ liŋé yé ná pi, ńdɔgɔ ńnyɛɛ ngie pi ee pʉ̀a pé. Yɛ̌ liŋé gwɔ́ Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a gie à la ka’ ngie à ge náa mbwo pege.
en: In whom ye alsotrusted, after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise,

ngiemboon: A Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ zyè ssé nà fù’ gie e Ssé la cwoŋte ńzáb lénáa mbwo pʉ̀a pé. E Ssé lɔgɔ ńnyɛte shwóŋó wégè ngie pege ge lá’ gẅiin setsɔ́ á fʉ̀’ gie à ge lá’ pú kẅile wégè nà nò tepòŋ. Pá’ áa pú’u la, pege ne ńgu’te Ssé á nue à gú’ tɛ’.
en: which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.

ngiemboon: Pá’ mèŋ n ka jú’ ngie pi ne ńkẅi’i ńzába ntʉ́m gẅi ná Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Yěsô, ńgíŋe ńjú’ ngie pi ne ńkwoŋo pʉ̀a Ssé métsèm lá,
en: Wherefore I also, after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus, and love unto all the saints,

ngiemboon: mèŋ n gee fʉ̀’ ntsèm ńně sẅíŋte Ssé, ḿbiŋe síe yé nà twó sí.
en: cease not to give thanks for you, making mention of you in my prayers;

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne sẅíŋte e Ssé Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Kristo, yé Tá gẅie à gẅiin legú’, ngie à náa gẅi zsé nò, ńnáa gẅi shÿó lélɔg ńcwoŋo ńzsé yé tà shwóŋó nò.
en: that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him:

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n giŋé ne sẅíŋte yé, ngie à gÿo ntʉ́m gẅi zsé kyɛ̀’ yé légwɔ́ gie pi ge cwoŋo zsé mmó gie à lɔ̌ɔn ńtóŋo gẅi ńtí yɛ̌. Mbɔɔ pá’ pi ge zsé máamaa fù’u mbòŋo gie pia petsɔ́ pʉ̀a pie à la tsɔ́’ɔ wɔ́b ge gÿo kẅé, á gwɔ́ mmó gie à la cwoŋte ńzáb né pi.
en: the eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n giŋé ne sẅíŋte yé ngie à gÿo pi zsé ngie metʉ̀ mé pú fáŋ ńcʉa metʉ̀ ntsèm, mbɔɔ ngie à gÿo pi zsé pá’ mɛ̌ metʉ̀ tóonte wégè pàzáb ntʉ́m ná ye pú’u.
en: and whatisthe exceeding greatness of his power to us-ward who believe, according to the working of his mighty power,

ngiemboon: Mɛ̌ metʉ̀ ée mie e Ssé la lɔg ńgÿo Kristo zíme tsetsɛ̀ɛ mepfó, á lɔg ńgÿo á kwɔ́’ né tÿǒ lepwó ńnéŋe nà gwoŋó pwó yé, ye tʉ̀.
en: which he wrought in Christ, when he raised him from the dead, and sethimat his own right hand in the heavenlyplaces,

ngiemboon: Á gwɔ́ jʉ’ó ńdɔgɔ ḿbú ńcʉa ngwòŋ*mecÿɔ́’ Ssé pâ mefùɔ pɔ́b mbɔɔ setsɔ́ shúm sie é gẅiin metʉ̀ tÿǒ lepwó. Á cʉa mânyìŋ ntsèm tà pá’ angàŋ lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ wɔ̌ wɔ́ɔ, kà pɔ́ ná yɔɔn kème njÿó wɔ́ɔ, kà pɔ́ ná gie á ge lá’ tá tó wɔ́ɔ.
en: far above all principality, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come:

ngiemboon: E Ssé léen ńnéŋ shúm ntsèm á mbwo yé. E Ssé la gwɔ́ tà ńnéŋe kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ nà mbwo mé, ńgÿo á gwɔ́ mbwo cú’tè pʉ̀a Ssé, ńgwɔ́ twó, légwɔ́ gie pʉ̀a cú’tè ge ne jú’u ncwò yé.
en: and hath put allthingsunder his feet, and gave himto bethe head over allthingsto the church,

ngiemboon: Acú’tè pʉ̀a Ssé ée mbùm nnɛ́ Kristo. Áa tsɛ̀ɛ cú’tè pʉ̀a pé fʉ̀’ ntsèm, yé gẅie à pǔ ńgwɔ́ jʉ’ ntsèm tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó.
en: which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.

ngiemboon: Pi laa tsɔ́ fʉ̀’ ńgwɔ́ mbwo Ssé, mbà pi léen ńkwé ńtí pá’ pi láa ngàŋa mefʉa ńgíŋ ńgwɔ́ pàgÿo menò tepòŋ.
en: And youhath he quickened, who were dead in trespasses and sins;

ngiemboon: Pi laa fʉ̀’o ńně ńgÿo pɔ́ yɛ̌ ntí menò. Pi la ne ńgiŋe pá’ pʉ̀a pie ée tsɛ̀ɛ yɔɔn njÿó ne ńgiŋe pú’u, ńně ńjú’u ncwò fùɔ*messé tepòŋ gwie à sá’a*messé tepòŋ mie ée tÿǒ tsɛ̀ɛ fÿág. Yé zɔ aa fʉ̀’ɔɔn ńne ńtsóte pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ lʉ’ʉ lé jú’ ncwò Ssé, pɔ́ ne ńgÿo menò tepòŋ.
en: wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world, according to the prince of the power of the air, the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience:

ngiemboon: Pege metsèm ka zɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ pá’ pɔ́b, ńne ńgÿo pɔ́ mmó gie ntʉ́m nyìŋ mesoŋ ne ńtsɔ́ɔn, éshúm sie ntʉ́m nyìŋ mesoŋ lâ nkwaŋá wé tyé mǒ, mbà mé la zyé wégè pege gwɔ́ pɔ́ pʉ̀a pie e Ssé ne ńgyáŋa lóŋ ná pɔ́b pá’ à ne ńgyáŋa lóŋ ná petsɔ́ pʉ̀a.
en: among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh, fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind; and were by nature the children of wrath, even as others.

ngiemboon: Tá’ e Ssé kě ńtsɔ́ɔn mezìŋe pʉ̀a mesoŋ tɛ’. Á la piŋ ńcʉa pɔ́ nà ntí gie à la lɔg ńkwoŋo wégè,
en: But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us,

ngiemboon: á gÿo pega Kristo pú ńgíŋe ńgwɔ́ wó, tà mbɔɔ pá’ pege laa mbwo ye tsɔ́ fʉ̀’, mbà pege léen ńkwé ńtí mefʉ̀a mégè. À la lɔg pɔ́ pòŋo ntʉ́m yé ńgÿo pege tsẅɛ́.
en: even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;)

ngiemboon: Pá’ pege léen ńda nnɛ́ ná Yěsô Kristo la, à la pú ńzíme wégà pɔ̌ nà legwé, ńgíŋe ńgÿo peg cʉ́me nzèm Yěsô Kristo, pega pɔ̌ pú ńkwɔ́’ ńnéŋe tÿǒ lepwó ńně sá’a kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ wɔ́.
en: and hath raisedusup together, and madeussit together in heavenlyplacesin Christ Jesus:

ngiemboon: À la gÿo mɔɔn menò pá’ à ge lá’ lɔg la’te ná yɛ̌ kème njÿó wɔ́ gie á ne ńtóo ngie à la cÿó gʉm yégè tà ńcʉa ntí, á fóo ná pá’, à cʉa nà Yěsô Kristo ńgẅiin pòŋo ntʉ́m ná pege pú’u.
en: that in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace inhiskindness toward us through Christ Jesus.

ngiemboon: À la cÿó gʉm gí, ńgÿo pi tsẅɛ́, éfóo ná pá’ pi la záb ntʉ́m ná Yěsô. Á té fóo né pi wɔ́, à la lɔg pɔ́ pòŋo ntʉ́m yé ńgÿo.
en: For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves:it isthe gift of God:

ngiemboon: Á gwɔ́ pú’u, ńké těen fóo nà mefà’ mie pi fǎ’ wɔ́. Pú’u la, ńgwɔ́ nyìŋ á le lɔ́g ńŋá’te wɔ́.
en: not of works, lest any man should boast.

ngiemboon: Pege lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ kɔ́ wɔ́, mbà pege zẅɛ́’ɛ pɔ́ Ssé. E Ssé la cʉa ná Yěsô Kristo ḿbwóon wégè, légwɔ́ gie pege ge fa’ mefà’ mbòŋo mie yé Ssé la lá’ ńcwoŋte ńzáb pá’ pege ge fa’.
en: For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, pi kímte pá’ pi ka zɔɔn ńgwɔ́, mé la zyé gẅi pi tè pà Yuda pie mé pú’u wɔ́b gwɔ́, é Pà Yuda pie mé pú’u wɔ́b, pɔ́ lɔg pú’u, ńgyá ngie pɔ́ ee pʉ̀a Ssé ńcʉ́’ ńkʉ́e gẅi kʉ́e ngie pi tè pʉ̀a Ssé wɔ́, ńgɔɔn pú’u, tá lepu’ú wɔ́b ŋwɛ́ gwɔ́ pɔ́ liŋé gie mé la lɔg pɔ́ pwó ńgÿo nà mbùm yɔb.
en: Wherefore remember, that yebeingin time past Gentiles in the flesh, who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands;

ngiemboon: Pi gíŋ ńkímte ngie á kaa fʉ̀’ ayɛ̌, pi tè ne ńzsé ngie tsɔ̌ nyìŋ aa wó ńgwɔ́*Nzà’nkÿo, tà mé gẅiin lézẅí’te yé wɔ́. Pi gwɔ́ tsetsɛ̀ɛ pʉ̀a Israel ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ megʉ̀, pi tè nò nà*kʉ̀a yɔ́ba Ssé gẅiin tà mbɔɔ nà mmó gie e Ssé la ka’a mbwo pɔ́b. Pi laa gí tsɛ̀ɛ yɔɔn njÿó, pi tè ne ńzẅí’te tsɔ́ mmó wɔ́, ńgíŋe tè ne ńzsé Ssé wɔ́.
en: that at that time ye were without Christ, being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel, and strangers from the covenants of promise, having no hope, and without God in the world:

ngiemboon: Tá’, á ké ńgwɔ́ fʉ̀’ɔɔn, mbà pi pie pi kaa ngʉ̀a shʉ̀shʉ̀a, pi ka lɔg pá’ pi lǎ nnɛ́ ná Kristo. E Ssé kaa gẅi ńtÿɔ́gɔ lejʉ́ŋ ye, á nue Yěsô Kristo la pfɛte metse mé ńkwé ńtí gẅí.
en: but now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ.

ngiemboon: Kristo la kwé ńdɔg ńtágte tʉ́a nká’ gẅie à kɔ̌ɔn fege wégè. Pege zẅɛ́’ɛ pɔ́ yé ńgẅiin mbʉ́lè tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege. Mbà á kaa fʉ̀’e mvfò pà Yuda pâ pà túm gwɔ́ pɔ́ megàŋ mbù. À kéen ńtemte wégè ńdɔgɔ wégè ńgÿo pʉ̀a tà’ nyìŋ.
en: For he is our peace, who hath made both one, and hath broken down the middle wall of partitionbetween us;

ngiemboon: Yěsô ka pyág mbʉ̌ pà Yuda mie é gɔɔn ngie, gÿo yɔɔn, ńgÿo gi, tá ńdɔg ńgwɔ́ nyìŋ Ssé, ḿbyága pú’u, pá’ pʉ̀a Yuda mbɔɔ pʉ̀a pie é té pà Yuda wɔ́ ge lɔg pá’ wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ ná pɔ́b wɔ́ lǎ nnɛ́ ná Yěsô, é temte, é cʉ́’ʉ nùɔ ye sẅé. À lɔg ḿmag mbù tsetsɛ̀ɛ pɔ́b, pɔ́ ńnéŋe lè mbʉ́lè.
en: having abolished in his flesh the enmity,eventhe law of commandmentscontainedin ordinances; for to make in himself of twain one new man,somaking peace;

ngiemboon: Pá’ pege kéen ḿbú ńcʉ́’ʉ tà’ nùɔ la, á lɔgɔ ńgɔɔn ngie mbù gẅie é kaa tsetsɛ̀ɛ menùɔ mégè é kéen ḿmag. Wɛ̌ le gwɔ́ ka fó pɔ́ ná pá’ Kristo ka kwě nà tÿǒ nkǐ ńdɔg ńgÿo mbù gẅie é kaa tsetsɛ̀ɛ menùɔ mégè lâ Ssé é mag. Pege metsèm cʉ́’ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ púɔ Ssé. Yɔɔn áa mmó gie á ka mag mbù gẅie é kaa tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege.
en: and that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross, having slain the enmity thereby:

ngiemboon: Kristo la tóo létsẅi nkʉ̀ mbòŋo gẅie é náa sẅétè á mbwo pi pie pi tè pà Yuda wɔ́, mbà pi ka tè lejʉ́ŋ Ssé wɔ́, ńgíŋe ńtsẅi mbɔɔ mbwo pà Yuda pie pɔ́ kaa lejʉ́ŋ Ssé.
en: and came and preached peace to you which were afar off, and to them that were nigh.

ngiemboon: Pú’u, pi tà mbɔɔ peg pà Yuda cʉa pɔ́ ná yé Kristo, ńgee lejʉ́ŋ Ssé Tá, tà’ Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a wémɔ’ɔ́ zɔ ké ńkẅéte wégè.
en: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father.

ngiemboon: Á cʉa pú’u, pi tè gíŋe ńgwɔ́ megʉ̀ wɔ́, ńké tè gíŋe ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ pʉ̀a pie é cʉa cʉa wɔ́. Pi lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ gí pʉ̀a lá’ pá’ petsɔ́ pʉ̀a pie ée pʉ̀a Ssé. Pi lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ nà tsìŋe ndá Ssé.
en: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God;

ngiemboon: Pi cʉ̌’ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ pá’ mbelég gie mé lɔ̌g ḿbwóon ndá. Acÿó ndá gwɔ́ ngàŋ ntúm Yěsô pâ pà*ntsẅì nkʉ̀ Ssé, Yěsô Kristo lê twó yé gwɔ́ tóon gẅie à pi’ ndá.
en: and are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief cornerstone;

ngiemboon: Yé zɔ gÿo tá mesǎg ndá tyé ndʉŋ ndʉŋ, ńkwɔ́’ né tÿǒ, é gwɔ́ ndá gie e Ssé yé máŋwɛ́ ńnéŋe tsoló.
en: in whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord:

ngiemboon: Pi gí lâ petsɔ́ pʉ̀a, pi lɔg pɔ́ pá’ pi la nnɛ́ ná Kristo, tá ńgwɔ́ tsɔ́ gwǒŋo ndá ŋwɛ́, ńdɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ ndá gie mé ne ḿbwóon, á gwɔ́ jʉ’ gie e Ssé ńnéŋe wó, tá Zẅìge yé zɔ̌ gwɔ́ wó.
en: in whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit.

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿo, mèŋ Pɔl gẅie mèŋ n gee ndá tsǎŋ ńtí nue mèŋ sa’á nò Yěsô Kristo mbwo pi pie pi tè pà Yuda wɔ́, mèŋ n ne sẅíŋte Ssé fʉ̀’ ntsèm ná twó sí.
en: For this cause I Paul, the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles,

ngiemboon: Á ge gǎ wɔ́, mbà pi la jú’ ngie e Ssé zɔ la náa yɔɔn fà’ mbwo mèŋ, légwɔ́ gie mèŋ n gÿo yɔɔn fà’ pi zẅɛ́’. À lɔ̌ɔn ńdɔgɔ ńcÿó pɔ́ gʉm yɔ́ɔn.
en: if ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to you-ward:

ngiemboon: À la kyɛ́’te mmó gie á la zɔɔn ńdyeen menÿɔ́g pʉ̀a lyeen, ńnyɛɛ wɔ̀ɔn, pá’ mèŋ n zɔ̌ɔn ńŋwe’e tsɛ̀ɛ yɔɔn ŋwà’ne éshwóŋó gẅi la. Mèŋ n kaa ŋwe’e á sag wɔ́.
en: how that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery; (as I wrote afore in few words,

ngiemboon: Pi ge tóŋo yɔɔn ŋwà’ne é jú’ ntí gie mèŋ n dɔg ńzsé ntsèm gie ee nà nò Kristo.
en: whereby, when ye read, ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ)

ngiemboon: E Ssé la tè kyɛ́’te yɔɔn ntsèm ye mbwo pʉ̀a mesoŋ pe fʉ̀’ mvfò wɔ́. Á ké ńgwɔ́ fʉ̀’ɔɔn, mbà à gÿo à Zẅìge yé shʉ̀ashʉ̀a ńkyɛ́’te nò yá yɛ̌ mbwo pʉ̀a pie à la cwoŋo wɔ́b ńdɔg ńgÿo megàŋ ntúm Yěsô mbɔɔ pie à la lɔgɔ wɔ́b ńgÿo pʉ̀a pie é ge ńnéŋe tsẅii nkʉ̀ gẅie é fóo mbwo ye.
en: which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men, as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit;

ngiemboon: Ntsèm ŋwɛ́ e yɔɔn, á fó ná nkʉ̀ mbòŋo, epʉ̀a pie é té pà Yuda wɔ́, gẅiin yɔ́b mmó nà shúm sie e Ssé la ka’a mbwo pʉ̀a pé pà Yuda. Pɔ́ ée mekèm tà’ mbùm nnɛ́, ńgíŋe ńgẅiin yɔ́b nò ná mmó gie e Ssé la fó ná Yěso Kristo ńka’a mbwo pʉ̀a mesoŋ.
en: that the Gentiles should be fellowheirs, and of the same body, and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel:

ngiemboon: E Ssé la cÿó pɔ́ gʉm yɔ́ɔn tá ńgÿo n gwɔ́ ngàŋa fà’ létsẅi nkʉ̀ mbòŋo. À la lɔg pɔ́ metʉ̀ mé tá ńgÿo pú’u.
en: whereof I was made a minister, according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power.

ngiemboon: Tà mbɔɔ pá’ mèŋ n gee tsetsɛ̀ɛ pʉ̀a Ssé métsèm ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ nzsò nzèm, à ka ké ńzẅíŋ zẅíŋ ngie mèŋ n zɔ gʉa ńtsẅi nkʉ̀ mbòŋo á mbwo pʉ̀a pie é té pà Yuda wɔ́, é la’te pì tèmàg gie áa nà nò Kristo.
en: Unto me, who am less than the least of all saints, is this grace given, that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ;

ngiemboon: Mbɔɔ pá’ mèŋ n ge nyɛɛ mángyɛ̌, mé zsé pá’ e Ssé ge gÿo ammó gie à la lá’ ńzáb, mbà á ka zɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ ntsèm la, ge pumte pú’u. Yé Ssé gẅie à la nyɛte kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ, à la lÿoon yɛ̌ nò tà ńkú fʉ̀’ɔɔn,
en: and to make allmensee whatisthe fellowship of the mystery, which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God, who created all things by Jesus Christ:

ngiemboon: ńnyɛɛ pú’u, ńzsé ngie metándá shúm sie ée taa tÿǒ ńgẅiin tʉ̀, mbɔɔ metʉ̀ ntsèm mie ée taa tÿǒ ge zẅɛ́’ɛ cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo, é zsé nò ná legyè Ssé tà cʉ́me.
en: to the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenlyplacesmight be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God,

ngiemboon: E Ssé ka gÿo pá’ɔɔn á lɔgɔ ḿbumte ná mmó gie à la záb tà ńnyé pɔ́ tè nyɛte njÿó, ńgie à ge lá’ fó ná Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Kristo, é gÿo yɛ̌ mmó.
en: according to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord:

ngiemboon: Pá’ pege la nnɛ́, ḿbiŋ ńzáb ntʉ́m ná yé Kristo la, pege gẅiin pá’ ńgwɔ́ pege gʉa lejʉ́ŋ Ssé tà tsɔ́ mmó le wégè táte, pege ké le pɔ́g.
en: in whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him.

ngiemboon: Pá’ Ssé ka gÿo pú’u la, mèŋ sẅíŋte gẅi ngie tà pi gyá pá’ mèŋ n ne ńgyá ngɔ́’ nà twó sí, ńkʉ́a. Yɛ̌ ngɔ́’ e né ńkẅéte gẅí, ńgwɔ́ mbwo pi ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ cÿɔ́’ɔ lefùɔ.
en: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you, which is your glory.

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿo mèŋ n kẅí’te mvfò Ssé Tá
en: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ,

ngiemboon: gẅie metsìŋe ndá mie ée tÿǒ lepwó mbɔɔ mie ée ndùmo ssé tsetsá’ ntsèm, é gwaa gwɔ́ wó ńzẅɛ́’ɛ pɔ́ yé,
en: of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named,

ngiemboon: n né ńdúɔ mbwo yé ngie à lɔg pá’ legú’ we fǎŋ tɛ’ la, ńzẅíŋ, ńgÿo à Zẅìge yé náa gẅi tʉ̀ légwɔ́ gie ntʉ́m gẅi ge cwoŋo tʉte tɛ’.
en: that he would grant you, according to the riches of his glory, to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man;

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n giŋé ne sẅíŋte yé ngie à gÿo pi ké ne ńzába ntʉ́m pɔ́ ná Yěsô Kristo. Kristo lɔg pú’u, ńké ne ńnéŋe ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m gẅí. N giŋé ne sẅíŋte ngie à gÿo pi kwoŋ Ssé, ḿbiŋ ńgẅiin nkwòŋe tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, à cʉa pú’u, pi tyé ńtʉ pá’ tÿǒ gie menŋàŋ mé kúu ssé, mbɔɔ pá’ ndá gie à cÿǒ á kúu ssé.
en: that Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith; that ye, being rooted and grounded in love,

ngiemboon: Á cʉa pú’u, pi ku’u légwɔ́ gie ńgwɔ́ pia pʉ̀a Ssé metsèm pú ńjú’ ntí gie nkwòŋe Kristo e fǎŋ pú’u, ésag pú’u, ńgʉa tÿó pú’u, ńkúu ssé pú’u.
en: may be able to comprehend with all saints whatisthe breadth, and length, and depth, and height;

ngiemboon: Wɔɔn aa pá’ mèŋ n né sẅíŋte Ssé pú’u. Á ge fó mǒ pi ku’u lézsé pá’ nkwòŋe Kristo ee pú’u, tà mbɔɔ pá’ e cʉa zsě nò ntsèm. Pi ge gwɔ́ tà zsé yɛ̌ nkwòŋe, ammó ntsèm gie áa ntʉ́m Ssé à gíŋe ńgwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m gẅi tà mmó le mǒ zág
en: and to know the love of Christ, which passeth knowledge, that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God.

ngiemboon: Yé Ssé, à ku’u légÿo kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ ná pege, ńgÿo tà ńkwa’ ḿbú ńtɔ́g pá’ pege ne ńdúɔ, mbɔɔ pá’ pege ne ńkwaŋa. À gwɔ́ gÿo ńdɔg pɔ́ metʉ̀ mé mie é fa’a tsɛ̀ɛ mentʉ́m mégè.
en: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think, according to the power that worketh in us,

ngiemboon: Agù’te gwɔ́ mbwo yé tsɛ̀ɛ cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo, ńcʉa ná Yěsô Kristo, á nà mengù’ mengù’, té zá’a pàa!*Amen.
en: unto himbeglory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages, world without end. Amen.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ gẅie mèŋ n gee ndá tsǎŋ ńtí nò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Yěsô Kristo, n ge fó ná menò mie mèŋ shwoŋó gẅí, é zɛ́te ngie pi gwɔ́ gÿo kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gí wɔ́, ńkímte ngie e Ssé ka tóŋo gẅi ngie pi gwɔ́ pʉ̀a pé.
en: I therefore, the prisoner of the Lord, beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called,

ngiemboon: Pi sẅí’i mbùm gi ńnáa ssé, ńgwɔ́ pʉ̀a ḿbʉ́le pʉlé, ńgẅiin kwɔ́gɔ nnɛ́. À cʉa nà nkwòŋo gie ee tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, pi gwá’a gyáŋa lóŋ.
en: with all lowliness and meekness, with longsuffering, forbearing one another in love;

ngiemboon: Pi kag tʉ̀ lé ké ńgẅiin pɔ́ tà’ ncwò gẅie à fóo mbwo Zẅìge Ssé, yɛ̌ zɔ̌ gwɔ́ ná mbʉ́lè mbwo pʉ̀a, ńnáa wɔ́b tà’ ncwò.
en: endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.

ngiemboon: Mbùm nnɛ́ Kristo ee yémɔ’ɔ́, a Zẅìge ndʉalʉ̌a gwɔ́ yémɔ’ɔ́ ndʉŋ ndʉŋ pá’ mmó gie e Ssé la tóŋo gẅí, pi ne ńzẅí’te á gwɔ́ pɔ́ yémɔ’ɔ́.
en: There isone body, and one Spirit, even as ye are called in one hope of your calling;

ngiemboon: Pege metsèm gẅiin pɔ́ tà’ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wémɔ’ɔ́, ḿbú ńzába ntʉ́m pɔ́ ná yé gílé yé, mbà pege metsèm la pú ńkẅé ntse pɔ́ nà lezíŋ tà’ nyìŋ.
en: one Lord, one faith, one baptism,

ngiemboon: E Ssé gwɔ́ pɔ́ yémɔ’ɔ́, aa Tá pà mânyìŋ ntsèm. À pǔ sá’a pʉ̀a metsèm, ńdɔgɔ pʉ̀a metsèm éfa’a fà’ yé, ńgwɔ́ nà wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ.
en: one God and Father of all, whoisabove all, and through all, and in you all.

ngiemboon: Á ké ńgʉa nà wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege, mbà Kristo la lɔgɔ fù’ ńcÿó gʉm wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ á nà ntí gie yé Kristo kwoŋ.
en: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ.

ngiemboon: Ńnáa fù’ ntí ntí mbwo pʉ̀a mesoŋ.
en: And gave gifts unto men.

ngiemboon: Pú’u, mé gɔɔn ngie à la kwɔ́’ nê tÿǒ lepwó, ńdɔgɔ ńgɔɔn ngie kɔ́? Ńdɔgɔ ńgɔɔn ngie Kristo la zɔɔn sẅɛ́’ tà ńkúu ndùmo ssé tsetsá’ jʉ’ɔɔn.
en: (Now that he ascended, what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth?

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ gẅie à la sẅɛ́’, ńtóo ndùmo ssé tsetsá’, giŋé ńdɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ nyìŋ gẅie à la kwɔ́’ ńgʉa nê taa tÿǒ légwɔ́ gie à ge gwɔ́ nà shúm ntsèm.
en: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens, that he might fill all things.)

ngiemboon: Yé zɔ la náa fù’ ye wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ nà pʉ̀a pé, ńdɔg ńcÿó gʉm yé, ńdɔg petsɔ́ ńgÿo megàŋ ntúm, ńdɔg petsɔ́ ńgÿo pʉ̀a pie é ńnéŋe ńtsẅi nkʉ̀ gẅie é fó mbwo Ssé, ńdɔg petsɔ́ ńgÿo pà sá’ Nkʉ̀ Mbòŋo, ńdɔg petsɔ́ ńgÿo pà kẅé mvfò, mbɔɔ pá’ pɔ́ ge ne zí’i pʉ̀a nò Ssé.
en: And he gave some, apostles; and some, prophets; and some, evangelists; and some, pastors and teachers;

ngiemboon: À la záb pɛ̌ pʉ̀a légwɔ́ gie pɔ́ ge kẅéte pʉ̀a Kristo léfa’a fà’a Ssé, acú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo gie áa mbùm nnɛ́ ye, à kẅi’i ńgʉa nê mvfò.
en: for the perfecting of the saints, for the work of the ministry, for the edifying of the body of Christ:

ngiemboon: À kẅi’i ńgʉa nê mvfò tà pege cʉ́’ ńgẅiin pɔ́ tà’ ncwò gẅie à fóo ná pá’ pege záb ntʉ́m wégè pɔ́ ná Yěsô Míŋ Ssé, ḿbiŋ ńzsé yé, ńgú’ tà tsɔ́ mmó le gíŋe ńzága wégè wɔ́, pá’ áa ná yé ńgwɔ́ pú’u.
en: till we all come in the unity of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God, unto a perfect man, unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ:

ngiemboon: À cʉa pú’u, pege é le gíŋe ńgwɔ́ mecʉ̀cʉ̀ŋ penkʉ́ pie ée pá’ kanú’ gie ntse shwoŋo ńdɔgɔ ńgee jʉ’ɔɔn, ńgee jʉ’ʉ wɔ́. Mé le gíŋe shwóŋó wégè ngie pege pʉ pʉ kà ngie pege cwóŋ cwóŋ wɔ́, tà pege jú’ mɛ̌ ménò mie mé zí’i pʉ̀a ńzẅíŋ wɔ́. Á fó pú’u, pege le gíŋe ńgwɔ́ pá’ mecʉ̀cʉ̀ŋ pie pɔ́ zẅíŋe, epʉ̀a kwaŋa menò ńdɔgɔ fʉte wɔ́b pɔ́ zẅíŋe cÿɔ̌ nò wɔ́.
en: that wehenceforthbe no more children, tossed to and fro, and carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the sleight of men,andcunning craftiness, whereby they lie in wait to deceive;

ngiemboon: Tà ńcʉ́’ pú’u, pege kwoŋe pege né pege, nyìŋ shwóŋó nò nénʉ́ á mbwo fɛ́ we, ńgú’u nà meshÿó ntsèm, Kristo gÿo pege ne ńdɔgɔ ndɔ́ɔn ndɔ́ɔn ńkẅi’i ńgwɔ́ pá’ yé gẅie aa twó nà mbùm nnɛ́.
en: but speaking the truth in love, may grow up into him in all things, which is the head,evenChrist:

ngiemboon: Yé zɔ gÿo mejʉ’ nnɛ́ cú’te ńtemte ńgwɔ́ tà’a mmó. Menŋàŋ nnɛ́ tà ńgyɔ́ɔn kẅéte légÿo mejʉ’ mbùm temte, yɛ̌ jʉ’e nnɛ́ wɔ́ piŋ ńgwɔ́ tà ne fa’a yé fà’, mbùm nnɛ́ ntsèm pú ńgú’, ńtʉte ńcʉa pɔ́ nà nkwòŋe gie ee tsetsɛ̀ɛ pɔ́b.
en: from whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth, according to the effectual working in the measure of every part, maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love.

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿo, mèŋ n ge gɔɔn yɔɔn nò tà cwoŋo gɔɔn né pi á nà lezíŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ngie: Tà pi gíŋe ńgÿo shúm sí pá’ pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ té Ssé zsé la. Pɔ́ gÿo pɔ́ mmó gie nkwaŋá wɔ́b gẅie é té kẅéte shwóŋó wɔ́b ngie pɔ́ gÿo.
en: This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk, in the vanity of their mind,

ngiemboon: Menkwaŋá mɔ́b gwɔ́ pɔ́ me tsɛ̀ɛ nzěm. Pɔ́ gʉa nà leńnéŋe we sẅé gẅie Ssé ne náa, ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ megʉ̀, ńtí nue pɔ́ té mánzsè Ssé zsé. Mbà ntʉ́m wɔ́b léen shÿɔg.
en: having the understanding darkened, being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them, because of the blindness of their heart:

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ léen ńcʉ́’ pà tè kǔ shʉ́, ńgwá’ mbùm yɔb, ńgwɔ́ nà nò mpfwɔ́’, ńne ńkẅi’i ńgÿo menò tepòŋ ntí ntí té gwoonte mbùm yɔb.
en: who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness, to work all uncleanness with greediness.

ngiemboon: Tá á ké ńgʉa ná pi, mbà Kristo la tè zí’i gẅi légẅiin yɛ̌ ntí tsẅé wɔ́.
en: But ye have not so learned Christ;

ngiemboon: Á lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ ngie pi ka jú’u nò yé, tà mé shwóŋó gẅi nò nénʉ́ ntsèm gie á ne ńdíe yé,
en: if so be that ye have heard him, and have been taught by him, as the truth is in Jesus:

ngiemboon: mbà á ne ńzɛ́te ngie pi kẅɛɛ ná nzẅìŋe mà gẅie mé la lɔg ńzyé gẅí, ndʉŋ ndʉŋ pá’ nyìŋ sẅɛɛ nzẅìŋe nzsǒ ná yé ńgwá’a la. Wɛ̌ mà aa gẅie à kɔ̌ɔn ńcʉa nà shúm tepòŋ sie à kɔ̌ɔn ńtsɔ́ɔn, ńkẅi’i ḿbÿɔ́g pÿɔ́g. Sɛ̌ shúm tepòŋ gwɔ́ shúm sie é fʉte nyìŋ fʉte.
en: that ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man, which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts;

ngiemboon: Á gíŋe ne ńzɛ́te ná fʉ̀’ɔɔn ngie pi zẅíŋ e Ssé kúbe mà gẅi, à cʉ́’ʉ we sẅé, mbɔɔ nkwaŋá gẅi e cʉ́’ we sẅé.
en: and be renewed in the spirit of your mind;

ngiemboon: Á gíŋe ne ńzɛ́te ngie pi kúu ná mà we sẅé pá’ nyìŋ kaa nzsǒ sẅé ḿma’a ná ye la. E Ssé zɔ la nuŋe wɛ̌ mà. Wɛ̌ mà aa gẅie mé gyá ná nyìŋ gẅie à ne ńgiŋe ná pá’ á ne ńzɛ́te, ńgwɔ́ nyìŋ gẅie à léen ńnyé we le gwɔ́ ntsèm mbwo Ssé. Wɛ̌ légiŋ fóo ná nò nénʉ́.
en: and that ye put on the new man, which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness.

ngiemboon: Á lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pú’u, pi gwá’ cÿɔ̌ nò. Nyìŋ gɔɔn pɔ́ nò nénʉ́ mbwo mefɛ́ pé, mélà’mie pege pǔ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ mekèm tà’ mbùm nnɛ́ yémɔ’ɔ́.
en: Wherefore putting away lying, speak every man truth with his neighbour: for we are members one of another.

ngiemboon: Pi lɔɔn ńgyáŋa lóŋ, pi pɔ́ɔn légÿo nò tepòŋ, ḿbɔ́ɔn nèm légwaa pyé, agyáŋa lóŋ nyé ntʉ́m pi.
en: Be ye angry, and sin not: let not the sun go down upon your wrath:

ngiemboon: Pi pɔ́ɔn lénná shÿó lɔg ńgwoon gẅi mbwo Sátà.
en: neither give place to the devil.

ngiemboon: Pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ gẅiin mà léjʉ gwá’ tsǒŋ, ńcʉ́’ ńdɔg mbwó mɔ́b, éfa’ tà ńtéŋe zì’i ńzsé ngie pɔ́ ge gẅiin mmó tà lɔgɔ tsɔ́ é kẅéte pʉ̀a pie é ne ńzága yɔ́b,
en: Let him that stole steal no more: but rather let him labour, working withhishands the thing which is good, that he may have to give to him that needeth.

ngiemboon: ḿbɔ́ɔn mbɔɔ tà’a shwóŋè tepòŋ lékẅɛɛ ncwò pi. Pi gɔɔn pɔ́ nò gie á ge kẅéte ná yɛ̌ fʉ̀’, à gwɔ́ pɔ́ shwóŋè mbòŋo gie á ge kẅéte tsɔ́ pʉ̀a pɔ́ kẅi’i ńzáb ntʉ́m nà Ssé. Pi gɔɔn pɔ́ nò gie á ge kẅéte wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ ná pʉ̀a pie é ne ńzẅí’te.
en: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth, but that which is good to the use of edifying, that it may minister grace unto the hearers.

ngiemboon: Tà pi gÿo Zẅìge ndʉalʉ̌a gie Ssé la lɔg ńcÿɔ’ɔ liŋé ná pi gyá ngɔ́’. À lɔ̌ɔn ńdɔgɔ ńnyɛɛ ngie pi ee pʉ̀a pé, ńgíŋe ńdɔgɔ ńnyɛɛ ngie alyɛ̌’ gé lá’ gwɔ́, à pú ńcu’u wégè, pege pú ńtsẅɛ́.
en: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God, whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption.

ngiemboon: Pi pú ńkẅile shúm sie ée ntʉ́m pi ńgÿo ncwò gẅi pÿɔ́gɔ, ńkẅile lézá’ lekwɔɔn nyìŋ, ńkẅile gyáŋa lóŋ, tà pi gíŋe ńtág ntsaŋ, tà pi twó ncwò, pi pú ńgwá’ fʉ̀’ nò ntí ntí,
en: Let all bitterness, and wrath, and anger, and clamour, and evil speaking, be put away from you, with all malice:

ngiemboon: ńdíe mefɛ́ pí pɔ́ lê ntʉ́m mbòŋo, ńgẅiin tsɔ́ɔn mezìŋe nzèm petsɔ́ pʉ̀a, pi lege mefʉ̀a tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi né pi, ndʉŋ ndʉŋ pá’ Ssé la cʉa ná Kristo ńdege mí gí né pi.
en: and be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.

ngiemboon: Pi púɔ Ssé, e Ssé kwoŋo gẅi tɛ’, pú’u la pi pí fʉ̀’ ná yé.
en: Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children;

ngiemboon: Pi gwaa gÿo kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gí wɔ́, ńdɔg pɔ́ nkwòŋe ndʉŋ ndʉŋ pá’ Kristo la kwoŋo wégè tà ńnáa twó yé ńdɔg ńnuŋe pwɔ́’ mvfò Ssé ńtí wégè. Epwɔ́’ ŋwɛ́ ée gẅie gyě poŋo mbwo Ssé.
en: and walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.

ngiemboon: Pá’ pi ee fʉ̀’ɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pʉ̀a Ssé la, tsɔ́ shúm ée sie á té zɛ́te ngie nyìŋ gẅi gÿo wɔ́, ńgíŋ tè zɛ́te ngie me zɔɔn ńkím mbàa kǐm tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi wɔ́, mé gɔɔn nò pá’ mbàŋa létóŋ pànzwě, épànzwě léfa’ mbàŋa, á mmó pá’ menò ncÿǒ mbɔɔ nò kègɔ́’.
en: But fornication, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not be once named among you, as becometh saints;

ngiemboon: Á té ne ńzɛ́te ngie pi shwóŋó ḿmag mag wɔ́, tà mbɔɔ léma’a kwaŋ ná tsɔ̌ ntí, lâ légÿo tsɔ́ ntí megʉa. Á poŋ ngie ashwóŋè gwaa kẅɛɛ ncwò pi, pi lɔgɔ síe pɔ́ Ssé nà mmó gie à gÿǒ mbwo pi.
en: neither filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor jesting, which are not convenient: but rather giving of thanks.

ngiemboon: Pi zsé ngie, mámbàŋa gẅie à tóŋo pànzwě, kà manzwě gẅie à fa’a mbàŋa wɔ́, mbɔɔ nyìŋ gẅie à gÿo menò ncÿǒ, tà mbɔɔ nyìŋ gẅie à zába ntʉ́m nà shúm pʉ̀a, atsɔ́ wɔb těen ńdá’a ńgẅiin yé jʉ’ tsɛ̀ɛ nò lefùɔ Kristo pɔ́ Ssé wɔ́. Lezǎb ntʉ́m nà shúm pʉ̀a, e gwɔ́ pɔ́ tsɔ̌ ntí legù’te shúm ńdɔg ngie ee Ssé.
en: For this ye know, that no whoremonger, nor unclean person, nor covetous man, who is an idolater, hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God.

ngiemboon: Tà nyìŋ lɔgɔ púu shwóŋè, éfʉʉ gẅí. Menò mie mé tʉ́ʉ lɔɔn zɔɔn ńgÿo Ssé gyáŋa lóŋ ńtí pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ té gÿo mmó gie à ne ńkwoŋo wɔ́.
en: Let no man deceive you with vain words: for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, tà pia yɛ̌ ntí pʉ̀a teme tsɔ́ nò.
en: Be not ye therefore partakers with them.

ngiemboon: Pi kaa tsɔ́ fʉ̀’ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ nzěm. Á cʉa ná pá’ pi kéen ńda nnɛ́ ná Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, pi cʉ́’ ńgwɔ́ fʉ̀’ɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ jʉ’e fɔ̌g. Pú’u la, pi gwaa gÿo kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gí wɔ́, ńgÿo pá’ pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ ée nà jʉ’e fɔ̌g.
en: For ye were sometimes darkness, but noware yelight in the Lord: walk as children of light:

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gɔɔn pú’u, mélà’mie, apì légwɔ́ jʉ’e fɔ̌g aa legÿo menò mbòŋo, ńgÿo menò mie ée mvfò Ssé ńgwɔ́ ndʉŋ ndʉŋ, ńnéŋe tsɛ̀ɛ nò nénʉ́.
en: (for the fruit of the Spiritisin all goodness and righteousness and truth;)

ngiemboon: Pi gwaa gÿo kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ wɔ́, ńta’ menò, lézsé mie é poŋo mbwo Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: proving what is acceptable unto the Lord.

ngiemboon: Tà pi kúu nùɔ pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ fa’a mefà’ mie é té kẅéte, é mefà’ nzěm. Pi shʉ̀ashʉ̀a ńkyag nzèm yɔb kyag.
en: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprovethem.

ngiemboon: Menò mie pʉ̀a ŋwɛ́ gÿo tsɛ̀ɛ nzěm, ée menò shʉ́, ńzɔɔn tè mie ńgwɔ́ nyìŋ kím mbàa kǐm wɔ́.
en: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret.

ngiemboon: Pi lɔɔn shʉa shʉa ńkyag mɛ̌ menò ntsèm, mbà é ge fɔ́g
en: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light: for whatsoever doth make manifest is light.

ngiemboon: Pú’u, Kristo ńnéŋe kyɛ̀’ yé ná gù.
en: Wherefore he saith, Awake thou that sleepest, and arise from the dead, and Christ shall give thee light.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la pi gwaa gÿo kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gí wɔ́, ńdaga twó gí mboŋó. Pi pɔ́ɔn léńnéŋe we megʉ̀gʉ̀, pi ńnéŋe pá’ megàŋa zsě nò
en: See then that ye walk circumspectly, not as fools, but as wise,

ngiemboon: pie pɔ́ zsé lézẅɛ́’ melyɛ’ɛ́ lá’ mie Ssé náa mbwo pɔ́b, éfa’ mefà’ mbòŋo, á nue afʉ̀’e njÿó yɔɔn té poŋ.
en: redeeming the time, because the days are evil.

ngiemboon: Pú’u, tà pi gwɔ́ megʉ̀gʉ̀. Pi ta’ menò lézsé mie é poŋo mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: Wherefore be ye not unwise, but understanding what the will of the Lordis.

ngiemboon: Tà pi nú melù’ tà é jÿó gẅí. Legÿo pú’u, aa lecʉmé ná mánzsè tepòŋ. À Zẅìge ndʉalʉ̌a zɔ pu njÿó gẅí.
en: And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit;

ngiemboon: Pú’u, pi ne ńzɔbɔ mezɔ́bɔ ntse mie ée tsɛ̀ɛ ŋwà’ne ńdɔgɔ ńkẅiŋte mennɛ́ mí, ńzɔb mezɔ́b pʉ̀a Kristo, ńzɔb mezɔ́b mie Zẅìge Ssé neŋé ntʉ́m pi. Pi zɔb ńgu’te Cʉ̀apʉ̀a nê ngwòŋ ntʉ́m gẅi ntsèm.
en: speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord;

ngiemboon: Pi lɔg lezíŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Kristo ńne síe Ssé Tá fʉ̀’ ntsèm, á nà shúm ntsèm.
en: giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ;

ngiemboon: Pi lɔg pá’ pi ná mbùm gi Ssé mvfò Kristo, wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ ná mbùm ye Ssé mvfò fɛ́ we.
en: submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God.

ngiemboon: Á gʉa ná pi pànzwě, awɔ̌wɔ́ɔ ná mbùm ye ssé mvfò ndúm we pá’ à náa mbùm ye ssé mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as unto the Lord.

ngiemboon: Á nue ndǔm manzwě aa twó, manzwě gwɔ́ mbùm nnɛ́. Kristo aa twó, acú’tè pʉ̀a pé gwɔ́ mbùm nnɛ́. Yé zɔ gÿo tá cú’tè pʉ̀a pé gẅiin le gwɔ́ tèmì.
en: For the husband is the head of the wife, even as Christ is the head of the church: and he is the saviour of the body.

ngiemboon: Ndʉŋ ndʉŋ pá’ cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo ne ńnáa mbùm ye ssé mvfò Kristo la, á zɛ́te ngie a gʉa ná pi pànzwě, awɔ̌wɔ́ɔ ná mbùm ye ssé mvfò ndǔm we pɔ́ pú’u.
en: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ, soletthe wivesbeto their own husbands in every thing.

ngiemboon: Ńgʉa ná pi mbàŋa, awɔ̌wɔ́ɔ kwoŋo nzwě we ndʉŋ ndʉŋ pá’ Kristo kwoŋo cú’tè pʉ̀a pé tà mbà à la náa twó yé ńtí yɛ̌,
en: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;

ngiemboon: ńgÿo pú’u, ńdɔg faga cú’tè yé ńnáa mbwo Ssé. Á gwaa gwɔ́, mbà à lɔ̌g ntse sɔgɔ wɔ́b, ńgíŋe ńdɔgɔ shwóŋè ńkẅile*lɔ̌’ ná pɔ́b.
en: that he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word,

ngiemboon: À la ne ńkwoŋo ngie yɛ̌ cú’tè, a wɔ́ tyé mvfò yé, ńcwoŋo ne ńŋwʉŋe, ńgwɔ́ té ncÿǒ, té tsɔ́ jʉ’e nnɛ́ yé ńŋú’te, té tsɔ́*lɔ̌’, atsɔ́ mmó le nyé ńzága ná yé wɔ́.
en: that he might present it to himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.

ngiemboon: Pú’u, á ne ńzɛ́te ngie mámbàŋa kwoŋo nzwě we yé pá’ à kwoŋo twó mbùm yé. Nyìŋ gẅie à kwoŋo nzwě we la, à kwoŋo pɔ́ twó mbùm yé.
en: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies. He that loveth his wife loveth himself.

ngiemboon: Atsɔ́ nyìŋ laa zɔɔn ḿbʉa mbùm ye wɔ́. Nyìŋ jÿɔ́g mbùm ye jÿɔ̌g ḿbiŋ ńnyɛte. Áa ndʉŋ ndʉŋ pá’ Yěsô Kristo gÿo nà cú’tè pʉ̀a pé pú’u,
en: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh; but nourisheth and cherisheth it, even as the Lord the church:

ngiemboon: á nue pege gwɔ́ pɔ́ mekèm mbùm ye.
en: for we are members of his body, of his flesh, and of his bones.

ngiemboon: «Áa mmó gie á gÿo mámbàŋa ńnéŋe tà fag nnɛ́ ye ná tá we pɔ́ má we, ńgʉa ńda nnɛ́ ná we mánzwě pɔ́ ye temte ńcʉ́’ʉ tà’ nyìŋ».
en: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and shall be joined unto his wife, and they two shall be one flesh.

ngiemboon: Yɔɔn ntsèm ee wó tɛ’, n gɔɔn pá’ɔɔn ná Kristo mbɔɔ ná cú’tè pʉ̀a pé.
en: This is a great mystery: but I speak concerning Christ and the church.

ngiemboon: Tá ńké ńgíŋe ńgɔɔn mbɔɔ ná pi gí. Á ne ńzɛ́te ngie wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ mámbàŋa wɔ́ kwoŋo nzwě we pá’ à kwoŋo twó mbùm yé, wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ manzwě wɔ́ gÿo mekù’ ndǔm we.
en: Nevertheless, let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself; and the wifeseethat she reverenceherhusband.

ngiemboon: Ńgʉa ná pi penkʉ́, awɔ̌wɔ́ɔ jú’ ncwò tá we pɔ́ má we ná pá’ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ne ńkwoŋo. Áa mmó gie á tyé ndʉŋ ndʉŋ, pi gẅiin légÿo pú’u.
en: Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right.

ngiemboon: Tsɔ́*lepʉ̌ Ssé gɔɔn ngie: «Gÿo mekù’ tá gù pɔ́ má gù». Aa ndùŋ mvfò*lepʉ̌ sie Ssé la ka’ ntsɔ’ɔ́ fà’ mǒ.
en: Honour thy father and mother; which is the first commandment with promise;

ngiemboon: Á lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ ngie ɔ̀ lɔɔn ńgÿo pú’u, mbà «ɔ̀ ge gwɔ́ shÿó mbòŋo, é zye ńnéŋe ndùmo ssé tsetsá’».
en: that it may be well with thee, and thou mayest live long on the earth.

ngiemboon: Pi metá penkʉ́, tà pi lába lóŋ penkʉ́ pí. Pi cʉ́’ʉ lékwé’te wɔ́b, ńtÿɔ́gte wɔ́b, ńzí’i wɔ́b mmó gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ne ńkwoŋo.
en: And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.

ngiemboon: Ńgʉa ná pi menkwɔɔn, pi jú’ ncwò pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ gẅiin gẅí, ńne náa mekù’ mɔ́b, ésẅí’i mbùm gí ńnáa ssé mvfò pɔ́b, ńgẅiin ntʉ́m mbòŋo nzèm pɔ́b, ndʉŋ ndʉŋ pá’ pi jú’u ncwò Kristo.
en: Servants, be obedient to them that areyourmasters according to the flesh, with fear and trembling, in singleness of your heart, as unto Christ;

ngiemboon: Pi pɔ́ɔn légÿo pú’u, pɔ́ ndà’ fʉ̀’ gie pɔ́ tyé nzèm pi. Pá’ fʉ̀’ gie pi gÿo pɔ́ mmó gie á ge poŋ pʉ̀a mesoŋ la. Pi fa’ pɔ́ pá’ menkwɔɔn Kristo pie pɔ́ ne gÿo mmó gie Ssé ne ńkwoŋo lê ngwòŋ ntʉ́m wɔ́b ntsèm.
en: not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but as the servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart;

ngiemboon: Pi fa’a fà’ yɔ́b lê ntʉ́m mbòŋo, pɔ́ pá’ pi fa’a mbwo Cʉ̀apʉ̀a tà pi tě fa’a mbwo pʉ̀a mesoŋ wɔ́.
en: with good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men:

ngiemboon: Pi kímte ngie, nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ nkwɔɔn, kà ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ ndù nnɛ́ wɔ́, mbà Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ge lá’ cʉ́’ʉ léná ntsɔ’ɔ́ fà’ we wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ, é ná pɔ́ pá’ ngàŋ ka lɔg fa’ mboŋó pú’u.
en: knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth, the same shall he receive of the Lord, whetherhe bebond or free.

ngiemboon: Pi metá pu’ pi gẅiin gí menkwɔɔn mí nê ntʉ́m mbòŋo. Tà pi vege wɔ́b vege. Pi zsé ngie pia pɔ́ pǔ ńgẅiin pɔ́ tà’ Nyìŋ gẅie à sá’a gẅi lâ pɔ̌ á gwɔ́ tÿǒ lepwó. Àa těen ńgẅiin tyɛ̀’te tsetsɛ̀ɛ pʉ̀a mesoŋ wɔ́.
en: And, ye masters, do the same things unto them, forbearing threatening: knowing that your Master also is in heaven; neither is there respect of persons with him.

ngiemboon: Nzsò nzèm nò gie mèŋ n ge shwóŋó gẅí, á gwɔ́ pɔ́ ngie: Pá’ pi la nnɛ́ ná Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la, pi kẅé metʉ̀ mbwo ye. Àa ngàŋ metʉ̀ ntsèm. Pi kẅé metʉ̀ mbwo ye.
en: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.

ngiemboon: Pi kaa shúm ncù sie e Ssé nǎ mbwo pi pɔ́ ntsèm, tá ńdɔg ńzsé ngie Sátà ge lɔg wɛ̌ shÿó ma’a gẅi wɔ́ pi le ŋele,
en: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.

ngiemboon: á nue pege tě ńgee ńdÿɔ́’ pʉ̀a mesoŋ wɔ́. Pege gee pɔ́ ńdÿɔ́’ mezẅìge tepòŋ mie ée tàa tÿǒ, é lÿɔ́’ metándá pɔ́b, é gíŋe lÿɔ́’ shúm sie ée tàa tÿǒ ńgẅiin metʉ̀, lâ púɔ ntɔ́’ nzěm pie pɔ́ sá’a yɔɔn njÿó.
en: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in highplaces.

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿo tá á ne ńzɛ́te ngie, pi kaa shúm ncù Ssé pɔ́ ntsèm, tá ńku’u légwɔ́ gie lyɛ’ɛ́ lá’ tepòŋ ge tó, pi ma’ ncù meshÿó meshÿó tà ńtsẅé jʉ’, é ké le ŋele.
en: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, tà pi ŋele. Anò nénʉ́ gwɔ́ kwɔb gẅie pi lɔ̌g ńtʉ́me zẅɛ̌’ gí, ammó gie á tyé ndʉŋ ndʉŋ gwɔ́ nzsǒ ncù gie pi ge ma’a ná pi.
en: Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness;

ngiemboon: Leneŋé ńtsẅi nkʉ̀ mbòŋo Kristo gẅie é ná mbʉ́lè, é gwɔ́ mí melɔ̌ɔn mie pi ge shÿɔ́gɔ kwò pi.
en: and your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace;

ngiemboon: Gẅi kʉ́’ʉ̀ ncù á gwɔ́ pɔ́ lezǎb ntʉ́m nà Ssé tà mbɔɔ pá’ pi lɔɔn ńtyé pɔ́ nà wɛ̌ shÿó ncù wɔ́. Wɛ̌ kʉ́’ʉ̀ ncù kẅéte gẅi le pyág mmɔ̌g gẅie Ngàŋ mbù lyɛɛ ná mekwòŋ tá ńdɔgɔ ḿma’a gẅí.
en: above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.

ngiemboon: Pi zẅíŋ ngie e Ssé ne ńgÿo pi tsẅɛ́ɛ. Lezẅǐŋ pú’u, aa lekaa cÿɔ́’ɔ ncù ńtɔ’. Pi kẅé nně ncù gie Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a náa mbwo pi. Yɛ̌ nně ncù aa shwóŋè Ssé.
en: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:

ngiemboon: Pi gwɔ́ fʉ̀’ ntsèm ńne ńtsyɛ’te Ssé, ńgíŋe ne sẅíŋte yé nà mentí ntsèm, pá’ Zẅìge ge ne nyɛɛ gẅi ngie pi gÿo pú’u. Tà pi gwá’a lÿɔ̀g, pi sẅíŋte Ssé nà twó pʉ̀a Ssé métsèm.
en: praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;

ngiemboon: Pi sẅíŋte yé mbɔɔ ná yɔ́ɔn twó légwɔ́ gie à ge ńnéŋe shwóŋè ncwò mèŋ, ńgie à gÿo pú’u, légwɔ́ gie n dɔɔn ńnyɛ́’ ncwò wɔ̀ɔn fʉ̀’e kɔ́ wɔ́, n gɔɔn nò té pɔ́g, légwɔ́ gie pʉ̀a ge zsé nò gie nkʉ̀ mbòŋo la lɔg ńtó, mbà á la zɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ lelyěen.
en: and for me, that utterance may be given unto me, that I may open my mouth boldly, to make known the mystery of the gospel,

ngiemboon: Mèŋ, n gee mántúm létsẅi wɛ̌ nkʉ̀, tà mbɔɔ pá’ mèŋ fǒ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ tsǎŋ lɔɔn. Pi sẅíŋte Ssé ngie mèŋ n gẅiin shÿɔ́g lélɔg ńgɔɔn pá’ á ne ńzɛ́te ngie mèŋ n gɔɔn.
en: for which I am an ambassador in bonds: that therein I may speak boldly, as I ought to speak.

ngiemboon: Tishig gẅie aa fɛ́ wege we ntʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, ńgwɔ́ ngàŋa fà’ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, tà ńzsé yé pɔ́ ndà’ yɛ̌ fà’, à ge tó, é tó shwóŋó gẅi pá’ mèŋ n gee jʉ’ɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pú’u, légwɔ́ gie pi ge zsé mmó gie n kéen ńcʉ́’ʉ yɛ̌, mbɔɔ mmó gie mèŋ n gÿo.
en: But that ye also may know my affairs,andhow I do, Tychicus, a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord, shall make known to you all things:

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n zɔɔn ńké ńtúmo yé né pi pɔ́ ngie à shwóŋó gẅi pá’ peg ee pú’u, mbɔɔ pá’ à ge kẅiŋte gẅí.
en: whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that ye might know our affairs, andthathe might comfort your hearts.

ngiemboon: E Ssé Tá, mbɔɔ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Yěsǒ Kristo ne ńnéŋe sẅétè tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m mefɛ́ mefɛ́, pɔ́ ne ńgẅiin nkwòŋe, ńne ńzába ntʉ́m pɔ́ nà Ssé.
en: Peacebeto the brethren, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

ngiemboon: E Ssé ne ńgwɔ́ né mânyìŋ ntsèm gẅie à kwoŋo Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěso Kristo lê ntí nkwòŋe gie e tě ńdá’a ḿmaga wɔ́.
en: Written from Rome unto the Ephesians by Tychicus.

ngiemboon: Yɔɔn ŋwà’ne fóo mbwo mèŋ Pɔl. Peg Timoté gẅie peg yé pú fa’a nzèm Yěsô Kristo náa mbwo pi pie pi la zẅɛ́’ɛ Yěsô Kristo ńgwɔ́ pʉ̀a Ssé, á gẅi gẅie pi ee tÿǒsoŋ Filipo. Á gíŋe ńgwɔ́ gí pi pà líe cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo laa pi pàfa’a tsɛ̀ɛ cú’tè.
en: Paul and Timotheus, the servants of Jesus Christ, to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi, with the bishops and deacons:

ngiemboon: Tá wege Ssé mbɔɔ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Yěsô Kristo ne ńgwɔ́ né pi, ńne ńnéŋe sẅétè ntʉ́m pi.
en: gracebeunto you, and peace, from God our Father, andfromthe Lord Jesus Christ.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n kwaŋte gẅi tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m mèŋ fʉ̀’e kɔ́ wɔ́, ésíe Ssé yɔ̀ɔn.
en: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you,

ngiemboon: N gwɔ́ sẅíŋte Ssé nà twó sí fʉ̀’ ntsèm, ntʉ́m wɔ̀ɔn ne ńkága kǎg,
en: always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy,

ngiemboon: ńkága pú’u, ńtí gí mmó gie pi gÿo lélɔg ńkẅéte wɔ̀ɔn, n dɔg nkʉ̀ mbòŋo Yěsô Kristo sa jʉ’. Á gie pi gÿǒ tà fó lyɛ̌’ gie pi la zẅíŋ nkʉ̀ mbòŋo ńgʉa ńkúu lyɛ̌’ɔɔn.
en: for your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now;

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n zsě ngie yé Ssé gẅie à la zye mefà’ mbòŋo tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m pi, á ge lɔg gʉa pɔ́ lê mvfò tà lá’ kúu lyɛ̌’ gie Yěsô Kristo ge lá’ gíŋ tó.
en: being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will performituntil the day of Jesus Christ:

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gẅiin lé ne ńkwaŋa pɔ́ pú’u ná pi, mélà’mie m bǔ ńkwoŋo gẅi tà ḿmag ntʉ́m wɔ̀ɔn. Pi metsèm zɔɔn ne ńkẅéte wɔ̀ɔn nà fà’ gie e Ssé la lɔg ńcÿó gʉm yɔ́ɔn pɔ́ lê pòŋo ntʉ́m yé, tà mbɔɔ fʉ̀’ɔɔn gie n gee ndá tsǎŋ lɔɔn, mbɔɔ fʉ̀’ gie mèŋ n ne ńnyɛɛ ngie nkʉ̀ mbòŋo ée nénʉ́, mbɔɔ fʉ̀’ gie mèŋ n ne ńgÿo pʉ̀a nyɛte ńzẅíŋe.
en: even as it is meet for me to think this of you all, because I have you in my heart; inasmuch as both in my bonds, and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel, ye all are partakers of my grace.

ngiemboon: E Ssé ne ńzsé ngie mèŋ n neŋé ńtsɔ́ɔn légyá gẅi tɛ’, ḿbiŋ ńzsé ngie mèŋ n kwoŋo gẅi lê ntʉ́m wɔ̀ɔn ntsèm, ndʉŋ ndʉŋ pá’ Yěsô Kristo.
en: For God is my record, how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ.

ngiemboon: Ammo gie mèŋ m biŋ ńnéŋe sẅíŋte Ssé ńtsɔ́ɔn ngie à ná né pi aa yé légÿo pi kẅi’i ńgẅiin nkwòŋe ńdɔg ńgʉa lê mvfò, ńne ńcwoŋo ńzsé Ssé mboŋó, ńne ńzsé tyɛ̀’te gie áa nà nò mbòŋo pɔ́ ye tepòŋ.
en: And this I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge andinall judgment;

ngiemboon: À cʉa pú’u, pi ku’u lépíi ye mbòŋo, éshwoŋo nò nénʉ́. À lá’a lyɛ̌’ gie Kristo ge lá’ gíŋ tó, pi gwɔ́ pà tèfʉa.
en: that ye may approve things that are excellent; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ;

ngiemboon: Yěsô ge gÿo pi ké ne fa’a pɔ́ mefà’ mbòŋo, ńzsé ngie pʉ̀a ge ne gyá, é gu’te Ssé, é gé’e lezíŋ sé.
en: being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ́ mefɛ́, pi zsé ngie ngɔ́’ gie é ka kúu wɔ̀ɔn, e ka gÿo ngie nkʉ̀ mbòŋo kẅi’i sa pɔ́ jʉ’,
en: But I would ye should understand, brethren, that the thingswhich happenedunto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel;

ngiemboon: tà pàlÿɔ́’ ncù pie é pyɛ́bɛ mbʉ̀a ngúmnɔ́ɔn lâ pʉ̀a metsèm ne ńzsé ngie mèŋ n gee ndá tsǎŋ pá’ɔɔn ntí pɔ́ nò Kristo.
en: so that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace, and in all otherplaces;

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ka gwɔ̌ tà ńkúu tsǎŋ, lelÿò mefɛ́ mefɛ́, gyá pú’u, ńkẅi’i ńzáb ntʉ́m wɔ́b ná Cʉ̀apʉ̀a. Tà pɔ́ ne shÿɔ́gɔ shwóŋó nò Ssé fʉ̀’ɔɔn té pɔ́g.
en: and many of the brethren in the Lord, waxing confident by my bonds, are much more bold to speak the word without fear.

ngiemboon: Áa nénʉ́ ngie tsɔ́ pʉ̀a ée tsetsɛ̀ɛ pɔ́b, éshwóŋó nò Kristo pɔ́ lélɔg fa’a nò ná mèŋ, mbɔɔ lélɔg ńdʉŋte ntyě. Tá petsɔ́ ké shwóŋó yɔ́b pɔ́ lê nkwaŋá mbòŋo.
en: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife; and some also of good will:

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ shwóŋó pú’u, nue pɔ́ kwoŋo wɔ̀ɔn. Pɔ́ ne ńzsé ngie e Ssé zɔ ka kwoŋ ngie n gwɔ́ ndá tsǎŋ jʉ’ɔɔn légwɔ́ gie n ge pÿɛɛ nò ná nkʉ̀ mbòŋo, é nyɛ ngie ée nénʉ́.
en: the one preach Christ of contention, not sincerely, supposing to add affliction to my bonds:

ngiemboon: Tá pʉ̀a pie é shwóŋó nò Kristo lê nkwaŋá tepòŋ, pɔ́ lélɔg ńdʉŋte ntyě, kwaŋ yɔ́b pɔ́ ngie pɔ́ ge kẅi’i menò ná ngɔ́’ gie mèŋ n ne ńgyá ndá tsǎŋ lɔɔn.
en: but the other of love, knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel.

ngiemboon: Á nò ge gyáŋa wɔ̀ɔn mǒ mélà’a kɔ́? Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ shwóŋó nò Kristo, ńdɔg nkwaŋá mbòŋo kà nkwaŋá tepòŋ wɔ́, mbà á té*lɔ̌’ wɔ́, anò gwɔ́ pɔ́ ngie à shwóŋó nò Kristo. Ntʉ́m wɔ̀ɔn ge kág kág, é ké lá’a zɔ́gɔ kága kág mǒ.
en: What then? notwithstanding, every way, whether in pretence, or in truth, Christ is preached; and I therein do rejoice, yea, and will rejoice.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n zɔɔn ne ńzsé ngie ngɔ́’ gie é ka kúu wɔ̀ɔn ge tó cʉ́’ gÿo mèŋ n tsẅɛ́ tsẅɛ́. Mèŋ n tsẅɛ́ɛ pú’u, ńzẅɛ́’ɛ ntí gie pi ne ńdɔgɔ sẅíŋte Ssé pú’u, ńgíŋe ńzẅɛ́’ɛ Zẅìge Yěsô Kristo gie á ne ńtóonte wɔ̀ɔn.
en: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer, and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,

ngiemboon: Ammó gie mèŋ n ne ńtsɔ́ɔn tɛ’, nkwaŋá wɔ̀ɔn ńnéŋe ńtyé pɔ́ mǒ, á gwɔ́ pɔ́ ngie tà mèŋ n gÿo tsɔ́ mmó gie eshʉ́ ge fó mǒ é kúu wɔ̀ɔn. Tà ńcʉ́’ pú’u, mbà á lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ fʉ̀’ɔɔn, kà fʉ̀’e kɔ́ wɔ́, n nyé pɔ́ ntentʉ́ kà fó ńkwé kwé wɔ́, mbà mèŋ n ne ńzsé mboŋó ngie mé ge fó nà wɔɔn leńnéŋe, é gu’te Kristo.
en: according to my earnest expectation andmyhope, that in nothing I shall be ashamed, butthatwith all boldness, as always,sonow also Christ shall be magnified in my body, whetherit beby life, or by death.

ngiemboon: Kristo zɔɔn ńgwɔ́ yɔ́ɔn nò ntsèm. N dɔɔn ńgwɔ́ wó, mbà mèŋ n gee wó ńtí Kristo, ńké ńkwé, mbà mèŋ n jÿǒ pì nzèm yé.
en: For to me to liveisChrist, and to dieisgain.

ngiemboon: Tà áa pú’u, pá’ɔɔn ńgwɔ́ gie n dɔɔn ńnyé ńgẅiin léńnéŋe ndùmo ssé tsetsá’, éfa’ mefà’ mbòŋo, mbà mèŋ n ge kaŋ pɔ́ lékwé kà leńnéŋe? N kaa zsé gie mèŋ n ge kaŋ wɔ́.
en: But if I live in the flesh, thisisthe fruit of my labour: yet what I shall choose I wot not.

ngiemboon: Menò mémbʉ́a mɔɔn mvfò mèŋ. Mèŋ n ne ńtsɔ́ɔn léfó ndùmo ssé tsetsá’ ńgʉa peg Kristo zɔ̌ cʉ́’ʉ ńnéŋe. Áa yɔ́ɔn twó ye mbòŋo mǒ.
en: For I am in a strait betwixt two, having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better:

ngiemboon: Tá’, áa mbòŋ ngie mèŋ n gíŋe ńnéŋe ńtí gẅí.
en: nevertheless to abide in the fleshismore needful for you.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńnyɛte ńzsé pú’u. Pege ge gíŋe ńnéŋe mèŋ n ne ńkẅéte gẅi métsèm lécwoŋo ńzẅíŋe nò Yěsô, ńgẅiin lekág.
en: And having this confidence, I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith;

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, mèŋ n ge gÿo piŋ tà gíŋe gwɔ́ tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, pi zẅɛ́’ɛ wɔ̀ɔn ńkẅi’i ńgẅiin lekág gẅie à fóo ná pá’ pi lǎ nnɛ́ ná Yěsô Kristo.
en: that your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again.

ngiemboon: Ammó lÿò gie pi kě ńgẅiin légÿo á gwɔ́ pɔ́ ngie, pi ké ńne ńgiŋe pɔ́ ná mà we pʉ̀a pie é jú’u nkʉ̀ mbòŋo Yěsô Kristo. Á nà ntí gie n dɔɔn ńtó gyá gẅi lo, éfó tè tó lo, n ké ne ńjú’u pɔ́ pá’ mé gɔɔn ngie pi nyě ńgẅiin pɔ́ tà’ ncwò, ńne ńdɔgɔ pɔ́ tà’ ntʉ́m ńdÿɔ́’ɔ, légwɔ́ gie pi ge pɔ́ɔnte nò gie pi la zẅíŋ, á gwɔ́ nò nénʉ́ gie á fóo ná nkʉ̀ mbòŋo.
en: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ: that whether I come and see you, or else be absent, I may hear of your affairs, that ye stand fast in one spirit, with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel;

ngiemboon: Megàŋ mbù lɔɔn ḿvege gẅi tà pi cÿɔ’. Pi lɔɔn tè cÿɔ’, mbà á ge gwɔ́ mbwo pɔ́b, é gwɔ́ liŋé ngie pɔ́ ée ná mánzsè lepyé, tá’ é ké gwɔ́ mbwo pi é gwɔ́ liŋé ngie pi ée nà mánzsè letsẅɛ́. E Ssé zɔ gÿo mɔɔn menò.
en: and in nothing terrified by your adversaries: which is to them an evident token of perdition, but to you of salvation, and that of God.

ngiemboon: A la cÿó gʉm gí, pi gwɔ́ pʉ̀a Kristo, tá á ké tè gwɔ́ pɔ́ ndà’ pú’u wɔ́, á gíŋe ńgwɔ́ mbɔɔ légyá ngɔ́’ ńtí Kristo.
en: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer for his sake;

ngiemboon: Yɛ̌ ngɔ́’ ée ncù gẅie pi ne ḿma’a, mbà pi la gyá pá’ mèŋ m ma’a. Mèŋ n kě ńnyé ḿma’a pɔ́ wɛ̌.
en: having the same conflict which ye saw in me, and now hearto bein me.

ngiemboon: Tà légwɔ́ gie pi laa Kristo léen ńtemte zɔ tè ne ńgÿo pi kẅi’i shÿɔgɔ wɔ́? Tà ntí gie Kristo lɔg ńkwoŋo gẅi zɔ tè ne ńkẅiŋte gẅi wɔ́? Tà pia Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a zɔ tè nùɔ wɔ́? Tà pi tè gẅiin nkwòŋe laa tsɔ́ɔn mezìŋe á tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi wɔ́?
en: Ifthere betherefore any consolation in Christ, if any comfort of love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any bowels and mercies,

ngiemboon: Pá’ áa pú’u la, pi gÿo n kág lê ntʉ́m wɔ̀ɔn ntsèm, pi ké ne ńgẅiin pɔ́ tà’ nkwaŋá, ńgẅiin pɔ́ tà’ ncwò, ńgẅiin pɔ́ tà’ ntʉ́m, ńgíŋ ńgẅiin pɔ́ tà’ ntí letsɔ̌ɔn nò.
en: fulfil ye my joy, that ye be likeminded, having the same love,beingof one accord, of one mind.

ngiemboon: Tà pi gÿo tsɔ́ mmó gie á gwɔ́ pɔ́ lélɔg sá’ ndʉ̀’, kà pɔ́ lélɔg fáŋ sẅɛ̀ɛ sẅɛ̀ɛ wɔ́. Pi sẅí’i pɔ́ mbùm gi ńnáa ssé, ńdíe petsɔ́ pʉ̀a pɔ́ pá’ fʉ̀’ gie pɔ́ cʉa gẅi la.
en: Letnothingbe donethrough strife or vainglory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.

ngiemboon: Tà nyìŋ gẅi kwaŋ pɔ́ ndà’ yé twó. À gíŋe ńkwaŋa ye petsɔ́ pʉ̀a.
en: Look not every man on his own things, but every man also on the things of others.

ngiemboon: Pi gẅiin nkwaŋá gẅie Yěsô Kristo la gẅiin.
en: Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus:

ngiemboon: ńcʉŋe nà légwɔ́ gie pɔ́ Ssé ge ké ńnéŋe pɔ́ tà’a jʉ’ wɔ́.
en: who, being in the form of God, thought it not robbery to be equal with God:

ngiemboon: Mé zyé yé pá’ mé zyé pʉ̀a mesoŋ.
en: but made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men:

ngiemboon: tà mé kíme yé nà tÿǒ nkǐ, á kwé.
en: and being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, and became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross.

ngiemboon: ńná lezíŋ sie é cʉa mezíŋ ntsèm né yé,
en: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name:

ngiemboon: á ná mekù’ cʉa mefùɔ né yé.
en: that at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, ofthingsin heaven, andthingsin earth, andthingsunder the earth;

ngiemboon: Mé ge gɔ́ɔn pú’u, é lɔg ná mekù’ á mbwo Ssé Tá.
en: andthatevery tongue should confess that Jesus ChristisLord, to the glory of God the Father.

ngiemboon: Á cʉa pú’u, mbà mefɛ́ pɔ́ɔn pè ntʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, pá’ pi ee ńké ńzɔɔn ńjú’u pɔ́ ncwò Ssé tà fó pá’ n daa tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi la, pi kě ne ńgíŋe ńtÿɔ́gɔ kwò pɔ́ mǒ á nà fʉ̀’ɔɔn gie mèŋ n te tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi wɔ́ lɔɔn. Pi kag tʉ̀, tà nyìŋ gÿo megʉa. E Ssé kéen ńgÿo pi tsẅɛ́, pi lêen ńké fa’ mefà’ mie é pumo ná pʉ̀a pie é kéen ńtsẅɛ́.
en: Wherefore, my beloved, as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling.

ngiemboon: E Ssé zɔɔn ne fa’a tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m pi légwɔ́ gie pi ge kwoŋ shúm sie é poŋo yé, mbɔɔ légwɔ́ gie pi ge gíŋ gÿo sɛ̌ shúm.
en: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do ofhisgood pleasure.

ngiemboon: Pi gÿo kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ té zẅɛ́te, té tsɔ̌ zòŋo nò tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi,
en: Do all things without murmurings and disputings:

ngiemboon: légwɔ́ gie, atsɔ́ mmó gie mé ge la’a gẅi mǒ á té gwɔ́ wó wɔ́. A*lɔ̌’ɔ gí á le gwɔ́ wó wɔ́. Pi lɔg ńgwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ yɔɔn njÿó, ńgwɔ́ púɔ Ssé pie tsɔ́*lɔ̌’ té ná pɔ́b wɔ́, à lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ ngie pi ee kyɛ̀’ gie á kyɛ’ɛ jʉ’ tsetsɛ̀ɛ yɔɔn nùɔ pʉ̀a pie é gwɔ́ pɔ́ megàŋa cÿɔ̌ nò, ńgíŋ ńgwɔ́ pà sẅáŋ lekÿɛ̀bɛ.
en: that ye may be blameless and harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation, among whom ye shine as lights in the world;

ngiemboon: Pú’u, pi lɔgɔ pá’ pi ne ńtsẅii nkʉ̀ mbòŋo mbwo pɔ́b, é gẅie é gÿo mé gẅiin le gwɔ́ tèmì. À lá’a lyɛ̌’ gie Kristo gǐŋ ńtó, n díe gẅí, à nò gí poŋo wɔ̀ɔn. Wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ gyá ngie mefà’ mie mèŋ n da gyá ngɔ́’ fa’ é la tè cʉa sẅɛ̀ɛ wɔ́.
en: holding forth the word of life; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ, that I have not run in vain, neither laboured in vain.

ngiemboon: À gẅi lézáb ntʉ́m ná Yěsô aa pá’ shúm pwɔ́’ sie pi nuŋe mvfò Ssé, ńgwɔ́ gie mé lɔɔn ńzẅé wɔ̀ɔn, mbà é lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ pá’ wɔ̀ɔn pwɔ́’ gẅie mèŋ n nuŋé mvfò Ssé. Á tó ńgwɔ́ pú’u, mbà mèŋ n gee shÿó mbòŋo, mbà pege ge pú kág.
en: Yea, and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith, I joy, and rejoice with you all.

ngiemboon: Tà mbàa pi gí pi kág, pege pú ńkág métsèm.
en: For the same cause also do ye joy, and rejoice with me.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńtsɔ́ɔɔn létúmo Timoté né pi, pá’ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Yěsô lɔɔn ńzẅíŋ. À tó ńgúɔ gẅí, ḿbiŋ nzèm shwóŋó wɔ̀ɔn, n dɔg ńgẅiin shÿɔ́g,
en: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you, that I also may be of good comfort, when I know your state.

ngiemboon: é gwɔ́ pɔ́ ndà’ yé gẅie peg yé ne sáŋa nò ná menò mie ée ná mèŋ, ńgíŋe ne ḿmÿɔgɔ mí.
en: For I have no man likeminded, who will naturally care for your state.

ngiemboon: Petsɔ́ pʉ̀a ne sáŋa nò pɔ́ ndà’ ná yɔ́b twó tà pɔ́ téen sáŋa nò ná nò Yěsô Kristo wɔ́.
en: For all seek their own, not the things which are Jesus Christ's.

ngiemboon: Tá ńgʉa ná Timoté, mbà pi zsě ngie à gẅiin mà mbòŋo. Peg yé ka pǔ ńtsẅi nkʉ̀ mbòŋo mbwo lá’. Á pú ńkẅéte wɔ̀ɔn ndʉŋ ndʉŋ pá’ múɔ mbòŋo kẅéte tá we la.
en: But ye know the proof of him, that, as a son with the father, he hath served with me in the gospel.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńkwaŋa ngie mé lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ tà ńzá’ ntsaŋ yɔ̀ɔn, mbà mèŋ n ge gwóon túmo yé né pi.
en: Him therefore I hope to send presently, so soon as I shall see how it will go with me.
