en: For it had been better for them not to have known the way of righteousness, than, after they have knownit, to turn from the holy commandment delivered unto them.

ngiemboon: Mbà mmó gie á gÿǒ wɔ́b, á lɔgɔ ḿbúmte pá’ sag lekid la gɔɔn ngie: «Mengwe zé’e ḿbíŋ ńjÿó ze’é yé. Mé sɔgɔ kúnɔ́ɔn tà ńgwaa tsẅé jʉ’ à gʉa ńkele tsɛ̀ɛ tetɔ́b».
en: But it is happened unto them according to the true proverb, The dogisturned to his own vomit again; and the sow that was washed to her wallowing in the mire.

ngiemboon: Meshǔ pɔ́ɔn pé tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, mèŋ n gee pá’ɔɔn ńdɔgɔ ńnáa ŋwa’ne mbwo pi ngʉ̀a mbʉ́a. Áa tsɛ̀ɛ meŋwà’ne ŋwɛ́ membʉ́a, mèŋ n ne fa’a lékímte gẅi mmó gie pi la zí’i, ńdɔgɔ pú’u, ḿbʉ́’te legyè sí ngie e kwaŋa nò ndʉŋ ndʉŋ.
en: This second epistle, beloved, I now write unto you; inbothwhich I stir up your pure minds by way of remembrance:

ngiemboon: Pi kímte shwóŋè gie pà*ntsẅì nkʉ̀ Ssé pe Ndʉalʉ̌a la tʉ́ njÿó ńgɔɔn, mbɔɔ*lepʉ̌ sie megàŋ ntúm Yěsô ka zí’i gẅí, éfóo mbwo Cʉ̀apʉ̀a á gwɔ́ nyìŋ gẅie à gÿo pege tsẅɛ́ɛ.
en: that ye may be mindful of the words which were spoken before by the holy prophets, and of the commandment of us the apostles of the Lord and Saviour:

ngiemboon: Pi zɔɔn ḿvɔg ńzsé ngie, áa gÿo gwɔ́ nà melyɛ’ɛ́ lá’ nzsó nzèm, etsɔ́ pʉ̀a kẅɛ, ńgÿo yɔ́b pɔ́ mmó gie membùm mɔ́b ne ńtsóte wɔ́b ngie pɔ́ gÿo. Pɔ́ ge gẅe gẅí,
en: knowing this first, that there shall come in the last days scoffers, walking after their own lusts,

ngiemboon: é gɔɔn ngie: Yěsô la tè gɔɔn ngie à ge tó gwaa? À gwɔ́? Metá pég léen ńdá’ ńkwéte, à tsɔ́ mmó ké laa kúbe, à kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ ké ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ pá’ á la gwɔ́ tà fó pá’ mé la nyɛte njÿó.
en: and saying, Where is the promise of his coming? for since the fathers fell asleep, all things continue asthey werefrom the beginning of the creation.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ gwaa gɔɔn pú’u, ńne ńdege tà ńzsé zsé ngie e Ssé la lá’ ńnyɛte lepwó pɔ́ tsetsá’ tà ntyě sagá. À la lɔg pɔ́ shwóŋè yé ńgÿo, tsetsá’ fó tsɛ̀ɛ ntse ńkẅɛ, á lɔg pɔ́ ntse ńnyɛte.
en: For this they willingly are ignorant of, that by the word of God the heavens were of old, and the earth standing out of the water and in the water:

ngiemboon: À la gíŋe ńdɔg pɔ́ ntse, é ntse gẅie é la pú ńjÿó tsetsá’ ńdɔg ḿbyág ngwòŋ we fʉ̀’ʉ mvfò,
en: whereby the world that then was, being overflowed with water, perished:

ngiemboon: ńgʉa nà lefaŋ se fʉ̀’ɔɔn, mbɔɔ tsetsá’ ye fʉ̀’ɔɔn, mbà yɛ̌ Shwóŋè zɔ̌ le’e wɔ́b le’e ńdɔgɔ ńzẅí’te lyɛ̌’ gie e Ssé ge gÿo ŋág megàŋ mbù pé. Á ge lá’ gwɔ́ lyɛ̌’ó, mmɔ̌g gÿo lepwó pɔ́ tsetsá’ pú ńdége.
en: but the heavens and the earth, which are now, by the same word are kept in store, reserved unto fire against the day of judgment and perdition of ungodly men.

ngiemboon: Tá’ meshǔ pɔ́ɔn pe tʉ́ nzẅìŋ, à tsɔ̌ tà’a mmó aa wó gẅie á té poŋ ngie pi lege wɔ́. Áa mbwo Cʉ̀apʉ̀a tà’a lyɛ̌’ gwɔ́ pá’ ngù’ ntsá’, ngù’ ntsá’ gwɔ́ pá’ tà’a lyɛ̌’.
en: But, beloved, be not ignorant of this one thing, that one dayiswith the Lord as a thousand years, and a thousand years as one day.

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a kaa líi légÿo mmó gie à la ka’a légÿo pá’ tsɔ́ pʉ̀a ne ńkwaŋa wɔ́. À gwiin pɔ́ kwɔ́gɔ nnɛ́ ńtí gẅí, á nue à tè ne ńkwoŋo ngie à tsɔ̌ tà’ nyìŋ pyé wɔ́, à ne ńkwoŋo pɔ́ ngie pʉ̀a metsèm gẅiin shÿó lékúbe mà.
en: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.

ngiemboon: Alyɛ’ɛ́ lá’ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ge lá’ tó pɔ́ pá’ tsǒŋ tóo lá. À gwɔ́ lyɛ̌’ó, lefaŋ gwaa mag, ejʉ’ zẅɛ tà mé pɔ́g. Eshúm sie ée lefaŋ e pú shÿó, tsetsá’ pâ shúm sie ée ndùmo e pú ḿmag.
en: But the day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night; in the which the heavens shall pass away with a great noise, and the elements shall melt with fervent heat, the earth also and the works that are therein shall be burned up.

ngiemboon: Pá’ shúm asɛ̌ ge gÿo pú mag lɔɔn, á lɔgɔ shwóŋó gẅi ntí gie á póŋ ngie pi ńnéŋe pú’u. Á ne ńzɛ́te ngie pi ńnéŋe pɔ́ nà ntí gie Ssé ne ńkwoŋo, ńzsé pɔ́ ndà’ yé,
en: Seeingthenthatall these things shall be dissolved, what mannerof personsought ye to be inallholy conversation and godliness,

ngiemboon: ńne ńzẅí’te ngie lyɛ’ɛ́ lá’ Ssé tó, ńne ńkaga tʉ̀ légwɔ́ gie á ge lwo tó. Áa lyɛ̌’ gie mmɔ̌g ge lá’ túɔ lefaŋ e keme, é jʉ’ tóo ńtwěen, à kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gie áa lefaŋ wɔ́ à sí ńtsó.
en: looking for and hasting unto the coming of the day of God, wherein the heavens being on fire shall be dissolved, and the elements shall melt with fervent heat?

ngiemboon: Tá’ e Ssé la pÿé lefaŋ se sẅé, ḿbÿé tsetsá’ ye sẅé, á jʉ’ gie mé ge lá’ gwɔ́ wó é gÿo pɔ́ mmó gie áa ndʉŋ ndʉŋ mvfò yé. Áa mmó gie pege neŋé ne ńzẅí’te.
en: Nevertheless we, according to his promise, look for new heavens and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness.

ngiemboon: Meshǔ pɔ́ɔn pe tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, áa mmó gie á gÿo, pi gwɔ́ zẅí’te yɛ̌ lyɛ’ɛ́ lá’, ńkàg tʉ̀ ńnéŋe té*lɔ̌’. Pi légÿo tsɔ́ mmó gie Ssé ge kaga gẅi mǒ wɔ́, pia pɔ̌ piŋ ńgwɔ́ tè cÿɔ́g.
en: Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.

ngiemboon: Tà’a mmó gẅie á píŋ ně ńzɛ́te ngie pi kímte á gwɔ́ pɔ́ ngie, Cʉ̀apʉ̀a pʉ́le ńzẅí’te, à těen ńtɔ́gɔ ńtóo wɔ́, léná shÿó pá’ ńgwɔ́ pʉ̀a tsẅɛ́. Á gíŋe ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ mmó gie Pɔl, fɛ́ wege, ńgwɔ́ shǔ wege la gɔɔn tsɛ̀ɛ meŋwe’e mie à la náa mbwo pi. À la lɔg pɔ́ zse nò gie Ssé la náa mbwo yé tá ńdɔg ńgɔɔn.
en: And accountthatthe longsuffering of our Lordissalvation; even as our beloved brother Paul also according to the wisdom given unto him hath written unto you;

ngiemboon: À gɔɔn yɛ̌ nò tsɛ̀ɛ meŋwà’ne mie à ŋwe’e ntsèm, á fʉ̀’ gie à gɔɔn nò tà ńkíme yɔɔn twó nò. Mejʉ’ mie é tʉʉ lé jú’ ée tsɛ̀ɛ meŋwà’ne mé. Áa mmó gie á gÿó pʉ̀a pie é mwoonte mwoonte, ńnyé tè kwà’ ńzsé jʉ’ gie pɔ́ tyé wó, kúbe nò gie é lɔgɔ ńgɔɔn. Á gíŋe ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ pá’ pɔ́ gÿo ná metsɔ́ mejʉ’ ŋwà’ne Ssé. Pɔ́ ké ńgÿo pú’u, ńdɔg ńtóŋo ndoon ńnéŋe twó pɔ́b.
en: as also in allhisepistles, speaking in them of these things; in which are some things hard to be understood, which they that are unlearned and unstable wrest, asthey doalso the other scriptures, unto their own destruction.

ngiemboon: Meshǔ pɔ́ɔn pe tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, á gʉa ná pi, mbà mèŋ n tʉ̌ njÿó é shwóŋó gẅí. Pi ké ńdaga twó gí, ḿbɔ́gɔ pà tè shʉ́ ńkúu wɔ́b léfʉte gẅi pi fʉa mánzsè, ńzye lémʉ’te ná mmó gie letʉ́m sí ka zɔɔn ńtyé mǒ tà ńtyé.
en: Ye therefore, beloved, seeing ye knowthese thingsbefore, beware lest ye also, being led away with the error of the wicked, fall from your own stedfastness.

ngiemboon: Pi lɔg pɔ́ pá’ pi ne ńzsé Yěsô Kristo, Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege, ńgwɔ́ nyìŋ gẅie à gÿo pege tsẅɛ́ɛ, ńdɔg ńgʉa né mvfò, ńzsé ngie à ge kẅi’i cÿó gʉm gí, é ne ńgwɔ́ɔ né pi. Legú’ à gwɔ́ mbwo yé tà fó fʉ̀’ɔɔn, à lá’a ńgwɔ́ɔ pɔ́ pú’u!*Amen.
en: But grow in grace, andinthe knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ. To himbeglory both now and for ever. Amen.

ngiemboon: Peg ŋwe’e yɔɔn ŋwà’ne ńnáa né pi ńdɔgɔ shwóŋó gẅi nò ná shwóŋè gie á gÿo mé gwɔ́ wó, á gie aa ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ wó tà fó nzyète shúm ntsèm, peg la lɔg metuŋó még ńjú’, ńdɔg nÿɔ́g még ńgyá, ńnyɛte ńdíe ńdɔg mbwó még ńkíbe.
en: That which was from the beginning, which we have heard, which we have seen with our eyes, which we have looked upon, and our hands have handled, of the Word of life;

ngiemboon: E Ssé la gwɔ́ tà ńtó ńnáa wɛ̌ le gwɔ́ né peg, peg gyá yé, tà peg ee pá’ɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pàjÿò ńgyá, ńne shwóŋó gẅi nò ná le gwɔ́ tèmì gẅie à la fó lejʉ́ŋ Tá ńtó ńnyɛ́ mbùm ye mbwo peg.
en: (for the life was manifested, and we have seenit, and bear witness, and shew unto you that eternal life, which was with the Father, and was manifested unto us;)

ngiemboon: Ammó gie peg la gyá ḿbiŋ ńjú’, áa yɛ̌ gie peg shwóŋó gẅi gí, ńzsé ngie pi ge temte ná peg, pege metsèm pú ńtemte ná Tá mbɔɔ ná Míŋ we Yěsô Kristo.
en: that which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowshipiswith the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.

ngiemboon: Peg ŋwe’e yɔɔn nò ńnáa mbwo pi, légwɔ́ gie tsɔ́ mmó té ge zága nà weglekág wɔ́.
en: And these things write we unto you, that your joy may be full.

ngiemboon: Anò gie Yěsô Kristo la shwóŋó wég, à yɔɔn gie peg ge shwǒŋ pi lɔɔn. À la gɔɔn ngie: E Ssé gwɔ́ pɔ́ kyɛ̀’, mbɔɔ méjʉ’ʉ nzěm à tè ná ngÿǒ menò me wɔ́.
en: This then is the message which we have heard of him, and declare unto you, that God is light, and in him is no darkness at all.

ngiemboon: Pege lɔɔn ńgɔɔn ngie pega pɔ̌ temté, tá ḿbiŋe ne ńgiŋe tsɛ̀ɛ nzěm, mbà pege cÿɔɔ nò, ńdɔgɔ tě ńgÿo mmó gie à ne ńkwoŋo wɔ́.
en: If we say that we have fellowship with him, and walk in darkness, we lie, and do not the truth:

ngiemboon: Tá ńké ńgwɔ́ gie pege lɔɔn ne ńgiŋe ná jʉ’e fɔ̌g pá’ yé lê twó yé aa nà jʉ’ʉ fɔ̌g la, mbà pege ge pú gẅiin tà’ ncwò tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege, metse Míŋ we Yěsô leen ńké sɔgɔ wégè ná nò tepòŋ ntsèm.
en: but if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.

ngiemboon: Pege lɔɔn ńgɔɔn ngie nò tepòŋ té ná pege wɔ́, mbà pege lɔgɔ pú’u, fʉa mánzsè, ḿbiŋe tě ńzsé nò nénʉ́ gie á fóo mbwo Ssé wɔ́.
en: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.

ngiemboon: Pege lɔɔn ńzẅíŋ mefʉa mégè, mbà Ssé ge lege ná né pege, éfó ná pege kẅile nò tepòŋ ntsèm, mélà’mie e Ssé ka’a mmó ńgÿo, á gwɔ́ ndʉŋ ndʉŋ
en: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive usoursins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

ngiemboon: Pege ke ńgɔɔn ngie pege tè ngàŋ mefʉa wɔ́, mbà pege lɔgɔ Ssé ńtóŋo ngàŋa cÿɔ nò, ashwóŋè yé lěen ńdɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ ná pege wɔ́.
en: If we say that we have not sinned, we make him a liar, and his word is not in us.

ngiemboon: Epúɔ mémá pɔ́ɔn, mèŋ n ŋwe’e mɔɔn menò légwɔ́ gie pi ge gẅiin shÿó tà pi le gÿo nò tepòŋ wɔ́. Tá ńgwɔ́ gie nyìŋ gÿo nò tepòŋ, mbà pege gẅiin wege nyìŋ lejʉ́ŋ Tá, á gwɔ́ Yěsô Kristo, yé gẅie aa ndʉŋ ndʉŋ mvfò Ssé.
en: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:

ngiemboon: À la zɔɔn ńdɔgɔ twó yé, ńnuŋe pwɔ́’ pá’ à lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ e Ssé lege menò tepòŋ mégè. Pá’ à lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ á le lege pɔ́ ndà’ mégè wɔ́, pá’ ńgwɔ́ á gíŋe ńdege me pʉ̀a mesoŋ ntsèm tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó.
en: and he is the propitiation for our sins: and not for our's only, but also forthe sins ofthe whole world.

ngiemboon: Pege lɔɔn ńgÿo mmó gie Ssé ne ńtsẅii né pege, mbà wɛ̌ légwɔ́ ge nyɛɛ wégè ngie pege zsé Ssé
en: And hereby we do know that we know him, if we keep his commandments.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ gẅie à gɔɔn ngie: «Mèŋ n zsé yé» Tá ńké tè mbʉ̌ mé kú’te, mbà ngàŋ aa ngàŋa cÿɔ nò, anò nénʉ́ gie á fó mbwo Ssé lɔgɔ tě ńgwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m ngàŋ wɔ́.
en: He that saith, I know him, and keepeth not his commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him.

ngiemboon: Tá nyìŋ gẅie à kú’te shwóŋè Ssé, aa nyìŋ gẅie à kwa’ ńkwoŋ Ssé tà shwóŋó nò. Wɔɔn aa pá’ pege lɔg ńzsé ngie pega Ssé léen ńtemte.
en: But whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected: hereby know we that we are in him.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgɔɔn ngie: Peg Ssé léen ńtemte, á zɛ́te ngie ngÿǒ menò mé gwɔ́ pá’ me Yěsô Kristo laa pú’u.
en: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked.

ngiemboon: Meshǔ pɔ́ɔn pe tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, sɔɔn té gwɔ́ pɔ́*lepʉ̌ sẅé sie mèŋ n ŋwe’e fʉ̀’ɔɔn ńnáa né pi wɔ́, à gwɔ́ pɔ́ nzẅìŋe*lepʉ̌ gẅie pi ne ńzsé tà fó nzyeté, wɛ̌ nzẅìŋe*lepʉ̌ à gwɔ́ pɔ́ shwóŋè gie pi la jú’.
en: Brethren, I write no new commandment unto you, but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning.

ngiemboon: Tà mbɔɔ pú’u,*lepʉ̌ sie mèŋ n ŋwe’e ńnáa né pi, ée pá’ɔɔn, ńké ngwɔ́ se sẅé, ée se sẅé ńcʉa nà mmó gie mé ne ńgyá ná Kristo mbɔɔ ná pi gí. Pi zɔɔn ńgyá pá’ nzěm ne ḿmaga, tà mbà kwà’ kyɛ̀’ zyě lékyɛ’ jʉ’.
en: Again, a new commandment I write unto you, which thing is true in him and in you: because the darkness is past, and the true light now shineth.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ gẅie à gɔɔn ngie ngÿǒ menò mé ee me jʉ’e fɔ̌g, ḿbiŋe ne ḿbʉa fɛ́ we, ngàŋ lɔgɔ ńnyé ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ nzěm.
en: He that saith he is in the light, and hateth his brother, is in darkness even until now.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ gẅie à kwoŋo fɛ́ we, aa nyìŋ gẅie ngÿǒ menò mé ée me jʉ’ʉ fɔ̌g. À lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ á le kwɔɔnte nà tsɔ́ mmó ńgwe ssé wɔ́.
en: He that loveth his brother abideth in the light, and there is none occasion of stumbling in him.

ngiemboon: Tá nyìŋ gẅie à pʉa fɛ́ we, aa nyìŋ gẅie ngÿǒ menò ée me tsɛ̀ɛ nzěm, á giŋe tsɛ̀ɛ nzěm, ńké tè ne ńzsé jʉ’ gie à gee né wó wɔ́, mélà’mie nzěm léen ńgÿo á fʉ̀.
en: But he that hateth his brother is in darkness, and walketh in darkness, and knoweth not whither he goeth, because that darkness hath blinded his eyes.

ngiemboon: Penkʉ́ pɔ́ɔn, mèŋ n gee tsɛ̀ɛ yɔɔn ŋwà’ne, ńne shwóŋó gẅi ngie e Ssé cʉa nà mmó gie Yěsô Kristo la gÿo, ńdege menò tepòŋ mí ńná né pi.
en: I write unto you, little children, because your sins are forgiven you for his name's sake.

ngiemboon: N ne shwóŋó gẅi melÿò ngie: Pi ee pɛ́’ɛ̀ ńne zsé Nyìŋ gẅie aa wó tà fó nzyeté, ńne shwóŋó gẅi pûɔ shum ngie pi kéen ńtʉ ńcʉa nyìŋ tepòŋ.
en: I write unto you, fathers, because ye have known himthat isfrom the beginning. I write unto you, young men, because ye have overcome the wicked one. I write unto you, little children, because ye have known the Father.

ngiemboon: Penkʉ́ pɔ́ɔn, mèŋ n gee pá’ɔɔn ńne ńŋwe’e shwóŋó gẅi ngie pi ne ńzsé Tá wege, ńgʉa ná pi melÿò, mbà mèŋ n gee pá’ɔɔn ne shwóŋó gẅi ngie pi ne ńzsé nyìŋ gẅie aa wó tà fó nzyeté, ńgʉa ná pi pûɔ shum, mèŋ n ne shwóŋó gẅi ngie, pi ne ńtʉte tʉte, ashwóŋè Ssé ké ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ ntʉ́m pi, pi kěen ńtʉ̀ ńcʉa nyìŋ tepòŋ.
en: I have written unto you, fathers, because ye have known himthat isfrom the beginning. I have written unto you, young men, because ye are strong, and the word of God abideth in you, and ye have overcome the wicked one.

ngiemboon: Tà pi tÿɔ́g nÿɔ́g mí nà njÿó, tà pi tÿɔ́g nÿɔ́g nà shúm sie ée tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó. Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńkwoŋ njÿó, mbà à tè ne ńkwoŋo Ssé Tá wɔ́,
en: Love not the world, neither the thingsthat arein the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him.

ngiemboon: á nue àkɔ́ɔkɔ́ɔ gie áa tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó, pá’ shúm sie mbùm nyìŋ tsóte yé á tsɔ́ɔn, pá’ shúm sie nyìŋ záb lejÿɔ́g mǒ ńtsɔ́ɔn légẅiin, mbɔɔ shúm sie pʉ̀a mesoŋ lɔgɔ ńŋá’te, sɛ̌ shúm téen fó mbwo Tá wege wɔ́, éfó pɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó.
en: For all thatisin the world, the lust of the flesh, and the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life, is not of the Father, but is of the world.

ngiemboon: Njÿó zɔɔn ńgwɔ́ ssé ne ńcʉa cʉa, tà mbɔɔ shúm sie pʉ̀a mesoŋ ne ńgyá tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó ńtsɔ́ɔn légẅiin. Tá nyìŋ gẅie à gÿo mmó gie Ssé ne ńkwoŋo, à ge gwɔ́ pɔ́ wó fʉ̀’ ntsèm.
en: And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.

ngiemboon: Penkʉ́ pɔ́ɔn, afʉ̀’ʉ nzsònzèm ne ńku’u. Pi la jú’ mé gɔɔn ngie, angàŋ mbù Kristo ge lá’ tó. Áa fʉ̀’ɔɔn, mbà megàŋ mbù Kristo kěen ńtó tà ńgyɔ́ɔn gyɔ́ɔn. Áa mmó gie á gÿǒ pege zsé ngie à fʉ̀’ʉ nzsònzèm ne ńku’u.
en: Little children, it is the last time: and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come, even now are there many antichrists; whereby we know that it is the last time.

ngiemboon: Megàŋ mbù fǒ pɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ cú’tè yégè ńkẅɛ ńgʉa. Pɔ́ ka zɔ̌ɔn tè pʉ̀a pégè wɔ́. Pɔ́ kaa pé’è ńgwɔ́ pʉ̀a pege, mbà pɔ́ ka zso tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege. Tá’, á ka kě ḿboŋ ngie à kẅɛ pɔ́ pú’u, ná pɔ́b, áwɔ̌wɔ́ɔ gyá ngie pɔ́ ka tè pʉ̀a pege wɔ́,
en: They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they wouldno doubthave continued with us: butthey went out, that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us.

ngiemboon: ńgʉa ná pi, mbà Kristo ka náa Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a né pi. Áa mmó gie á gÿo pi métsèm zsé nò nénʉ́.
en: But ye have an unction from the Holy One, and ye know all things.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ka gwaa ŋwe’e ŋwà’ne ná né pi mèŋ n tě ńdɔgɔ ńgɔɔn ngie pi tè ne ńzsé nò nénʉ́ gwɔ́ wɔ́. Á gwɔ́ pɔ́ nò gie pi ne ńzsé. Pi giŋé ńne ńzsé ngie, etsɔ́ cÿɔ nò lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ é le tsɛ̀ɛ nò nénʉ́ kẅɛ.
en: I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth, but because ye know it, and that no lie is of the truth.

ngiemboon: Angàŋa cÿɔ nò aa wɔ̌? À tè gwɔ́ pɔ́ nyìŋ gẅie à gɔɔn ngie Yěsô tè*Nzà’nkÿo wɔ́ le? Aa ngàŋ mbù Kristo, ńgwɔ́ nyìŋ gẅie à gwaa lʉ’ʉ nò Tá, ńdʉ’ mbɔɔ ye Múɔ.
en: Who is a liar but he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ? He is antichrist, that denieth the Father and the Son.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńdʉ’ʉ lézẅíŋe nò Múɔ, mbà à lʉ’ʉ lézẅíŋe nò Tá wege, nyìŋ gẅie à zẅiŋé nò Mùɔ, à giŋé ńzẅíŋe ye Tá wege.
en: Whosoever denieth the Son, the same hath not the Father:(but) he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also.

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿo mèŋ n gɔɔn mbwo pi ngie pi kú’te shwóŋè gie pi la jú’ tà fó nzyeté kwà’ mboŋó. Ashwóŋè gie pi la jú’ tà fó nzyeté lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m gẅí, mbà pi gí ge temte ná Múɔ mbɔɔ ná Tá.
en: Let that therefore abide in you, which ye have heard from the beginning. If that which ye have heard from the beginning shall remain in you, ye also shall continue in the Son, and in the Father.

ngiemboon: Kristo la ka’a mbwo pege ngie, pega Ssé ge lá’a gwɔ́ pɔ́ fʉ̀’ ntsèm.
en: And this is the promise that he hath promised us,eveneternal life.

ngiemboon: Yɔɔn áa mmó gie n kě ne fa’a léshwóŋó gẅí, ńtí pʉ̀a pie é fa’a léfʉte gẅi pi fʉa mánzsè,
en: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you.

ngiemboon: ńgʉa ná pi, mbà Kristo la náa Zẅìge yé né pi. Yɛ̌ Zẅìge piŋ ńké ńne ńgwɔ́ ná pi, áa mmó gie á gÿo, á té ne ńzɛ́te ngie nyìŋ mesoŋ zí’i gẅi mmó wɔ́, á nue Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a ne ńzí’i gẅi kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ, ammó gie á la’te piŋ ńgwɔ́ nénʉ́, é té cÿɔ̌ nò wɔ́. Pú’u la, pi ké ńda pɔ́ nnɛ́ ná Kristo pá’ Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a la zí’i gẅí.
en: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you, and ye need not that any man teach you: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in him.

ngiemboon: Pá’ áa pú’u la, mbà penkʉ́ pɔ́ɔn, pi ké ńda nnɛ́ pɔ́ ná Kristo, ńzsé ngie á ge lá’a lyɛ̌’ gie à kẅɛ̌, pege é le tsɔ́ mmó pɔ́g, ntʉ́m wégè pú le cÿɔ’ɔ nà tsɔ́ mmó wɔ́. Á gwɔ́ lyɛ̌’ó, pege é le tyé mvfò yé eshʉ́ kúu wégè wɔ́.
en: And now, little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.

ngiemboon: Pi ne ńzsé ngie Kristo gÿo mmó gie áa ndʉŋ ndʉŋ mvfò Ssé, pú’u la pi gíŋe ńzsé ngie nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgÿo mmó gie áa ndʉŋ ndʉŋ mvfò Ssé, mbà à ge cʉ́’ʉ míŋ Ssé.
en: If ye know that he is righteous, ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him.

ngiemboon: Pi gyá pá’ Tá wege kwoŋo wégè kwoŋ tà ńtóŋo wégè lê púɔ pé, éshwóŋó nò pege gwɔ́ pɛ̌. Tá pʉ̀a njÿó té wégè zsé, á nue pɔ́ la tè zsé nyìŋ gẅie e Ssé ee yé wɔ́.
en: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not.

ngiemboon: Meshǔ pɔ́ɔn pe tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, pege ee fʉ̀’ɔɔn pá’ɔɔn ńgwɔ́ púɔ Ssé, tá’ ńtí gie pege ge gÿo gwɔ́ pú’u, e nyě ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ lelyěen. Pege kě ńne ńzsé ngie Kristo ge gÿo gwɔ́ tà kẅɛ, pege gyá yé pá’ aa jʉ’ó ńgwɔ́, ńgwɔ́ gie aa lêkɔ́ wɔ́, pege gwɔ́ yégè pɔ́ pú’u.
en: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.

ngiemboon: Awɔ̌wɔ́ɔ gẅie à neŋé ne ńzẅí’te ngie Kristo gÿo yɔɔn nò, à ńnéŋe ḿbɔ́ɔn pá’ ńgwɔ́*lɔ̌’ gwɔ́ ná yé, á nue Kristo aa tè*lɔ̌’.
en: And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńnéŋe ńgÿo nò tepòŋ, mbà ngàŋ lʉ’ʉ légiŋe ná*lepʉ̌ Ssé, à nue legÿo nò tepòŋ aa lelʉ’ʉ légiŋe ná*lepʉ̌ Ssé.
en: Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law: for sin is the transgression of the law.

ngiemboon: Pi ne ńzsé ngie Yěsô Kristo la tó lézyɛ́b menò tepòŋ, atsɔ́ nò tepòŋ piŋ ńké tè ná yé wɔ́.
en: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins; and in him is no sin.

ngiemboon: Áa yɛ̌, wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ gẅie à lǎ nnɛ́ ná yé, à tè gíŋe fʉa nò wɔ́, awɔ̌wɔ́ɔ gẅie à neŋé fʉa pɔ́ nò, à laa Yěsô gyá, ńké tè yé zsé.
en: Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not: whosoever sinneth hath not seen him, neither known him.

ngiemboon: Penkʉ́ pɔ́ɔn, ḿbɔ́ɔn nyìŋ légÿo pi fʉa mánzsè. Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgÿo mmó gie áa ndʉŋ ndʉŋ mvfò Ssé, mbà ngàŋ lɔgɔ ńgÿo yé pá’ Yěsô Kristo. À gÿo mmó gie áa ndʉŋ ndʉŋ mvfò Ssé.
en: Little children, let no man deceive you: he that doeth righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńké ńnéŋe ńgÿo yé pɔ́ nò tepòŋ, mbà aa nyìŋ Sátà, á nue Sátà aa ngàŋ mefʉa tà fó pɔ́ nzyète ngwòŋ. Míŋ Ssé la zɔɔn ńtó pɔ́ ńgÿo kɔ́? À la tóo ḿbyág mefà’ Sátà.
en: He that committeth sin is of the devil; for the devil sinneth from the beginning. For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that he might destroy the works of the devil.

ngiemboon: Wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ gẅie à vɔg tà ńcʉ́’ʉ míŋ Ssé, à tè gíŋe ńnéŋe ńgÿo nò tepòŋ wɔ́, á nue le gwɔ́ gẅie à fóo ná Ssé aa ná yé ńgwɔ́ pá’ mbyè mmó la. À tè gíŋe ńku’u légÿo nò tepòŋ wɔ́, á nue aa míŋ Ssé.
en: Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin; for his seed remaineth in him: and he cannot sin, because he is born of God.

ngiemboon: Pi gyá mmó gie mé fó mǒ ńdɔg ńzsé púɔ Ssé, ńgíŋe ńzsé pe Sátà. Nyìŋ lɔɔn tè gÿo mmó gie áa ndʉŋ ndʉŋ mvfò Ssé wɔ́, ńké tè kwoŋo fɛ́ we wɔ́, mbà ngàŋ tè míŋ Ssé wɔ́.
en: In this the children of God are manifest, and the children of the devil: whosoever doeth not righteousness is not of God, neither he that loveth not his brother.

ngiemboon: Anò gie pi la jú’ tà fó nzyeté á gwɔ́ pɔ́ ngie: Pege gẅiin nkwòŋe tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege.
en: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning, that we should love one another.

ngiemboon: Tà pege gwɔ́ pá’ Kain gẅie à laa nzèm Sátà, ńzẅé fɛ́ we zyé manzwě. À lɔ̌ɔn ńzẅé yé mélà’a kɔ́? Á laa nue mefà’ mé laa me tepòŋ, mé fɛ́ we gwɔ́ mie ée ndʉŋ ndʉŋ mvfò Ssé.
en: Not as Cain,whowas of that wicked one, and slew his brother. And wherefore slew he him? Because his own works were evil, and his brother's righteous.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ́ pɔ́ɔn, epʉ̀a njÿó lɔɔn ḿbʉa gẅí, tà pi mmɔɔn mmɔɔn.
en: Marvel not, my brethren, if the world hate you.

ngiemboon: Pege fó ná pá’ pege ne ńkwoŋo mefɛ́ pege, ńzsé ngie pege tè gíŋe ńgwɔ́ mepfó wɔ́, pege ee ntentʉ́. Nyìŋ gẅie à tè nyìŋ mesoŋ kwoŋ, nyě ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ mpfó.
en: We know that we have passed from death unto life, because we love the brethren. He that loveth nothisbrother abideth in death.

ngiemboon: Awɔ̌ nyìŋ wɔ́ lɔɔn ḿbʉa fɛ́ we, mbà ngàŋ aa fÿɛ́, pi piŋ ńne ńzsé ngie atsɔ̌ fÿɛ́ tè wó gẅie à gẅiin le gwɔ́ tèmì mbùm yé wɔ́.
en: Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer: and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him.

ngiemboon: Nkwòŋe ee kɔ́ mmó? Pege ee fʉ̀’ɔɔn, mbà pege zsé ngie: Yěsô la náa twó yé ńtí wégè. Pú’u la, á ne ńzɛ́te ngie pege náa twó yégè ńtí mefɛ́ pégè.
en: Hereby perceive we the loveof God, because he laid down his life for us: and we ought to lay downourlives for the brethren.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ ngàŋa mmó, ńgyá fɛ́ we ne ńzága mmó, à tè yé líe, mbà mé ge gɔɔn ngie wɛ̌ ngàŋ mmó ne kwoŋo Ssé lêkɔ́?
en: But whoso hath this world's good, and seeth his brother have need, and shutteth up his bowelsof compassionfrom him, how dwelleth the love of God in him?

ngiemboon: Penkʉ́ pɔ́ɔn, tà pege lɔg pɔ́ ndà’ ncwò ńgɔɔn né nyìŋ ngie pege kwoŋo yé. Tà é ké ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ nkwòŋe mekùb ncwò. Pege lɔg pɔ́ mmó gie pege gÿǒ, tá à gwɔ́ nò ngie pege ne ńkwoŋo yé.
en: My little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue; but in deed and in truth.

ngiemboon: Pege ge gÿo pú’u, tá zsé ngie pege ee nà gwǒŋo nò nénʉ́, é tyé mvfò Ssé ntʉ́m wégè le vɛ.
en: And hereby we know that we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before him.

ngiemboon: Ntʉ́m wégè lɔɔn ńzɔɔn sá’a wégè, mbà pege ne ńzsé ngie e Ssé fǎŋ ńcʉa ntʉ́m wégè ḿbiŋ ne ńzsé nò ntsèm.
en: For if our heart condemn us, God is greater than our heart, and knoweth all things.

ngiemboon: Meshǔ pɔ́ɔn pe tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, ntʉ́m wégè lɔɔn tè ne sá’a wégè wɔ́, mbà pege ge tyé mvfò Ssé té ne ḿvɛɛ,
en: Beloved, if our heart condemn us not,thenhave we confidence toward God.

ngiemboon: é luɔ pɔ́ kɔ́ mbwo yé wɔ́, à ná mélà’mie pege ne ńgiŋe ná*lepʉ̌ sé, ḿbiŋe ńgÿo mmó gie à ne ńkwoŋo.
en: And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.

ngiemboon: *Lepʉ̌ sé ŋwɛ́, e sɔɔn ńgwɔ́ ngie: Pege záb ntʉ́m ná Míŋ we Kristo, ḿbiŋ ńgẅiin nkwòŋe tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege, ée*lepʉ̌ sie Yěsô la záb ngie pege giŋe mǒ.
en: And this is his commandment, That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another, as he gave us commandment.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ gẅie à kú’te mbʉ̌ Ssé, à ké ńda nnɛ́ nà Ssé la, e Ssé la nnɛ́ ná yé. Pege fó nà Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a gie Ssé nǎ mbwo pege, ńzsé ngie e Ssé la nnɛ́ ná pege.
en: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him, and he in him. And hereby we know that he abideth in us, by the Spirit which he hath given us.

ngiemboon: Meshǔ pɔ́ɔn pe tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, tà pi jú’ nyìŋ gɔɔn ngie Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a áa ná yé, pi gwóon ńzẅíŋ zẅíŋ, té cwoŋo ńdíe ka áa kwà’ Zẅìge Ssé wɔ́. Á nue pà*ntsẅì nkʉ̀ Ssé pe cÿɔ̌ nò pǔ ńgyɔ́ɔn tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó tɛ’.
en: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.

ngiemboon: Ammó gie pi ge lɔg zsé Zẅìge gie á fóo mbwo Ssé à yɔɔn. Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńzẅíŋ ngie Yěsô Kristo la sele ńcʉ́’ʉ kwà’ nyìŋ mesoŋ, mbà ngàŋ gẅiin Zẅìge gie á fóo mbwo Ssé.
en: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God:

ngiemboon: Tá nyìŋ lɔɔn ńké ńdʉ’ʉ lézẅíŋ ngie Yěsô Kristo la tó ńgwɔ́ nyìŋ mesoŋ, mbà ngàŋ tè gẅiin Zẅìge gie á fóo mbwo Ssé wɔ́, ayé Zẅìge áa gie á fóo mbwo ngàŋ mbù Kristo gẅie pi la jú’ mé gɔɔn ngie à ne ńtóo. À kěen ńké ńdá’ ńtó tà ńgwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó.
en: and every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God: and this is thatspiritof antichrist, whereof ye have heard that it should come; and even now already is it in the world.

ngiemboon: Pi penkʉ́ pɔ́ɔn, pi ee nà gwǒŋo yé Ssé. Pi kéen ńdÿɔ́’ tà ńcʉa pà*ntsẅì nkʉ̀ Ssé pe cÿɔ̌ nò, mélà’mie a Zẅìge Ssé gie áa ná pi á pú ńtʉ ńcʉa ngàŋ mbù Kristo gẅie aa tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó.
en: Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.

ngiemboon: Pà*ntsẅì nkʉ̀ Ssé pe cÿɔ̌ nò, ée nà gwǒŋo ye pʉ̀a njÿó. Áa mmó gie á gÿo pɔ́ zí’i shúm é gwɔ́ pɔ́ se tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó, epʉ̀a tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó piŋ ńzẅí’te yɔ́b nò.
en: They are of the world: therefore speak they of the world, and the world heareth them.

ngiemboon: Á gʉa ná pege, mbà pege ee nà gwǒŋo ye Ssé. Nyìŋ gẅie à ne ńzsé Ssé à ne ńzẅí’te nò gie pege gɔɔn. Nyìŋ gẅie à tè ná gwǒŋo ye Ssé wɔ́, à tè yégè nò zẅí’te. Pege fó pɔ́ pú’u, tá ńzsé nò nénʉ́, ńzsé cÿɔ̌ nò.
en: We are of God: he that knoweth God heareth us; he that is not of God heareth not us. Hereby know we the spirit of truth, and the spirit of error.

ngiemboon: Meshǔ pɔ́ɔn pe tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, !pege gẅiin nkwòŋe tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege, á nue nkwòŋe fóo mbwo Ssé. Nyìŋ gẅie à gẅiin nkwòŋe aa míŋ Ssé, ńne ńzsé Ssé
en: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn tè nyìŋ mesoŋ kwoŋ, mbà à nyě tè zsě Ssé, á nue e Ssé gẅiin pɔ́ nkwòŋe.
en: He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.

ngiemboon: Anò gie Ssé la lɔg ńnyɛɛ wégè ngie à kwoŋo wégè à yɔɔn: À la túm ndà’ Míŋ we wémɔ’ɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó ngie pege cʉa nzèm yé ńgwɔ́ wó.
en: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.

ngiemboon: Nkwòŋe léen ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ pá’ɔɔn, pege zɔ la tè kwoŋ Ssé wɔ́, yé zɔ la kwoŋo wégè. À la kwoŋo wégè kwoŋ tà ńtúmo Míŋ we, á tó ńdɔgɔ twó yé ńnuŋe pwɔ́’ ńtí wégè, áa mmo gie á gÿo Ssé lege menò tepòŋ mégè.
en: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Sonto bethe propitiation for our sins.

ngiemboon: Meshǔ pɔ́ɔn pe tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, à lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ gie e Ssé la kwoŋo wégè pá’ɔɔn, mbà á ne ńzɛ́te ngie pege yégè gẅiin nkwòŋe tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege.
en: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.

ngiemboon: Atsɔ̌ nyìŋ gẅie à lǎ záb lejÿɔ́g nà Ssé à tè wó wɔ́. Tá ńgwɔ́ gie pege lɔɔn ńgẅiin nkwòŋe tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege, mbà pega Ssé lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́, nkwòŋe ye lɔgɔ ńcwoŋo ńgwɔ́ ná pege tà mmó té zága mǒ wɔ́.
en: No man hath seen God at any time. If we love one another, God dwelleth in us, and his love is perfected in us.

ngiemboon: Ammó gie á gÿo pege zsé ngie pege la nnɛ́ nà Ssé, e Ssé la nnɛ́ ná pege áa pá’ à la náa Zẅìge yé né pege.
en: Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.

ngiemboon: Peg la lɔg nÿɔ́g még ńgyá tà ńgwɔ́ gɔɔn pá’ɔɔn, ńgwɔ́ pànjÿò ńgyá ná pá’ à la túmo Míŋ we, pá’ à ge gʉa gwɔ́ nyìŋ gẅie à ge gʉa gÿo pʉ̀a tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó tsẅɛ́.
en: And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Sonto bethe Saviour of the world.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńzẅíŋ ngie Yěsô aa Míŋ Ssé, mbà Ssé lǎ nnɛ́ nà ngàŋ, angàŋ gíŋe ńda yé nnɛ́ nà Ssé.
en: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God, God dwelleth in him, and he in God.

ngiemboon: E Ssé gẅiin pɔ́ nkwòŋe, nyìŋ lɔɔn ńne ńkwoŋo pʉ̀a mesoŋ, mbà ngàŋ la nnɛ́ nà Ssé, e Ssé la nnɛ́ ná yé.
en: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.

ngiemboon: Pege lɔɔn ńgẅiin nkwòŋe ntʉ́m pege tà tsɔ́ mmó té mǒ zág, pege é le kwaŋte lyɛ’ɛ́ létsɔ́’te mentsaŋ ntʉ́m wégè vɛ wɔ́. Pú’u, mélà’mie wege leńnéŋe tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó yɔɔn aa pá’ we Yěsô Kristo.
en: Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.

ngiemboon: Nkwòŋe vɔg tà ńgwɔ́ ssé, ecÿɔ’ mag. Nkwòŋe lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ tà tsɔ́ mmó té mǒ zág, é pyága lecÿɔ’, nyìŋ gwaa cÿɔ̀’, mbà à fʉ̌a nò tà ne ḿbɔ́gɔ. Pú’u la, nyìŋ lɔɔn ńcÿɔ’, mbà á lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ ngie ammó nyé ńzága ná nkwòŋe gie à gẅiin.
en: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.

ngiemboon: Á gʉa ná peg, peg kwoŋo nyìŋ mesoŋ, á gwɔ́, mélà’mie e Ssé la vɔg ńkwoŋo wég.
en: We love him, because he first loved us.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgɔɔn ngie à ne ńkwoŋo Ssé, ńgwɔ́ gɔɔn pú’u, ńne ḿbʉa fɛ́ we, mbà aa ngàŋa cÿɔ̌ nò. Á nue nyìŋ lɔɔn tè kwoŋo fɛ́ we gẅie à ne ńgyá yé wɔ́, á le ku’u lékwoŋ Ssé gẅie à tè ne ńgyá yé wɔ́ wɔ́.
en: If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love God whom he hath not seen?

ngiemboon: *Lepʉ̌ sie Kristo la ná né pege, e sɔɔn. Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńkwoŋ Ssé, á gíŋe ńkwoŋo fɛ́ we nyìŋ mesoŋ.
en: And this commandment have we from him, That he who loveth God love his brother also.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ gẅie à zẅǐŋ ngie Yěsô aa*Nzà’nkÿo, aa míŋ Ssé. Nyìŋ gẅie à kwoŋ Ssé Tá, à giŋé ńkwoŋ mbɔɔ púɔ Ssé.
en: Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ is born of God: and every one that loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him.

ngiemboon: Ammó gie pege ge fó mǒ ńzsé ngie pege ne ńkwoŋo púɔ Ssé, áa pá’ pege kwoŋ Ssé, ńgíŋe ńtÿɔ́gɔ kwò ná mbʉ̌ mé.
en: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God, and keep his commandments.

ngiemboon: Á nue lekwoŋ Ssé aa pege létÿɔ́gɔ kwò ná mbʉ̌ mé, mbʉ̌ mé piŋ ńké tè tʉ ńcʉa wégè wɔ́.
en: For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not grievous.

ngiemboon: Á nue wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ gẅie aa míŋ Ssé, à tʉ̌ ńcʉa kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gie á táte yé tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó. Ammó gie á gÿo pege tʉ ńcʉa njÿó, áa pá’ pege záb ntʉ́m ná Yěsô Kristo.
en: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world: and this is the victory that overcometh the world,evenour faith.

ngiemboon: Ńgwɔ́ wɔ̌ zɔɔn ńtʉ ńcʉa njÿó? À gwɔ̌ pɔ́ ndà’ nyìŋ gẅie à zẅǐŋ ngie Yěsô aa Míŋ Ssé?
en: Who is he that overcometh the world, but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God?

ngiemboon: Mé gɔɔn Yěsô Kristo gẅie à la tó, mé nú’u yé tsɛ̀ɛ ntse, á gÿo ḿpfɛte metse mé, mé la tè nú’u yé pɔ́ ndà’ tsɛ̀ɛ ntse wɔ́, mé la nú’u yé tsɛ̀ɛ ntse, á gíŋe ḿpfɛte metse mé. A Zẅìge Ssé áa mǒ ńgwɔ́ jÿò ńgyá ngie áa nò nénʉ́. A Zẅìge Ssé zɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ nénʉ́,
en: This is he that came by water and blood,evenJesus Christ; not by water only, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit that beareth witness, because the Spirit is truth.

ngiemboon: é lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ menò méntá mie é la’te wégè nò ná Yěsô.
en: For there are three that bear record in heaven, the Father, the Word, and the Holy Ghost: and these three are one.

ngiemboon: Yɔɔn áa Zẅìge Ssé, wɔɔn gwɔ́ ntse, ńgÿo metse, pɔ́b métá ne ńda’te tà’a nò wémɔ’ɔ́.
en: And there are three that bear witness in earth, the Spirit, and the water, and the blood: and these three agree in one.

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a mesoŋ gɔɔn mmó gie pɔ́ zsé nà nò, pege jú’ ńzẅíŋ ńgie áa nò. Ammó gie e Ssé gɔɔn nà nò á piŋ ńcʉa gie pʉ̀a mesoŋ gɔɔn. À lɔg menò méntá mɛ̌, ńgɔɔn nò ná nò Míŋ we.
en: If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater: for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńzáb ntʉ́m wé ná Míŋ Ssé, mbà mɔɔn menò méntá ge ne fa’a ntʉ́m ye. Nyìŋ gẅie à kaa zẅíŋe nò gie e Ssé gɔ̌ɔn wɔ́, angàŋ lɔgɔ Ssé ńgÿo ngàŋa cÿɔ̌ nò, mélà’mie à kaa záb ntʉ́m nà nò gie e Ssé gɔ̌ɔn ńtí mmó gie yé Ssé zsé nà nò Míŋ we wɔ́.
en: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself: he that believeth not God hath made him a liar; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son.

ngiemboon: Ammó gie e Ssé la gɔɔn nà nò Míŋ we, à yɔɔn ńgwɔ́ ngie: Yé Ssé la náa le gwɔ́ tèmì mbwo pege, wɛ̌ le gwɔ́ á fóo ná Míŋ we.
en: And this is the record, that God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńzáb ntʉ́m wé ná Míŋ Ssé, mbà ngàŋ àa gẅiin wɛ̌ le gwɔ́ ŋwɛ́, tá nyìŋ gẅie à ké tè záb à tè gẅiin.
en: He that hath the Son hath life;andhe that hath not the Son of God hath not life.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ŋwe’e mɔɔn menò ńdɔgɔ shwóŋó gẅi pie pi záb ntʉ́m ná Míŋ Ssé ngie: Pi gẅiin le gwɔ́ tèmì.
en: These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God; that ye may know that ye have eternal life, and that ye may believe on the name of the Son of God.

ngiemboon: Ammó gie á gÿo pege tyé mvfò Ssé ntʉ́m wégè té vɛ, á gwɔ́ pɔ́ ngie: Pege ne ńzsé ngie, pege lɔɔn ńdúɔ mmó mbwo yé, á gwɔ́ gie à ne ńkwoŋo, mbà à ge jú’.
en: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us:

ngiemboon: Pá’ pege ne ńzsé ngie e Ssé ne ńjú’u nò yégè la, pege giŋé ńne ńzsé ngie pege lɔɔn ńdúɔ pɔ́ kɔ́ mbwo yé wɔ́, mbà à ge náa mmó gie pege luɔ né pege.
en: and if we know that he hear us, whatsoever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgyá à fɛ́ we ne ńgÿo nò tepòŋ, á ké tè nò tepòŋ gie ngàŋ ge fó mǒ é kwé kwé wɔ́, á sẅíŋte Ssé nà twó ngàŋ, mbà Ssé ge gÿo ngàŋ gwɔ́ wó, pá’ á lɔɔn ńkwa’ ńgwɔ́ nò tepòŋ gie à tè fó mǒ kwé kwé wɔ́. Tá’, atsɔ́ nò tepòŋ áa wó gie nyìŋ gÿo, éfó mǒ ńkwé kwé, n tě ńgɔɔn ngie mé sẅíŋte Ssé ná yɛ̌ ntí wɔ́.
en: If any man see his brother sin a sinwhich isnot unto death, he shall ask, and he shall give him life for them that sin not unto death. There is a sin unto death: I do not say that he shall pray for it.

ngiemboon: Kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gie nyìŋ gÿo, tà á gwɔ́ gie Ssé tè ne ńkwoŋo wɔ́, áa nò tepòŋ, ta’ nyìŋ tè gÿo pɔ́ menò tepòŋ ntsèm, éfó mǒ ńkwé kwé wɔ́.
en: All unrighteousness is sin: and there is a sin not unto death.

ngiemboon: Pege ne ńzsé ngie nyìŋ gwɔ̌ tà ńcʉ́’ʉ míŋ Ssé, à tè gíŋe ńnéŋe fʉa nò fʉa wɔ́, á nue Míŋ Ssé ne ńtÿɔ́’te yé, nyìŋ tepòŋ tè gẅiin shÿó lézába pwó ná yé wɔ́.
en: We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself, and that wicked one toucheth him not.

ngiemboon: Pege ne ńzsé ngie pege ee púɔ Ssé, tá’ ngwòŋ njÿó ntsèm pǔ ńjú’u pɔ́ mbwo nyìŋ tepòŋ.
en: Andwe know that we are of God, and the whole world lieth in wickedness.

ngiemboon: Pege ne ńzsé ngie Míŋ Ssé la tó ńnáa wégè legyè pá’ pege ge lɔg zsé kwà’ Ssé ye nénʉ́, peg la zẅɛ́’ pɔ́ yé Yěsô Kristo tá pega Ssé ye nénʉ́ cʉ́’ ńnéŋe, mbà pega pɔ́ léen ńtemte.
en: And we know that the Son of God is come, and hath given us an understanding, that we may know him that is true, and we are in him that is true,evenin his Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God, and eternal life.

ngiemboon: Penkʉ́ pɔ́ɔn, pi laga twó gí nà shúm sie pʉ̀a gu’te ngie ee Ssé.
en: Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ gẅie mèŋ n ge nkẅè mvfò tsɛ̀ɛ cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo, mèŋ n náa yɔɔn ŋwà’ne mbwo Má penkʉ́. E Ssé la tsɔ́’ɔ gú. Mèŋ n giŋé ńnáa mbɔɔ mbwo gubé jú, m bǔ ńkwoŋo gẅi pɔ́ métsèm, á nue pege metsèm pǔ ńtyé nà nò nénʉ́, é té ndà’ wɔ̀ɔn mie mèŋ n kwoŋo gẅi wɔ́, awɔ̌wɔ́ɔ gẅie à tyé nà nò nénʉ́ giŋé ńkwoŋo gẅi yé.
en: The elder unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in the truth; and not I only, but also all they that have known the truth;

ngiemboon: Peg kwoŋo gẅí, á fóo ná pá’ nò nénʉ́ áa tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m wégè, é ké lá’a tsẅé gwɔ́ pɔ́ tsoló.
en: for the truth's sake, which dwelleth in us, and shall be with us for ever.

ngiemboon: E Ssé Tá, mbɔɔ Yěsô Kristo gẅie aa Míŋ Tá né ńgwɔ́ né pege, ńne ńdege mefʉa mégè, ńne ńnéŋe sẅétè ntʉ́m pege pie pege tyé nà nò nénʉ́ ḿbiŋ ńgẅiin nkwòŋe tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege.
en: Grace be with you, mercy,andpeace, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.

ngiemboon: Anò ka pǔ ḿboŋo wɔ̀ɔn tɛ’ pá’ n ka jǔ’ ngie tsɔ́ penkʉ́ pú ne ńgiŋe ná mánzsè nò nénʉ́ pá’ Tá wege la tsẅi né pege la.
en: I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth, as we have received a commandment from the Father.

ngiemboon: Tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ Má penkʉ́, ammó gie mèŋ n ne ńzɛ́te mbwo gù fʉ̀’ɔɔn á gwɔ́ ngie pege gẅiin nkwòŋe tsetsɛ̀ɛ pege, sɔɔn ke tè gwɔ́ pɔ́ tsɔ́*lepʉ̌ se sẅé sie mèŋ n ŋwe’e ńnáa mbwo gù wɔ́, ée*lepʉ̌ sie pege gẅiin tà fó nzyeté.
en: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.

ngiemboon: Legẅiin nkwòŋe à gwɔ́ pɔ́ lékú’te mbʉ̌ Ssé.*Lepʉ̌ sie pi la jú’ tà fó nzyeté é gwɔ́ pɔ́ ngie pi ńnéŋe lê nkwòŋe.
en: And this is love, that we walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, That, as ye have heard from the beginning, ye should walk in it.

ngiemboon: Pàcÿɔ nò kéen sa njÿó tà ńgyɔ́ɔn. Pɔ́ té ńne ńzẅíŋe ngie Yěsô Kristo la kwà’ sele ńcʉ́’ʉ nyìŋ mesoŋ wɔ́, pɔ́ ée kwà’ megàŋa cÿɔ̌ nò, ńgwɔ́ megàŋ mbù Kristo.
en: For many deceivers are entered into the world, who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh. This is a deceiver and an antichrist.

ngiemboon: Pi laga twó gí ḿbɔ́g pá’ à lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ apì gie pi la jÿó nà fa’a yég cʉa sẅɛ̀ɛ. Pi kag pɔ́ tʉ̀, ńgÿo ńkẅé ntsɔ’ɔ́ fà’ gẅi pɔ́ ntsèm.
en: Look to yourselves, that we lose not those things which we have wrought, but that we receive a full reward.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn tè kú’te pɔ́ ndà’ nò gie Kristo la zí’i wégè wɔ́, ńgʉa mǒ ńkẅi’i tsɔ́ mmó, mbà ngàŋ pɔ́ Ssé té temte. Nyìŋ gẅie à kú’te nò gie Kristo la zí’i wégè pɔ́ Tá temte, mbɔɔ pɔ́ múɔ gíŋe ńtemte.
en: Whosoever transgresseth, and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ, hath not God. He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ, he hath both the Father and the Son.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńdɔgɔ tsɔ́ nò ńtóo tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, tà á té gwɔ́ pɔ́ gie Kristo la zí’i gẅi wɔ́, tà pi kúe yé, tà pi fó ńtsyɛ’te yé mbɔɔ tsyɛ’te.
en: If there come any unto you, and bring not this doctrine, receive him not intoyourhouse, neither bid him God speed:

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńtsyɛ’te yé, mbà pɔ́ ngàŋ lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ tà’ ncwò ná mefà’ tepòŋ mie à ne fa’a.
en: for he that biddeth him God speed is partaker of his evil deeds.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n kě ńgẅiin menò tà é gyɔ́ɔn gyɔ̌ɔn mie ńgwɔ́ mèŋ shwóŋó gẅí, tá mèŋ n gyǎ ngie mèŋ n tè ŋwe’e ŋwe’e wɔ́, á nue mèŋ n ne ńkwaa létóo lá’ pi, anò kẅɛɛ ncwò mèŋ ńkúu ncwò pi, ńzsé ngie lekág wege aa pú cʉ́me.
en: Having many things to write unto you, I would notwritewith paper and ink: but I trust to come unto you, and speak face to face, that our joy may be full.

ngiemboon: Egubé fɛ́ gù we manzwě gẅie Ssé la tsɔ́’ɔ yé, gɔ̌ɔn ngie mèŋ n tsyɛ’te gú ńná né pɔ́b.
en: The children of thy elect sister greet thee. Amen.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ nkẅè mvfò tsɛ̀ɛ cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo, n náa yɔɔn ŋwà’ne mbwo gù Gaẅis, á shǔ wɔ̀ɔn we tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ. Mèŋ n kwoŋo gú nue pɔgɔ pǔ ńtyé nà nénʉ́.
en: The elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius, whom I love in the truth.

ngiemboon: Ashǔ wɔ̀ɔn we tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, mèŋ n ne ńtsɔ́ɔn ngie ɔ̀ jú’ mboŋó nà kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ, esoŋ nnɛ́ gú tʉte pá’ ɔ̀ ne ńtʉte ná nò Kristo lɛ.
en: Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.

ngiemboon: Anò ka zɔɔn ḿboŋo wɔ̀ɔn tɛ’, á nue tsɔ́ mefɛ́ pege ka tǒ jʉ’ɔɔn, éshwóŋó wɔ̀ɔn ngie ɔ̀ kě ńda nnɛ́ pɔ́ nà nò nénʉ́, ḿbiŋ ńne ńgiŋe jú pɔ́ pá’ á ne ńzɛ́te.
en: For I rejoiced greatly, when the brethren came and testified of the truth that is in thee, even as thou walkest in the truth.

ngiemboon: Awɔ̀ɔn máamáa lekág à gwɔ̌ pɔ́ lé jú’ ngie penkʉ́ pɔ́ɔn ne ńgiŋe pɔ́ pá’ nò nénʉ́ ne ńzɛ́te.
en: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth.

ngiemboon: Ashǔ wɔ̀ɔn we tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, ɔ̀ zsé jú pɔ́ ndà’ Kristo, ɔ̀ kẅéte mefɛ́ mefɛ́ tà mbɔɔ pie é gwɔ́ pɔ́ megʉ̀.
en: Beloved, thou doest faithfully whatsoever thou doest to the brethren, and to strangers;

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ ka tyě tsɛ̀ɛ cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo, éshwóŋ pʉ̀a pá’ ɔ̀ ka kwoŋo wɔ́b pú’u, ńnáa wɔ́b mmó gie á ge kẅéte wɔ́b mánzsè, ńzsé ngie pɔ́ ge giŋe ná ńtí gie á ne ńzɛ́te ngie pàfa’a fà’a Ssé giŋ pú’u.
en: which have borne witness of thy charity before the church: whom if thou bring forward on their journey after a godly sort, thou shalt do well:

ngiemboon: Á nue pɔ́ kéen ńcʉ́me mánzsè pɔ́ léfa’a fà’ Kristo, ḿbiŋ ńké tè ne ńzẅíŋe lékẅé mmó gie á fóo mbwo pà tè zsé Ssé wɔ́.
en: because that for his name's sake they went forth, taking nothing of the Gentiles.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, pege pʉ̀a Kristo gẅiin lékẅéte mefɛ́ mefɛ́ pá’ pɛ̌, légwɔ́ gie pega pɔ̌ ge lɔg púte gÿo nò nénʉ́ sa jʉ’.
en: We therefore ought to receive such, that we might be fellowhelpers to the truth.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ka ŋwe’e mékème ŋwà’ne, ńnáa tsɛ̀ɛ gí cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo, tá Ndiotelɛf gẅie à kwoŋo lézá’te mvfò mânyìŋ ntsem lʉ’ʉ lé jú’u nò gie mèŋ n gɔɔn tsoló.
en: I wrote unto the church: but Diotrephes, who loveth to have the preeminence among them, receiveth us not.

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿo mèŋ n ge gÿo tó tà ńkúu tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, é kem menò tepòŋ mie á gÿǒ, é gíŋe shwóŋ pʉ̀a shwóŋè tepòŋ mbɔɔ cÿɔ̌ nò gẅie à gɔɔn ná peg. À tè gÿo pɔ́ ndà’ pú’u wɔ́, à lʉ’ʉ lékúe mefɛ́ mefɛ́ pie ée megʉ̀, ńgíŋ ńtɔ’ mbɔɔ petsɔ́ pʉ̀a lékúe wɔ́b, tà fóo tsɛ̀ɛ cú’tè ńjwoŋo pʉ̀a pie é ne fa’a lékúe wɔ́b.
en: Wherefore, if I come, I will remember his deeds which he doeth, prating against us with malicious words: and not content therewith, neither doth he himself receive the brethren, and forbiddeth them that would, and casteththemout of the church.

ngiemboon: Ashǔ wɔ̀ɔn we tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, pɔ́ɔn lépí fʉ̀’ nò tepòŋ, pí pɔ́ fʉ̀’ nò mbòŋo. Nyìŋ gẅie à gÿo nò mbòŋo aa Míŋ Ssé, nyìŋ gẅie à gÿo nò tepòŋ à tè Ssé zsé,
en: Beloved, follow not that which is evil, but that which is good. He that doeth good is of God: but he that doeth evil hath not seen God.

ngiemboon: ńgʉa ná Ndermetelẅis, mbà wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ kíme yé pɔ́ mbòŋ. Ntí gie à ne ńdɔgɔ ńgiŋe ná mánzsè nò nénʉ́ ne ńda’te ngie mefà’ mé ée mbòŋ. Peg yég ne ńkíme yé pɔ́ mbòŋ, ɔ̀ piŋ ńne ńzsé ngie peg lɔgɔ shwóŋó nò.
en: Demetrius hath good report of allmen, and of the truth itself: yea, and wealsobear record; and ye know that our record is true.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n kě ńgẅiin menò tà é gyɔ́ɔn gyɔ̌ɔn mie ńgwɔ́ mèŋ shwóŋó gú, tá mèŋ n gyǎ ngie n te ŋwe’e ŋwe’e wɔ́.
en: I had many things to write, but I will not with ink and pen write unto thee:

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńkwaa létó ńgyá gú, pɔgɔ ńnéŋe ssé shwóŋó.
en: but I trust I shall shortly see thee, and we shall speak face to face. Peacebeto thee.Ourfriends salute thee. Greet the friends by name.

ngiemboon: Àa mèŋ Jẅide, nyìŋ gẅie à fa’a fà’a Yěsô Kristo, ńgwɔ́ fɛ́ Jâg. N túmo yɔɔn ŋwà’ne ńnáa mbwo pi pie Tá wege Ssé la tóŋo gẅí. À kwoŋo gẅi ńne ńtÿɔ́’te gẅi ńdɔgɔ ńzẅí’te Yěsô Kristo.
en: Jude, the servant of Jesus Christ, and brother of James, to them that are sanctified by God the Father, and preserved in Jesus Christ,andcalled:

ngiemboon: E Ssé ne ńtsɔ́ɔn mezìŋe mí, ńne ńnéŋe sẅétè ntʉ́m pi, ńne ńgÿo pi ne ńkẅi’i ńjú’u ngie à kwoŋo gẅi kwà’ mboŋó.
en: mercy unto you, and peace, and love, be multiplied.

ngiemboon: Meshǔ pɔ́ɔn pe tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, n kɔ̌ɔn ńzɔ́gɔ ńtsɔ́ɔn tsɔ̌ɔn léŋwe’e ŋwà’ne ńnáa mbwo pi á nà nò pá’ e Ssé ka gÿo pege metsèm pú ńtsẅɛ́, tá’ n ka neŋé tà ḿbú ńgyá fʉ̀’ɔɔn ngie á zɛ́te ngie mèŋ n ŋwe’e ńdɔg ńkẅiŋte gẅi léma’ ncù ńdɔg ḿbɔ́ɔnte nò Yěsô Kristo gie e Ssé la cʉ́me mbwo pege pʉ̀a Ssé. Yɛ̌ nò gwɔ́ pɔ́ yémɔ’ɔ́ ndà’, atsɔ́ té ńdá’a ńgíŋe ńgwɔ́ wó wɔ́.
en: Beloved, when I gave all diligence to write unto you of the common salvation, it was needful for me to write unto you, and exhortyouthat ye should earnestly contend for the faith which was once delivered unto the saints.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gɔɔn pá’ɔɔn nue tsɔ́ pʉ̀a kéen ńzɔɔn shú ńkúu tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, pɔ́ ne sele shÿó nò mbòŋo gie e Ssé yege la lɔg ńcÿó gʉm yégè, pú’u lépʉ́le ńgÿo menò shʉ́ mɔ́b. Pɔ́ lɔgɔ pú’u, ḿmoŋe Yěsô Kristo, á gwɔ́ ndà’ Ndè wege, yé gíle yé zɔ gẅiin wégè. Pɔ́ ée pʉ̀a tepòŋ, ńgwɔ́ pʉ̀a pie ntyě sǎg pá’ ŋwà’ne Ssé la lá’ ńgɔɔn ntí ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ gie e ku’u ná pɔ́b.
en: For there are certain men crept in unawares, who were before of old ordained to this condemnation, ungodly men, turning the grace of our God into lasciviousness, and denying the only Lord God, and our Lord Jesus Christ.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńkwoŋo lékímte gẅi tsɔ́ nò gie pi cwoŋo ńne ńzsé mboŋó, á gwɔ́ pá’ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la kẅile pʉ̀a pé pà Israel tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ Egipto tà pɔ́ tsẅɛ́, á gÿo ńgʉa tsetsɛ̀ɛ pɔ́b ńgÿo pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ kaa záb ntʉ́m ná yé wɔ́ kwéte.
en: I will therefore put you in remembrance, though ye once knew this, how that the Lord, having saved the people out of the land of Egypt, afterward destroyed them that believed not.

ngiemboon: Pi kímte nò*mecÿɔ́’ Ssé pie pɔ́ la gwága jʉ’ gie e Ssé tÿɔgɔ́ wɔ́b wó, ńgwá’a yɔ́b jʉ’ʉ leńnéŋe, ńne ńtsɔ́ɔn ye mvfò. E Ssé la kwɛ́ɛ wɔ́b ndà’ ndà’ lê metsɛ̂n, ńnéŋe wɔ́b tsɛ̀ɛ mwòon nzém, pɔ́ ée wó ńzẅí’te ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ ye lyɛ’ɛ́ lÿò gie mé ge lá’ zá’ mentsaŋ,
en: And the angels which kept not their first estate, but left their own habitation, he hath reserved in everlasting chains under darkness unto the judgment of the great day.

ngiemboon: pi gíŋe ńkímte nò tÿǒsoŋo Sodom mbɔɔ ye Gomor, tà mbɔɔ ye metsɔ́ metÿǒsoŋ mie pâ pɔ̌ la teme pàa, ńkímte pá’ pʉ̀a metÿǒsoŋ ŋwɛ́ la gÿo nò tepòŋ pɔ́ pá’*mecÿɔ́’ Ssé pɛ̌. Pɔ́ la ne ńgÿo menò shʉ́ tà sá’a sǎ’, ńdɔg mbùm yɔb ńkúbe shÿó menò mie e Ssé la záb. Áa nà fʉ̀’ɔɔn pɔ́ nuŋte tsɛ̀ɛ mmɔ̌g gẅie é té ndà’a ḿbyé wɔ́. Á lɔgɔ ńgɔɔn nò mbwo wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ.
en: Even as Sodom and Gomorrha, and the cities about them in like manner, giving themselves over to fornication, and going after strange flesh, are set forth for an example, suffering the vengeance of eternal fire.

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a pie pɔ́ ka shǔ ńkúu tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi ŋwɛ́ gÿo pɔ́ pá’ pʉ̀a pie é laa tsɛ̀ɛ mɛ̌ metÿǒsoŋ. Pɔ́ kwaŋte menò mie é té tyé, á cʉa pú’u pɔ́ lɔg mbùm yɔb ńgÿo menò shʉ́. E Ssé gɔɔn nò pɔ́ gwág gwǎg. Pɔ́ zoonte mezẅìge mie é gẅiin legú’.
en: Likewise also thesefilthydreamers defile the flesh, despise dominion, and speak evil of dignities.

ngiemboon: Tá mbà Méshÿɛɛ, tándá*mecÿɔ́’ Ssé la tè pú’u gÿo. Á laa lyɛ̌’ gie pɔ́ Sátà la ne ńzoŋo nò ná mbùm Mǒsê, á ké tè Sátà zoonte, ńké tè túu*lɔ̌’ yé ńdɔg ńzoonte yé wɔ́. Tà ńcʉ́’ pú’u, mbà à la gɔɔn pɔ́ ndà’ ngie: Á poŋ ngie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a néŋ ngɔ́’ twó gù.
en: Yet Michael the archangel, when contending with the devil he disputed about the body of Moses, durst not bring against him a railing accusation, but said, The Lord rebuke thee.

ngiemboon: Tá á gʉa ná pɛ̌ pʉ̀a, pɔ́ zoonte mmó té ne ńzsé pá’ á gwɔ́, ńgʉa ná gie pɔ́ zsé yɔ́b nò mǒ pɔ́ pá’ɔɔn, pɔ́ pá’ menɔ̀ɔn mbà’ pie legyè sɔ́b té gwɔ́ wɔ́, eshúm sie pɔ́ zsé ná yɔɔn ntí gÿo pɔ́ pyé pyě.
en: But these speak evil of those things which they know not: but what they know naturally, as brute beasts, in those things they corrupt themselves.

ngiemboon: Ndòon ee twó pɔ́b nue pɔ́ cʉmé nà mánzsè we Kain, ńne fʉate menò ńdɔgɔ ńdaba nkáb pá’ Mbalam. Pɔ́ ée pú’u, mbà pɔ́ kéen ńkwé, á nue pɔ́ kéen ńtʉʉ twó mbwo Ssé pá’ Koré.
en: Woe unto them! for they have gone in the way of Cain, and ran greedily after the error of Balaam for reward, and perished in the gainsaying of Core.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ ée pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ cʉŋe nzẅìŋ gẅi á fʉ̀’ gie pi mefɛ́ mefɛ́ cu’té ńne ńjÿó shúm, pɔ́ tó fʉ̀’ó ḿpfɛ́ɛ mmó tɛ’, ńnú melù’ tɛ’, pɔ́ té shʉ́ kú, ńkwaŋ pɔ́ ndà’ yɔ́b twó. Pɔ́ ée pá’ mbʉ̀ŋ gie e kwɔ̌’ tà mé ne ńzẅí’te ngie e lú, afóm kaa la, ńgwɔ́ pá’ metÿǒ mie ée těen ńzéme ntɔ̌ɔn wɔ́, tà mbɔɔ ná fʉ̀’ gie é kɔ’ɔ́ zém, ńgwɔ́ pá’ metÿǒ mie é léen ḿbʉe, ḿbú ńkwé.
en: These are spots in your feasts of charity, when they feast with you, feeding themselves without fear: cloudsthey arewithout water, carried about of winds; trees whose fruit withereth, without fruit, twice dead, plucked up by the roots;

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ ne ńdɔgɔ mefà’ tepòŋ mɔ́b saa jʉ’ pá’ ntse té pàa lu ssé ńtéme nà ngʉ̀ŋe ntse, fùfù’ we sa jʉ’ la. Pɔ́ ée pá’ mecÿɔ́’ saŋ pie é gwaa ḿbúu, pɔ́ cʉ́’ʉ ńcʉŋe na jʉ’ gie e Ssé la tÿɔ́gɔ wɔ́b wó wɔ́.
en: raging waves of the sea, foaming out their own shame; wandering stars, to whom is reserved the blackness of darkness for ever.

ngiemboon: Henɔg gẅie aa nà mejwoŋó sɔɔn mbʉ́a léfó ná Adam, à la tʉ́ njÿó ńtsẅi nkʉ̀ Ssé gẅie é líe wɔ́b ńgɔɔn ngie: Pi jú’ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ge lɔg mecÿɔ́’ pé pe Ndʉalʉ̌a, é tó tà è pú ńgyɔ́ɔn gyɔ́ɔn tà ńgwaa ńgwɔ́ mé le sáŋ ńzsé nzẅìŋ wɔ́.
en: And Enoch also, the seventh from Adam, prophesied of these, saying, Behold, the Lord cometh with ten thousands of his saints,

ngiemboon: Á lélɔg ńŋág pʉ̀a metsèm, ńnéŋ ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ twó pʉ̀a tepòŋ métsèm ńtí mefà’ tepòŋ mie pɔ́ la fa’, éfó ná pá’ pɔ́ la tʉʉ twó mbwo Ssé, tà mbɔɔ ná shwóŋè ntsèm gie á pÿɔ́g pÿɔ̌g, á gie pʉ̀a tepòŋ ŋwɛ́ pie pɔ́ té mekù’ gẅiin é lǎ gɔɔn ná Ssé.
en: to execute judgment upon all, and to convince all that are ungodly among them of all their ungodly deeds which they have ungodly committed, and of all their hardspeecheswhich ungodly sinners have spoken against him.

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a ŋwɛ́ ńnéŋe fʉ̀’ ntsèm anò ne ńgyáŋa wɔ́b gyáŋ, pɔ́ ne ńzẅɛ́te zẅɛté, ńnéŋe ńgÿo pɔ́ mmó gie mbùm yɔb ne ńtsóte wɔ́b ngie pɔ́ gÿo, pɔ́ gwɔ́ fʉ̀’ ntsèm, éshwóŋó pɔ́ shwóŋè gie pɔ́ lɔgɔ ńŋà’te ŋa’té, ńgwɔ́ lʉte nyìŋ ńne ńzsé pì gie pɔ́ ge jÿó ná yé.
en: These are murmurers, complainers, walking after their own lusts; and their mouth speaketh great swellingwords, having men's persons in admiration because of advantage.

ngiemboon: Tá á gʉa ná pi, mbà meshǔ pɔ́ɔn, pi kímte menò mie megàŋ ntúm Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Kristo la tʉ́ʉ njÿó ńtsẅii mbwo pi.
en: But, beloved, remember ye the words which were spoken before of the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ;

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ la gɔɔn ngie, á ge lá’ gwɔ́ nà fʉ̀’ gie njÿó ge magá, epʉ̀a gẅe gẅí, ńgÿo menò tepòŋ ná ntí gie mbùm yɔb ne ńtsóte wɔ́b légÿo pú’u.
en: how that they told you there should be mockers in the last time, who should walk after their own ungodly lusts.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ zɔ̌ ée pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ ma’a fagte tsetsɛ̀ɛ pʉ̀a Kristo. Pɔ́ gÿo pɔ́ mmó gie pɔ́ jú’u soŋ nnɛ́ pɔ́b, a Zẅìge Ssé té ná pɔ́b wɔ́.
en: These be they who separate themselves, sensual, having not the Spirit.

ngiemboon: Tá ńgʉa ná pi, mbà meshǔ pɔ́ɔn pe tʉ̀ nzẅìŋ, pi kẅi’i ńtʉte tʉte, ńne ńkú’te mmó gie pi la záb ntʉ́m gẅi mǒ. Yɛ̌ zɔ̌ cÿó gie gẅi leńnéŋe tyé mǒ. Pi tóŋo Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a, à lɔg metʉ̀ mé ńkẅéte gẅí lésẅíŋte Ssé.
en: But ye, beloved, building up yourselves on your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Ghost,

ngiemboon: Pi gÿo e Ssé ké ńne ńkẅi’i ńkwoŋo gẅi kwoŋ, ńne ńzẅí’te ngie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Kristo ge gÿo gÿo pi gẅiin le gwɔ́ tèmì, á nue à tsɔ́ɔn mezìŋe mí.
en: keep yourselves in the love of God, looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life.

ngiemboon: Pi tsɔ́ɔɔn mezìŋe pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ ne ḿmʉ́’te mʉ’té
en: And of some have compassion, making a difference:

ngiemboon: Pi fó ná mánzsè gẅie à gee né tsɛ̀ɛ mmɔ̌g ḿbe’e wɔ́b, pɔ́ tsẅɛ́. Tsɔ́ pʉ̀a gíŋe ńgwɔ́ wó pie pi ge gíŋe tsɔ́ɔn mezìŋe mɔ́b, é gwɔ tsɔ́ɔn, é ne pɔ́ɔn mà wɔb. Pi pɔ́ɔn mbɔɔ menzsǒ mɔ́b mie ncÿǒ menò tepòŋ ée mǒ.
en: and others save with fear, pullingthemout of the fire; hating even the garment spotted by the flesh.

ngiemboon: Agù’te gwɔ́ mbwo Ssé, yé gẅie à ku’u létÿɔ́’te gẅi tà pi é le gwé, yé gẅie à ku’u légÿo pi kẅɛ ńtyé nà jʉ’ʉ legú’ gie kwà’ yé aa wó tà*lɔ̌’ á le ná pi wɔ́, pi piŋ ńne ńkága kǎg,
en: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to presentyoufaultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy,

ngiemboon: ée ndà’ yé ńgwɔ́ Ssé. À la lɔgɔ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Kristo ńgÿo pege tsẅɛ́. Mé gu’te pɔ́ yé, yé zɔ gẅiin legú’, yé zɔ̌ gẅiin metʉ̀, yé zɔ̌ sá’a pʉ̀a, pá’ à la lá’ ńzye, á ké ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ pú’u, tà ńkú fʉ̀’ɔɔn, é lá’a gwɔ́ pɔ́ pú’u, á nà ngù’ nkɔ̌ɔn nê nkɔ̌ɔn.*Amen.
en: to the only wise God our Saviour,beglory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and ever. Amen.

ngiemboon: Anò gie áa tsɛ̀ɛ yɔɔn ŋwà’ne áa gie á laa lelyěen, Yěsô Kristo gÿo ńgÿo mé zsé. Á gwaa gwɔ́, mbà Ssé tʉ̌ njÿó ńgÿo Yěsô zsé yɛ̌ nò légwɔ́ gie à ge la’te mbwo pʉ̀a pé mmó gie á ge tɔ́g tó. Kristo la túmo cÿɔ́’ we, á gʉa ńda’te yɛ̌ nò á mbwo Jâŋ gẅie aa ngàŋa fà’ Yěsô.
en: The Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave unto him, to shew unto his servants things which must shortly come to pass; and he sent and signifieditby his angel unto his servant John:

ngiemboon: Jâŋ ŋwɛ́ aa jʉ’ɔɔn ńne ńŋwe’e kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gie à ka gyǎ. Kwà’ yé ne ńgɔɔn ngie á fóo mbwo Ssé, ńgwɔ́ nò gie áa nénʉ́, mbà Yěsô Kristo ka gÿo mé zsé.
en: who bare record of the word of God, and of the testimony of Jesus Christ, and of all things that he saw.

ngiemboon: Ashÿó mbòŋo aa nyìŋ gẅie à ge tóŋo yɔɔn ŋwà’ne. Pà shÿó mbòŋo gwɔ́ pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ ge jú’u yɔɔn shwóŋè gie á fóo mbwo Ssé, é gÿo mmó gie mé ŋwe’é tsoló. Á nue fʉ̀’ gie mɔɔn menò gee mbumté á tsoté tà ne ḿbɔ́ɔnte.
en: Blessedishe that readeth, and they that hear the words of this prophecy, and keep those things which are written therein: for the timeisat hand.

ngiemboon: Yɔɔn ŋwà’ne fóo mbwo mèŋ Jâŋ, mèŋ n ŋwe’e ńnáa mbwo mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo mie ée sɔɔn mbʉ́a, ńgwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ Azia. E Ssé gẅie aa wó, mbà à laa wó, à piŋ ńne ńtóo, pâ mezẅìge sɔɔn mbʉ́a mie ée mvfò lʉŋe lefùɔ yé, pɔ́ ne ńgwɔ́ né pi, ńne ńnéŋe sẅétè ntʉ́m pi.
en: John to the seven churches which are in Asia: Gracebeunto you, and peace, from him which is, and which was, and which is to come; and from the seven Spirits which are before his throne;

ngiemboon: Yé Kristo kwoŋo wégè tɛ’, à la lɔg metse mé ńkyɛ́’ nkÿo menò tepòŋ ná pege.
en: and from Jesus Christ,who isthe faithful witness,andthe first begotten of the dead, and the prince of the kings of the earth. Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood,

ngiemboon: À la lɔgɔ wégè ńgÿo pʉ̀a pie ée tsɛ̀ɛ nò*lefùɔ Ssé, ńgíŋe ńdɔgɔ wégè ńgÿo pànuŋe pwɔ́’ pá’ pege ge fa’a mbwo Tá we Ssé. Legú’ mbɔɔ metʉ̀ e lá’a ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ mbwo yé Yěsô Kristo á nà ngù’ nkɔ́ɔn nê nkɔ̌ɔn.*Amen
en: and hath made us kings and priests unto God and his Father; to himbeglory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.

ngiemboon: !Pi ké ńzsé ngie à ne ńtóo. À ge lá’ tó pɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ melɔ́ɔn. Awɔ̌wɔ́ɔ ge lá’ záb lejÿɔ́g ná ye, tà mbɔɔ pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ la sɔbɔ gwǒŋo nnɛ́ yé. Epʉ̀a ngwòŋo ngwòŋ ndùmo ssé tsetsá’ ge lá’ zéme pwó, é kɔ́’ legwé tí yé. Oon á ge lá’ gwɔ́ pɔ́ pú’u, tà mmó le mǒ kúbe.*Amen.
en: Behold, he cometh with clouds; and every eye shall see him, and theyalsowhich pierced him: and all kindreds of the earth shall wail because of him. Even so, Amen.

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé gẅie aa wó, mbà à laa wó, à piŋ ńne ńtóo, á yé ngàŋa tʉ̀ ntsèm, à ne ńgɔɔn ngie: Mèŋ n gee Alfa, ńgwɔ́ Omega.
en: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending,saith the Lord,which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.

ngiemboon: Àa mèŋ Jâŋ, fɛ́ gẅi, ńcʉa ná pá’ pege la nnɛ́ ná Yěsô. Pege pǔ ńne ńgyá ngɔ́’, ḿbú ńgwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ nò*lefùɔ Ssé, ḿbiŋ ńgíŋ ńne ńdɔgɔ kwɔ́gɔ nnɛ́ ńzẅí’te Yěsô. Mé la gʉa Patmos, á gwɔ́ lá’ gie ntse la kéle ńnéŋe soŋ, ńnyé wɔ̀ɔn, mélà’ mie mèŋ shwóŋó nò Ssé ḿbiŋ ńkú’te mmó gie Yěsô Kristo ka gÿo mé zsé.
en: I John, who also am your brother, and companion in tribulation, and in the kingdom and patience of Jesus Christ, was in the isle that is called Patmos, for the word of God, and for the testimony of Jesus Christ.

ngiemboon: Á gÿo ńgwɔ́ lyɛ’ɛ́ lá’ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, a Zẅìge Ssé jʉʉ wɔ̀ɔn. N jú’ tsɔ̌ ngyè tetʉ́ʉ gwɔ́ nzèm mèŋ, ńne ńcʉ́me pá’ ngyè ntàŋ la,
en: I was in the Spirit on the Lord's day, and heard behind me a great voice, as of a trumpet,

ngiemboon: ńne ńgɔɔn ngie: Cú’te kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gie ɔ̀ ne ńgyá, ńŋwe’e tsɛ̀ɛ lepu’ú ŋwà’ne, ńtúm ńnáa mbwo mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo mie ée sɔɔn mbʉ́a, ńgwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ metÿǒsoŋ mɔɔn: Efeso, Smirne, Pɛrgame, Tiatire, Sardɛ̀s, Filadelfia, Laodisé.
en: saying,I am Alpha and Omega, the first and the last: and, What thou seest, write in a book, and senditunto the seven churches which are in Asia; unto Ephesus, and unto Smyrna, and unto Pergamos, and unto Thyatira, and unto Sardis, and unto Philadelphia, and unto Laodicea.

ngiemboon: N jú’ pú’u, ésele nnɛ́ lé gyá nyìŋ gẅie à gɔɔn nò mbwo mèŋ, ésele nnɛ́ pú’u, ńgyá melâm sɔɔn mbʉ́a mie mé la lɔgɔ tʉ̌ gɔ̂l ńnyɛte.
en: And I turned to see the voice that spake with me. And being turned, I saw seven golden candlesticks;

ngiemboon: N gyá tsɔ̌ nyìŋ á tyé tsetsɛ̀ɛ melâm ápɛ̌, ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ pá’*Míŋ Nyìŋ mesoŋ la, ḿma’a tsɔ̌ tà’ shʉ̀a nzsǒ á cwóŋ tà ńtyé mekwò yé, á lɔgɔ tsɔ́ pɔ́ɔn mmó ńtʉ́me kʉ́kʉ́b we, á gwɔ́ gie mé la lɔgɔ tʉ̌ gɔ̂l ńnyɛte.
en: and in the midst of the seven candlesticksonelike unto the Son of man, clothed with a garment down to the foot, and girt about the paps with a golden girdle.

ngiemboon: Menòŋo twó mé fɔ́gɔ lê tɔ́d, pɔ́ pá’ megẅì la. Nÿɔ́g mé kyɛ’ jʉ’ pá’ lʉ́me mmɔ̌g la.
en: His head andhishairswerewhite like wool, as white as snow; and his eyeswereas a flame of fire;

ngiemboon: Mekwò mé la ne ńŋwʉŋe pá’ tʉ̌ nʉ̀ gie mé nyé ńtsíbe mmɔ̌g la. Ngyè ye ne ńzẅɛɛ pá’ lepí sie é zyɛ́’ɛ la.
en: and his feet like unto fine brass, as if they burned in a furnace; and his voice as the sound of many waters.

ngiemboon: Á kú’te mecÿɔ́’ saŋ sɔɔn mbʉ́a nà lɔ̌ɔn pwó yé ye tʉ̀. Etsɔ̌ nně ncù gie à twó sẅíte, é gẅiin mengʉ́ŋ mémbʉ́a ne fóo ncwò yé ńkẅɛɛ. Eshÿó wé ŋwʉŋe pɔ́ pá’ lejÿɔ́g nèm á tsɛ̀ɛ zsǒ la.
en: And he had in his right hand seven stars: and out of his mouth went a sharp twoedged sword: and his countenancewasas the sun shineth in his strength.

ngiemboon: N gyá yé pú’u, ésẅɛ́’ ńnuŋe mekwò yé, ńcʉ́’ ńnuŋe jʉ’ó, ńcʉ́’ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ pá’ mpfó. Á lêen ńké ńzába pwó yé ye tʉ̀ ná mèŋ, ńgɔɔn ngie: Tè gíŋe ńcÿɔ’, mèŋ n gee Ndùŋ mvfò, ńgwɔ́ nzsònzèm
en: And when I saw him, I fell at his feet as dead. And he laid his right hand upon me, saying unto me,Fear not; I am the first and the last:

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gee nyìŋ gẅie à gÿo mé gwɔ́ wó. N da kwé, tá mèŋ n gee fʉ̀’ɔɔn ńgwɔ́ wó, é ké lá’a gwɔ́ pɔ́ wó. Mèŋ n gẅiin metsɔ́’ɔ kí, mie é náa wɔ̀ɔn metʉ̀ lélɔg ńjÿɔ́’ɔ jʉ’ gie mepfó ée wó, kà pɔ́ lélɔg ńtsɔ́’ éfó wó ńkẅile pʉ̀a wɔ́.
en: I amhe that liveth, and was dead; and, behold, I am alive for evermore, Amen; and have the keys of hell and of death.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, pú ŋwe’e kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gie ɔ̀ gyǎ, á gie ɔ̀ ne ńgyá fʉ̀’ɔɔn mbɔɔ gie ɔ̀ ge piŋ tá gyá.
en: Write the things which thou hast seen, and the things which are, and the things which shall be hereafter;

ngiemboon: Á gʉa nà lezsě mmó gie mecÿɔ́’ saŋ sɔɔn mbʉ́a mie ɔ̀ gyǎ mèŋ n gẅiin ná pwó yɔ́ɔn ye tʉ̀, mbɔɔ ná melâm sɔɔn mbʉ́a mie mé la lɔgɔ tʉ̌ gɔ̂l ńnyɛte, mbà mèŋ n ge shwóŋó gú ngie: Mecÿɔ́’ saŋ sɔɔn mbʉ́a lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́*mecÿɔ́’ Ssé pie é pyɛ́bɛ mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo ŋwɛ́ sɔɔn mbʉ́a. Melâm sɔɔn mbʉ́a lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo ŋwɛ́ sɔɔn mbʉ́a.
en: the mystery of the seven stars which thou sawest in my right hand, and the seven golden candlesticks. The seven stars are the angels of the seven churches: and the seven candlesticks which thou sawest are the seven churches.

ngiemboon: Ŋwe’e menò mɔɔn, ńtúm ńnáa mbwo*cÿɔ́’ Ssé gẅie à líe cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo gie áa tÿǒsoŋo Efeso. Ŋwe’e ngie: Nyìŋ gẅie à gẅiin mecÿɔ́’ saŋ sɔɔn mbʉ́a nà lɔ̌ɔn pwó yé ye tʉ̀ la, yé gẅie à gwɔ giŋ, melâm sɔɔn mbʉ́a mie mé la lɔgɔ tʉ̌ gɔ̂l ńnyɛte é tÿɔ́’ɔ yé ńnéŋe soŋ la, à ne ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: Unto the angel of the church of Ephesus write; These things saith he that holdeth the seven stars in his right hand, who walketh in the midst of the seven golden candlesticks;

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńzsé mefà’ mí, ńne ńzsé gẅi letéŋe zì’i, ńzsé pá’ pi kag tʉ̀ pú’u, ńzsé pá’ pi tè kwoŋo légwɔ́ gie pia pʉ̀a pie é gẅiin ssé ntʉ́m e teme kwò wɔ́, ńne ńzsé pá’ pi kéen ńdʉŋte pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ gɔɔn ngie pɔ́ ée megàŋ ntúm Yěsô tá ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ pà gwaa ńkú, tà ńzsé ngie pɔ́ gwɔ́ pɔ́ megàŋa cÿɔ̌ nò.
en: I know thy works, and thy labour, and thy patience, and how thou canst not bear them which are evil: and thou hast tried them which say they are apostles, and are not, and hast found them liars:

ngiemboon: Pi ne ńkaga tʉ̀. Pi ka gyá ngɔ́’ ńtí wɔ̀ɔn, ńké tè kʉ́a.
en: and hast borne, and hast patience, and for my name's sake hast laboured, and hast not fainted.

ngiemboon: Tá’, mèŋ n ké ńne ńda’a gẅi ńtí nò gie pi cʉ’ʉ́ ńkwoŋo wɔ̀ɔn pá’ pi laa nzyeté ńkwoŋo wɔ̀ɔn pú’u wɔ́.
en: Nevertheless I havesomewhatagainst thee, because thou hast left thy first love.

ngiemboon: Pi ké ńkímte jʉ’ gie pi la tyé wó tá ńgwe ssé, ńkúbe mà gẅi ńgíŋe fa’ mefà’ mie pi lɔ̌ɔn fa’a. Tà á té pú’u wɔ́, mbà mèŋ n dɔɔn ńgwaa tó, pi nyé pɔ́ tè kúbe mà, mbà mèŋ n ge kaa gẅi lâm, é kúbe jʉ’ yé.
en: Remember therefore from whence thou art fallen, and repent, and do the first works; or else I will come unto thee quickly, and will remove thy candlestick out of his place, except thou repent.

ngiemboon: Tá’, ammó gie mèŋ n ne ńgyá ngie pi ee mǒ ńne ńgÿo mboŋó, áa pá’ mefà’ pʉ̀a ná nùɔ gie mé tóŋo lê Nikolayide é ne ḿbÿɔ́gɔ gẅi ndʉŋ ndʉŋ pá’ é pÿɔ́gɔ wɔ̀ɔn yɔ́ɔn.
en: But this thou hast, that thou hatest the deeds of the Nicolaitanes, which I also hate.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgẅiin metuŋó, á jú’u nò gie Zẅìge Ssé ne ńgɔɔn mbwo mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo lɔɔn. Mèŋ n ge gÿo ná ntɔ̌ɔn gẅie éfóo ná tÿǒ gie á gÿo mé gwɔ́ wó, á mbwo nyìŋ gẅie à lÿɔ̌’ ncù tà ńcʉa nò tepòŋ, à jÿó. Yɛ̌ tÿǒ áa tsɛ̀ɛ nká’a Ssé.
en: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the tree of life, which is in the midst of the paradise of God.

ngiemboon: Ŋwe’e menò mɔɔn, ńtúm ńnáa mbwo*cÿɔ́’ Ssé gẅie à líe cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo gie áa tÿǒsoŋ Smirne. Ŋwe’e ngie: Nyìŋ gẅie aa ndùŋ mvfò, ńgwɔ́ nzsònzèm, nyìŋ gẅie à la kwé ḿbiŋ ńgíŋ fóo lá’ mepfó, à ne ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: And unto the angel of the church in Smyrna write; These things saith the first and the last, which was dead, and is alive;

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńzsé ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ gi, ńne ńzsé ngie pi gwɔ́ pɔ́ mepóŋ, tá’, ńké ńgwɔ́ nà lezsě Ssé ńgwɔ́ ngàŋa mmó. Mèŋ n giŋé ńne ńzsé ngie pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ gɔɔn ngie pɔ́ ée pà Yuda, tá ńké ńdɔgɔ pɔ́ ncwò ńgɔɔn, pɔ́ ne ńkíme lezíŋ sí té poŋ. Pɔ́ gwɔ́ pɔ́ pʉ̀a pe cú’tè ye Sátà.
en: I know thy works, and tribulation, and poverty, (but thou art rich) andI knowthe blasphemy of them which say they are Jews, and are not, butarethe synagogue of Satan.

ngiemboon: Áa nénʉ́ ngie pi ge gyá ngɔ́’, tá’, tà pi ké ḿbɔ́g. Pi zsé ngie Sátà ge ma’ tsɔ́ pʉ̀a pí ndá tsǎŋ lélɔg ńdʉŋte gẅi ńgyá. Pi gyá ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ gyǎ é lyɛ̌’ lá’ legém. Pi ké ńzsé pɔ́ ndà’ wɔ̀ɔn, tà mbɔɔ pá’ mé lɔɔn ńne ńzẅéte gẅi ńtí pú’u. Mèŋ n ge lá’ tɔ’ ngú’ gi, á gwɔ́ pá’ pi ge lá’a gwɔ́ pɔ́ wó.
en: Fear none of those things which thou shalt suffer: behold, the devil shall castsomeof you into prison, that ye may be tried; and ye shall have tribulation ten days: be thou faithful unto death, and I will give thee a crown of life.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgẅiin metuŋó, lélɔg ńjú’u nò, á jú’u nò gie Zẅìge Ssé ne ńgɔɔn mbwo mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo lɔɔn. Nyìŋ gẅie à lÿɔ̌’ ncù tà ńcʉa nò tepòŋ, lekwě nà mbɔ́ɔntè yépʉ́a à tè lá’ kíbe yé wɔ́.
en: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; He that overcometh shall not be hurt of the second death.

ngiemboon: Ŋwe’e menò mɔɔn, ńtúm ńnáa mbwo*cÿɔ́’ Ssé gẅie à líe cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo gie áa tÿǒsoŋo Pɛrgame. Ŋwe’e ngie: Nyìŋ gẅie à gẅiin nně ncù yá gie e sẅité, ńgíŋ ńgwɔ́ mengʉ́ŋ mémbʉ́a la, à ne ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: And to the angel of the church in Pergamos write; These things saith he which hath the sharp sword with two edges;

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńzsé jʉ’ gie pi ńnéŋe wó. Alʉ̀ŋe lefùɔ Sátà tyé jʉ’ó tá’, n ké ńne ńzsé ngie pi cwoŋó ńcʉŋe pɔ́ ná mèŋ. Pi laa nyé lézáb ntʉ́m ná mèŋ wɔ́, tà mbɔɔ ná melyɛ̌’ mie mé la zẅé Antipas á mbʉ̀a pi, á nà jʉ’ gie Sátà ńnéŋe wó. Antipas laa nyìŋ ńgɔɔn yé pɔ́ ndà’ nò gie à zsě ná mèŋ.
en: I know thy works, and where thou dwellest,evenwhere Satan's seatis: and thou holdest fast my name, and hast not denied my faith, even in those days wherein Antipaswasmy faithful martyr, who was slain among you, where Satan dwelleth.

ngiemboon: Tá’, n ké ńgẅiin tsɔ́ mmó gie mèŋ n ne ńda’a gẅi mǒ. Etsɔ́ pʉ̀a ée mbʉ̀a pi ńne ńzába ntʉ́m nà ndɔgtelé Mbalam. Mé gɔɔn Mbalam wá gẅie à la shwóŋó Mbalag, pá’ Mbalag ge lʉ’ lejÿɔ’, pà Israel gwe mǒ. À la tsóte wɔ́b pɔ́ pfɛ́ɛ pfwɔ́’ɔ mbàb gie mé lɔ̌g ńgwá’ messé, mbàŋa lâ pànzwě tsetsɛ̀ɛ pɔ́b é gíŋe ḿbumte wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ pâ pɔ̌ nuŋe nuŋe.
en: But I have a few things against thee, because thou hast there them that hold the doctrine of Balaam, who taught Balac to cast a stumblingblock before the children of Israel, to eat things sacrificed unto idols, and to commit fornication.

ngiemboon: Etsɔ́ pʉ̀a gíŋe ńgwɔ́ mbʉ̀a pi gí pie pɔ́ ne ńjú’u ndɔgtelé pʉ̀a pie ée nà nùɔ gie mé tóŋo lê Nikolayide.
en: So hast thou also them that hold the doctrine of the Nicolaitanes, which thing I hate.

ngiemboon: Pi ké ńkúbe mà gẅi, tà á té pú’u wɔ́, mbà ntyě té ge sag tá mèŋ n tóo mbʉ̀a pi wɔ́, é tó lɔg nně ncù gie e kẅɛɛ ncwò mèŋ, é ma’a wɔ́b lê ncù.
en: Repent; or else I will come unto thee quickly, and will fight against them with the sword of my mouth.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgẅiin metuŋó, lélɔg ńjú’u nò, á jú’u nò gie Zẅìge Ssé ne ńgɔɔn mbwo mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo lɔɔn. N ge lá’ náa mána gẅie aa lelyěen, mbɔɔ féfɔ́gɔ kwá’a, á mbwo nyìŋ gẅie à lÿɔ̌’ ncù tà ńcʉa nò tepòŋ, mbà mé ŋwe’é lezíŋ sẅé ná kwá’a ŋwɛ́, é gwɔ́ sie tsɔ̌ nyìŋ tè zsé tà ndí ndà’ nyìŋ gẅie mé nǎ kwá’a ŋwɛ́ mbwo yé.
en: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the hidden manna, and will give him a white stone, and in the stone a new name written, which no man knoweth saving he that receivethit.

ngiemboon: Ŋwe’e menò mɔɔn, ńtúm ńnáa mbwo*cÿɔ́’ Ssé gẅie à líe cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo gie áa tÿǒsoŋo Tiatire. Ŋwe’e ngie: Míŋ Ssé gẅie menÿɔ́g mé kyɛ’ɛ jʉ’ pá’ lʉ́me mmɔ̌g lá, mekwò mé gwɔ́ pá’ tʉ̌ nʉ̀ la, à ne ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: And unto the angel of the church in Thyatira write; These things saith the Son of God, who hath his eyes like unto a flame of fire, and his feetarelike fine brass;

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńzsé mefà’ mí, ńne ńzsé pá’ pi gẅiin nkwòŋe tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi pú’u, ńne ńzsé pá’ pi záb ntʉ́m ná mèŋ pú’u, ńne ńzsé pá’ pi ńnéŋe twó fa’a fà’ lê kwɔ́gɔ nnɛ́ pú’u, ńne ńzsé ngie mefà’ mie pi ee fʉ̀’ɔɔn ńne fa’a gyɔ́ɔn ńcʉa me fʉ̀’e mvfò.
en: I know thy works, and charity, and service, and faith, and thy patience, and thy works; and the lastto bemore than the first.

ngiemboon: Tá’, mèŋ n ké ńne ńda’a gẅí, á nue Jizabel aa lejʉ́ŋ pi, pi zẅíŋe zẅǐŋ. Mánzwě áwɛ̌ ne shwóŋó pʉ̀a ngie à tsẅii nkʉ̀ gẅie éfóo mbwo Ssé, ńdɔgɔ pú’u, éfʉte ngàŋa fà’ yɔ́ɔn, ńne ńzí’i wɔ́b pá’ mbàŋa lâ pànzwě tsetsɛ̀ɛ pɔ́b lɔɔn ńkẅɛ́te wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ pâ pɔ̌ nuŋe nuŋe, mbɔɔ lépfɛ́ɛ pfwɔ́’ɔ mbab gie mé lɔ̌g ńgwá’ messé.
en: Notwithstanding I have a few things against thee, because thou sufferest that woman Jezebel, which calleth herself a prophetess, to teach and to seduce my servants to commit fornication, and to eat things sacrificed unto idols.

ngiemboon: N ka na’á ńne ńzẅí’te zẅi’té ngie à kúbe mà we. Tá’, à tè ne ńkwoŋo lékúbe mà mpfwɔ́’ ŋwɛ́ wɔ́.
en: And I gave her space to repent of her fornication; and she repented not.

ngiemboon: N kě ńgwɔ́ pá’ɔɔn, n ge tsó yé ma’a kǔ, à gyá ngɔ́’ tɛ’. N ge gíŋe gÿo e pʉ̀a pie pâ pɔ̌ gÿo nò gÿɛ́ é gyá ngɔ́’ tɛ’. Pɔ́ ge gyá, pá’ pɔ́ lɔɔn tè kúbe mà wɔb, ńkẅɛɛ nà ntí mefà’ mie pâ pɔ̌ kaa mǒ wɔ́.
en: Behold, I will cast her into a bed, and them that commit adultery with her into great tribulation, except they repent of their deeds.

ngiemboon: N ge zẅéte gubé yé. À cʉa pú’u, mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo ntsèm zsé ngie mèŋ n gee nyìŋ gẅie à zsé nkwaŋá pʉ̀a mesoŋ, ńgíŋe ńzsé mbɔɔ mmó gie pɔ́ ne ńtsɔ́ɔn. Mèŋ n ge gÿo fó pɔ́ nà mmó gie wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ gÿǒ, tá zsé pá’ mèŋ n ge gÿo ná ngàŋ.
en: And I will kill her children with death; and all the churches shall know that I am he which searcheth the reins and hearts: and I will give unto every one of you according to your works.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ge gɔɔn nò fʉ̀’ɔɔn mbwo pi petsɔ́ pʉ̀a tsɛ̀ɛ cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo gie áa tÿǒsoŋo Tiatire, pi pie pi tè ne ńzẅíŋe ndɔgtelé pɛ̌ pʉ̀a wɔ́, ńké tè ne fa’a lézsé mmó gie pɔ́ tóŋo lê kwà’ nò nénʉ́ gie Sátà la gÿo pɔ́ zsé wɔ́. Mèŋ n těen ńge ńzába tsɔ́ pì’ ye ndyɛ̀’ɛ twó pi wɔ́.
en: But unto you I say, and unto the rest in Thyatira, as many as have not this doctrine, and which have not known the depths of Satan, as they speak; I will put upon you none other burden.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńzɛ́te pɔ́ ndà’ ngie, ammó gie pi gẅiin, pi nyɛte ńkú’te mboŋó tà ńkú fʉ̀’ gie mèŋ n ge gÿo tó.
en: But that which ye havealreadyhold fast till I come.

ngiemboon: Á gʉa ná nyìŋ gẅie à ge gÿo lÿɔ́’ ncù tà cʉa nò tepòŋ, á nyìŋ gẅie à ge gÿo é ké ne gÿo pɔ́ mmó gie mèŋ n da tsẅi ngie mé ne ńgÿo, á légÿo pɔ́ pú’u, tà ńkúu lyɛ’ɛ́ nzsònzèm, mbà mèŋ n ge lá’ ná metʉ̀ mbwo ye, à lɔg sá’ patè zsé Ssé.
en: And he that overcometh, and keepeth my works unto the end, to him will I give power over the nations:

ngiemboon: Angàŋ ge lá’ lɔgɔ tÿǒ tʉ̌, ésá’a wɔ́b, é cúa wɔ́b nẅɛ’ pá’ à lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ mé nẅɛ’ mekʉŋe tsá’a pú’u. N ge lá’ ná metʉ̀ mbwo ngàŋ pá’ Tá wɔ̀ɔn la ná metʉ̀ né mèŋ yɔ́ɔn,
en: and he shall rule them with a rod of iron; as the vessels of a potter shall they be broken to shivers: even as I received of my Father.

ngiemboon: é gíŋe náa cÿɔ́’ saŋ gẅie à kwɔ̌’, njÿó gwóon ńdʉ́a nê ngàŋ.
en: And I will give him the morning star.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgẅiin metuŋó, lélɔg ńjú’u nò, á jú’u nò gie a Zẅìge Ssé ne ńgɔɔn mbwo mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo lɔɔn.
en: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.

ngiemboon: Ŋwe’e menò mɔɔn, ńtúm ńnáa mbwo*cÿɔ́’ Ssé gẅie à líe cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo gie áa tÿǒsoŋo Sardɛ̀s. Ŋwe’e ngie: Nyìŋ gẅie à gẅiin Mezẅìge Ssé sɔɔn mbʉ́a mbɔɔ mecÿɔ́’ saŋ sɔɔn mbʉ́a la, à ne ńgɔɔn ngie: Mèŋ n ne ńzsé mefà’ mí, ńne ńzsé ngie mé gwaa gɔɔn ngie pi ee ntentʉ́, mbà pi léen ńkwé.
en: And unto the angel of the church in Sardis write; These things saith he that hath the seven Spirits of God, and the seven stars; I know thy works, that thou hast a name that thou livest, and art dead.

ngiemboon: Pi zyeen, ńgwoon yɛ̂ pfwɔ́’ gie á ne ńgee mege kwé lɛ, ńkú’te. N gɔɔn nue mèŋ n gyá mefà’ mí gwɔ́ mvfò Ssé yɔɔn, tsoon tà’ mǒ tè nyé té gẅiin*lɔ̌’ wɔ́.
en: Be watchful, and strengthen the things which remain, that are ready to die: for I have not found thy works perfect before God.

ngiemboon: Pú’u la, pi ké ńkímte mmó gie mé la zí’i gẅí, ńgíŋe ńkímte ntí gie pi la lɔg ńjú’. Pi kú’te yɛ̌ mmó, ńkúbe mà gẅi. Pi lɔɔn ńnyé ńdyé lyě, mbà mèŋ n ge vege vege tó pá’ ntsǒŋ la, tà pi é le zsé fʉ̀’ gie mèŋ n ne ńtóo wɔ́.
en: Remember therefore how thou hast received and heard, and hold fast, and repent. If therefore thou shalt not watch, I will come on thee as a thief, and thou shalt not know what hour I will come upon thee.

ngiemboon: N ké ńgɔɔn pá’ɔɔn, etsɔ́ ntá’ pʉ̀a gwɔ́ tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi tÿǒsoŋo Sardɛ̀s, mbà pɔ́ kaa lɔg ncÿǒ ńzɔ́’ menzsǒ mɔ́b wɔ́. Pɔ́ ge gÿo ma’ meféfɔ́gɔ nzsǒ, pega pɔ̌ pú ńteme kwò ńgiŋ, mélà’mie pɔ́ kǔ’ pá’ ńgwɔ́ pega pɔ̌ giŋ.
en: Thou hast a few names even in Sardis which have not defiled their garments; and they shall walk with me in white: for they are worthy.

ngiemboon: Áa pá’ nyìŋ gẅie à ge lá’ lÿɔ́’ ncù tà cʉa nò tepòŋ ge lá’ ma’ mefɔ́gɔ nzsǒ pú’u. Mèŋ m biŋ le lá’ ńzá’ lezíŋ sé tsɛ̀ɛ ŋwà’ne gie e Ssé la ŋwe’e mezíŋ pʉ̀a pie pɔ́ gẅiin le gwɔ́ tèmì tsoló wɔ́. N gÿo ńtÿé mvfò Tá wɔ̀ɔn pâ mecÿɔ́’ pé, ńgɔɔn ngie aa wɔ̀ɔn nyìŋ.
en: He that overcometh, the same shall be clothed in white raiment; and I will not blot out his name out of the book of life, but I will confess his name before my Father, and before his angels.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgẅiin metuŋó, lélɔg ńjú’u nò, á jú’u nò gie Zẅìge Ssé ne ńgɔɔn mbwo mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo lɔɔn.
en: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.

ngiemboon: Ŋwe’e menò mɔɔn, ńtúm ńnáa mbwo*cÿɔ́’ Ssé gẅie à líe cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo gie áa tÿǒsoŋo Filadelfia. Ŋwe’e ngie: Nyìŋ gẅie à fóo lejʉ́ŋ Ssé, ńgwɔ́ shwóŋò nò nénʉ́, yé gẅie à ngẅiin kí fùɔ Ndavíd, yé gẅie à tsɔ́’ ncwò ndá nyìŋ tè ku’u léjÿɔ́’ wɔ́, ńjÿɔ́’ nyìŋ tè ku’u létsɔ́’ wɔ́, à ne ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: And to the angel of the church in Philadelphia write; These things saith he that is holy, he that is true, he that hath the key of David, he that openeth, and no man shutteth; and shutteth, and no man openeth;

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńzsé mefà’ mí, ńne ńzsé ngie pi tè mbòŋ metʉ̀ gẅiin tá mbà pi ka kě ńkú’te shwóŋè yɔ́ɔn tà pi tè wɔ̀ɔn moŋe. À yɛ, mbà mèŋ n tsɔ̌’ ncwò ndá ńná né pi. Atsɔ̌ nyìŋ gẅie à piŋ ńku’u léjÿɔ́’ à tè wó wɔ́.
en: I know thy works: behold, I have set before thee an open door, and no man can shut it: for thou hast a little strength, and hast kept my word, and hast not denied my name.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ge gÿo sẅiŋ pʉ̀a pe cú’tè ye Sátà, á mbwo pi, é megàŋa cÿɔ̌ nò pie pɔ́ gɔɔn ngie pɔ́ ée pà Yuda, tá ńké ńdɔgɔ pɔ́ ncwò ńgɔɔn. Mèŋ n ge tsóte wɔ́b, pɔ́ tó ńkẅí’te mvfò pi, ńzẅíŋ ngie n kwoŋo gẅí.
en: Behold, I will make them of the synagogue of Satan, which say they are Jews, and are not, but do lie; behold, I will make them to come and worship before thy feet, and to know that I have loved thee.

ngiemboon: Pá’ pi ka kú’te shwóŋè yɔ́ɔn tà pi tè kʉ́a la, mèŋ yɔ́ɔn n ge gÿo tÿɔ́’te gẅi nà fʉ̀’ gie ngɔ́’ ge gÿo tóo tsɛ̀ɛ yɔɔn njÿó ntsèm, é lʉŋte pʉ̀a mesoŋ pie ée ndùmo ssé tsetsá’.
en: Because thou hast kept the word of my patience, I also will keep thee from the hour of temptation, which shall come upon all the world, to try them that dwell upon the earth.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ge tɔ́g tó. Pi kú’te mmó gie áa mbwo pi tà à tʉ ńzsé ngie tsɔ̌ nyìŋ tè kẅé gi ngú’ wɔ́.
en: Behold, I come quickly: hold that fast which thou hast, that no man take thy crown.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ gẅie à ge lÿɔ́’ ncù tà cʉa nò tepòŋ, Mèŋ n ge gÿo lɔgɔ ngàŋ é tÿɔ́g ntóon nà jʉ’e Ssé yɔ̀ɔn, angàŋ le lá’ fóo jʉ’ó, ńgʉ́a tsɔ́ jʉ’ wɔ́. Mèŋ n ge gÿo ŋwe’e lezíŋ Ssé yɔ̀ɔn á ná ngàŋ, é gíŋ ŋwe’e lezíŋ tÿǒsoŋ ye Ssé yɔ̀ɔn á nà ngàŋ. Yɛ̌ tÿǒsoŋ gwɔ́ Yerósalem ye sẅé gie á fóo tÿǒ lepwó, á lejʉ́ŋ Ssé yɔ̀ɔn, ésẅɛ́’ɛ. Mèŋ n ge gíŋ ŋwe’e mbɔɔ lezíŋ sɔ́ɔn se sẅé á ná ngàŋ.
en: Him that overcometh will I make a pillar in the temple of my God, and he shall go no more out: and I will write upon him the name of my God, and the name of the city of my God,which isnew Jerusalem, which cometh down out of heaven from my God: andI will write upon himmy new name.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńgẅiin metuŋó, lélɔg ńjú’u nò, á jú’u nò gie Zẅìge Ssé ne ńgɔɔn mbwo mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo lɔɔn!
en: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.

ngiemboon: Ŋwe’e menò mɔɔn, ńtúm ńnáa mbwo*cÿɔ́’ Ssé gẅie à líe cú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo gie áa tÿǒsoŋo Laodisé. Ŋwe’e ngie: Nyìŋ gẅie lezíŋ sé ée lê*Amen, á gwɔ́ njÿò ńgyá we tè kubé shwóŋè, gẅie à gɔɔn nò gie áa nénʉ́, gẅie yé zɔ nzyeté nà kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gie e Ssé la nyɛte, à ne ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: And unto the angel of the church of the Laodiceans write; These things saith the Amen, the faithful and true witness, the beginning of the creation of God;

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńzsé mefà’ mí. Pi tè sẅé, ńké tè tween. Pi gɔ̌ɔn ngie pi ge fó sẅé sẅé à gaa, éfó tween tween à gaa.
en: I know thy works, that thou art neither cold nor hot: I would thou wert cold or hot.

ngiemboon: Pá’ pi ne ḿbÿɛ́ɛ pÿɛ̌ pá’ ntse gẅie mé zẅɛ’té zẅɛ́’te la, ńké tè sẅé, ńké tè tween la, pi ge fóo ncwò mèŋ kẅɛ pá’ zè’e la.
en: So then because thou art lukewarm, and neither cold nor hot, I will spue thee out of my mouth.

ngiemboon: Pá’ pi ne ńgɔɔn ngie pi ee ngàŋa mmó, ńgie pi kéen ńgẅiin nkáb tà é gyɔ́ɔn, tà pi cʉ’ʉ́ ńzága tsɔ́ mmó wɔ́ la, pá’ pi ké tè ńne ńzsé ngie pi ee ngàŋ ngɔ́’ tà ńgwɔ́ mé tsɔ́ɔn mezìŋe mí tsɔ̌ɔn wɔ́ la, mbɔɔ pá’ pi tè ne ńzsé ngie pi ee mefÿɔg, ńgwɔ́ pà fʉ̀ menÿɔ́g, ńtyéte té jÿɔ́g nzsǒ wɔ́ la,
en: Because thou sayest, I am rich, and increased with goods, and have need of nothing; and knowest not that thou art wretched, and miserable, and poor, and blind, and naked:

ngiemboon: mèŋ n ge ké shwóŋó gẅi ngie pi tóo mbwo mèŋ, ńjúu tʉ̌ gɔ̂l gie mé kéen ńdɔg mmɔ̌g ńkẅile ncÿǒ mǒ ntsèm, ńdeen ńké ńgwɔ́ ngàŋa mmó fʉ̀’ó, ńgíŋe ńjú mefɔ́gɔ nzsǒ mbwo mèŋ, ńzsé ngie pi ge gẅiin nzsǒ gie pi ge ma’, eshʉ́ le gíŋe ńkúu gẅi ngie pi tyeté té jÿɔ́g nzsǒ wɔ́. Pi ge gíŋe júu ffo menÿɔ́g mbwo mèŋ, é ńnéŋe nà menÿɔ́g mí légwɔ́ gie pi ge gyá jʉ’.
en: I counsel thee to buy of me gold tried in the fire, that thou mayest be rich; and white raiment, that thou mayest be clothed, andthatthe shame of thy nakedness do not appear; and anoint thine eyes with eyesalve, that thou mayest see.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gʉa ná pʉ̀a pie mèŋ n kwoŋo wɔ́b, ńkaga wɔ́b métsèm, ńcúa mbɔɔ cǔa. Pú’u la, pi zeŋe nnɛ́ éfa’a fà’, ḿbiŋ ńkúbe mà gẅi.
en: As many as I love, I rebuke and chasten: be zealous therefore, and repent.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ wɔɔn, mbà mèŋ n tǒ ńtyé ńne ńkwá’te ncwò ndá, ńgwɔ́ gie nyìŋ lɔɔn ńjú’ ngyè yɔ̀ɔn, ńtsɔ́’ ncwò ndá, mbà mèŋ n ge kúu ndá ngàŋ, é ńnéŋe ssé peg ngàŋ pfɛ́ɛ mmó, angàŋ piŋ ńnéŋe ssé peg yé pfɛ́ɛ mmó.
en: Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.

ngiemboon: Á ge gÿo gʉa ná nyìŋ gẅie à lÿɔ̌’ ncù tà ńcʉa nò tepòŋ, mèŋ n zẅíŋ à ńnéŋe nà lʉŋe lefùɔ á ngʉ̀ŋe yɔ́ɔn, pá’ mèŋ yɔ́ɔn n da lÿɔ́’ ncù tà ńcʉa nò tepòŋ, Tá wɔ̀ɔn zẅíŋ mèŋ n ńnéŋe ná lʉŋe lefùɔ á ngʉ̀ŋe yé la.
en: To him that overcometh will I grant to sit with me in my throne, even as I also overcame, and am set down with my Father in his throne.

ngiemboon: Nyiŋ lɔɔn ńgẅiin metuŋó, lélɔg ńjú’u nò, á jú’u nò gie Zẅìge Ssé ne ńgɔɔn mbwo mecú’tè pʉ̀a Kristo lɔɔn.
en: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.

ngiemboon: N gyá sɔɔn shúm tà ńtsẅé jʉ’, e Ssé gíŋe ńnyɛ́’ nÿɔ́g mɔ́ɔn, n gwɔ gyá, mbà mé tsɔ̌’ tsɔ́ ncwò ndá á tÿǒ lepwó. N deen ńké ńgíŋe ńjú’ nyìŋ gẅie à la zɔɔn ńgɔɔn nò né mèŋ, ngyè ye gwɔ́ pɔ́ pá’ ngyè ntàŋ la, á gɔɔn né mèŋ ngie: Kwɔ́’ɔ tà ńkúu jʉ’ɔɔn, mèŋ n nyɛɛ gú mmó gie á ge pɔ́ɔnte tó.
